analyzed: bsams bzhin du chos kyi phyogs las chos ma yin pa'i phyogs su song ba ste /
translated: It means to be separated from the place by oneself because one has deliberately gone over to the side of what is contrary to the Doctrine from the side of the Doctrine.

original: de ltar na bdag nyid kyis bdag tha dad du gnas par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar na bdag nyid kyis bdag tha dad du gnas par byed pa'o //
translated: This is called “to be separated from the place by oneself.”

original: dge 'dun gyis chos bzhin du bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis chos bzhin du bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is meant by “to be separated from the place by the Order in accordance with the Doctrine”?

original: chos bzhin du 'dus pa'i dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las mi g-yo ba gzhag par 'os pas spangs pa yin te /
analyzed: chos bzhin du 'dus pa'i dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las mi g-yo ba gzhag par 'os pas spangs pa yin te /
translated: It means to be separated from the place by the Order in accordance with the Doctrine when the Order, in accordance with the Doctrine, has passed a legal procedure consisting of a proclamation and three decisions, and has thus established an immovable act of suspension.

original: de ltar na dge 'dun gyis chos bzhin du spangs pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar na dge 'dun gyis chos bzhin du spangs pa'o //
translated: Thus, the Saṅgha has acted according to the Dharma in dismissing him.

original: mtshungs par lhan cig gnas pa la yang gnyis te /
analyzed: mtshungs par lhan cig gnas pa la yang gnyis te /
translated: There are two kinds of cohabitation:

original: bdag nyid kyis bdag lhan cig gnas par byed pa dang / dge 'dun gyis chos bzhin du byas pa'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyis bdag lhan cig gnas par byed pa dang / dge 'dun gyis chos bzhin du byas pa'o //
translated: cohabitation by oneself and cohabitation by the Saṅgha acting according to the Dharma.

original: bdag nyid la bdag nyid lhan cig gnas pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: bdag nyid la bdag nyid lhan cig gnas pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is cohabitation by oneself?

original: bsams bzhin du chos ma yin pa'i phyogs las chos kyi phyogs su 'ongs pa ste /
analyzed: bsams bzhin du chos ma yin pa'i phyogs las chos kyi phyogs su 'ongs pa ste /
translated: It is when one who has come over to the side of the Dharma from the side of non-Dharma intentionally.

original: de ltar na bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid lhan cig gnas par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar na bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid lhan cig gnas par byed pa'o //
translated: Thus, cohabitation by oneself.

original: dge 'dun gyis chos bzhin du byas pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis chos bzhin du byas pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is cohabitation by the Saṅgha acting according to the Dharma?

original: dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las mi g-yo ba gzhag par mi 'os pas chos bzhin du 'dus pa'i dge 'dun gyis spang ba de phyung ba yin /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las mi g-yo ba gzhag par mi 'os pas chos bzhin du 'dus pa'i dge 'dun gyis spang ba de phyung ba yin /
translated: It is when the Saṅgha, acting according to the Dharma, dismisses a monk who is not worthy of being placed in a state of immobility by a legal procedure consisting of the announcement of a motion and three presentations of a proposal.

original: de ltar na dge 'dun gyis chos bzhin du byas pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar na dge 'dun gyis chos bzhin du byas pa'o //
translated: Thus, cohabitation by the Saṅgha acting according to the Dharma.

original: tha dad du gnas pa'i dge slong des rab tu dbyung bar mi bya ba nas snga ma bzhin te /
analyzed: tha dad du gnas pa'i dge slong des rab tu dbyung bar mi bya ba nas snga ma bzhin te /
translated: The monk who lives separately should not give the going forth, and so on, as before.

original: ji ltar dge 'dun gyis gang la spangs pa'i las byas pa dang / gzhan yang de dang 'dra ste /
analyzed: ji ltar dge 'dun gyis gang la spangs pa'i las byas pa dang / gzhan yang de dang 'dra ste /
translated: Just as the Saṅgha does the action of relinquishment for someone, so it is for another.

original: des de lta bu'i nyes pa yang mi bya /
analyzed: des de lta bu'i nyes pa yang mi bya /
translated: He should not commit such an offense.

original: de las mthun par yang mi bya ba'i bar du ste /
analyzed: de las mthun par yang mi bya ba'i bar du ste /
translated: He should not do what accords with that offense.

original: gang zag bcu gnyis kyi las su sdom pas bsko bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: gang zag bcu gnyis kyi las su sdom pas bsko bar mi bya'o //
translated: He should not be appointed to the duties of the twelve categories of monks.

original: tha dad du gnas pa'i dge slong gis tshangs par mtshungs par spyod pa'i gnas brtan dang / bar ma dang / gsar @217a * //🔽bu yang rung bag dbab par bya /
analyzed: tha dad du gnas pa'i dge slong gis tshangs par mtshungs par spyod pa'i gnas brtan dang / bar ma dang / gsar @217a * // bu yang rung bag dbab par bya /
translated: The monk who lives separately should not relax with the elder, middle-aged, or junior fellow brahmacārin.

original: nyes par mi bya /
analyzed: nyes par mi bya /
translated: He should not commit an offense.

original: nyes pa zhig byas na yang slar dbyung ba'i tshul du bya'o //
analyzed: nyes pa zhig byas na yang slar dbyung ba'i tshul du bya'o //
translated: If he does commit an offense, he should be expelled.

original: gal te slar dbyung ba'i tshul du mi byed na tha dad du gnas par byas pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: gal te slar dbyung ba'i tshul du mi byed na tha dad du gnas par byas pa nyid yin no //
translated: If he is not expelled, he is still living separately.

original: de la 'di skad ces bsgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: de la 'di skad ces bsgo bar bya'o //
translated: He should be told this:

original: dge 'dun gyis khyed la thig btab pa bzhin du byed do //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis khyed la thig btab pa bzhin du byed do //
translated: The Saṅgha will act like a cauterization for you.

original: phur pa btsugs pa bzhin du byed do //
analyzed: phur pa btsugs pa bzhin du byed do //
translated: It will act like a surgical probe for you.

original: nyes pa de yang dge 'dun las 'di nyid bshags par bya'i 'di las phyi rol du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: nyes pa de yang dge 'dun las 'di nyid bshags par bya'i 'di las phyi rol du ni ma yin no //
translated: And you should confess that offense to the Saṅgha, not to anyone else.

original: khyod kyis las de yang dge 'dun 'di nyid kyis slar bde bar byed kyi /
analyzed: khyod kyis las de yang dge 'dun 'di nyid kyis slar bde bar byed kyi /
translated: And the Saṅgha will make you well again.

original: 'di las phyi rol du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di las phyi rol du ni ma yin no //
translated: Not anyone else.

original: khyod kyis nyes pa de yang ma bshags sam ;
analyzed: khyod kyis nyes pa de yang ma bshags sam ;
translated: Have you confessed that offense?🔽Have you made amends for it?

original: phyir bcos par ma byas na ni tshangs par mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa dag gis gang du mi 'dod pa der gleng bar byed do //
analyzed: phyir bcos par ma byas na ni tshangs par mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa dag gis gang du mi 'dod pa der gleng bar byed do //
translated: If you haven’t, then the wise fellow practitioners will bring it up in whatever way they think is appropriate.

original: gal te yang de bzhin du byas pa las kyang 'dul bar ma gyur na gang zag de thig btab pa bzhin du /
analyzed: gal te yang de bzhin du byas pa las kyang 'dul bar ma gyur na gang zag de thig btab pa bzhin du /
translated: If you don’t act in accordance with that, then that individual should be treated like a cauterization,

original: phur pa btsugs pa bzhin du byas la spang bar bya'o //
analyzed: phur pa btsugs pa bzhin du byas la spang bar bya'o //
translated: like a surgical probe, and expelled.

original: de ni 'di ltar rta rgod bzhin te /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar rta rgod bzhin te /
translated: It’s like a wild horse.

original: de ni tha dad du gnas pas bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni tha dad du gnas pas bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: That’s called ‘living separately.’

original: gzu pos bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: gzu pos bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is a monk who is a judge?

original: rtsod pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir dge slong gzu pos chos nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par btsal bar byas te /
analyzed: rtsod pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir dge slong gzu pos chos nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par btsal bar byas te /
translated: In order to pacify a dispute, a monk who is a judge should be sought who has twenty-two qualities.

original: nyi shu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na /
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na /
translated: What are the twenty-two?

original: ci ste tshul khrims dang ldan zhing dang po nas phun sum tshogs pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan zhing 'gyod pa dang ldan la bsdams pa dang / bslab pa 'dod pa dang / 'dul ba la shin tu rnam par nges shing thos pa 'dzin la thos pa bsags pa dang /
analyzed: ci ste tshul khrims dang ldan zhing dang po nas phun sum tshogs pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan zhing 'gyod pa dang ldan la bsdams pa dang / bslab pa 'dod pa dang / 'dul ba la shin tu rnam par nges shing thos pa 'dzin la thos pa bsags pa dang /
translated: If he is endowed with morality, is perfect from the beginning, is endowed with shame, is endowed with regret, is restrained, desires training, is very certain in the Vinaya, and is one who holds what he has heard and has accumulated learning,

original: lung 'thon pa dang / rtsod pa la mkhas pa dang / rtsod pa kun nas slong ba la mkhas pa dang / rtsod pa'i bye brag la mkhas pa dang / rtsod pa 'gog pa la mkhas pa dang / rtsod pa 'gags nas phyis mi 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang /
analyzed: lung 'thon pa dang / rtsod pa la mkhas pa dang / rtsod pa kun nas slong ba la mkhas pa dang / rtsod pa'i bye brag la mkhas pa dang / rtsod pa 'gog pa la mkhas pa dang / rtsod pa 'gags nas phyis mi 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang /
translated: is one who recites the scriptures, is skilled in debate, is skilled in initiating debate, is skilled in the distinctions of debate, is skilled in stopping debate, and is skilled in preventing debate from arising again after it has been stopped,

original: bstan bcos la mkhas pa dang / gzhi lhag par spyod pa la mkhas shing nyes rtsom med pa smra ba dang / nyes rtsom byed du mi 'jug pa dang / lus dang ngag dang yid kyis mi 'jug pa dang / smra bar byed cing smra ba brda phrad par byed pa dang /
analyzed: bstan bcos la mkhas pa dang / gzhi lhag par spyod pa la mkhas shing nyes rtsom med pa smra ba dang / nyes rtsom byed du mi 'jug pa dang / lus dang ngag dang yid kyis mi 'jug pa dang / smra bar byed cing smra ba brda phrad par byed pa dang /
translated: They are skilled in the treatises, skilled in the practice of the basis, and they are speakers who do not commit faults. They do not engage in the commission of faults, and they do not engage in body, speech, and mind. They speak and they communicate through speech.

original: go bar byed cing go bar brda phrad par byed pa dang / rnam par rig par byed cing rnam par rig par byed pa brda phrad par byed pa dang / nges par rtogs par byed cing nges par rtogs par brda phrad par byed pa dang /
analyzed: go bar byed cing go bar brda phrad par byed pa dang / rnam par rig par byed cing rnam par rig par byed pa brda phrad par byed pa dang / nges par rtogs par byed cing nges par rtogs par brda phrad par byed pa dang /
translated: They understand and they communicate through understanding. They are aware and they communicate through awareness. They realize and they communicate through realization.

original: 'dun pas 'gro ba ma yin pa dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba ma @217b yin pa dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba ma yin pa dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: 'dun pas 'gro ba ma yin pa dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba ma @217b yin pa dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba ma yin pa dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba ma yin pa ste /
translated: They do not go out of desire, they do not go out of hatred, they do not go out of ignorance, and they do not go out of fear.

original: gzu bo chos nyi shu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan pa ni /
analyzed: gzu bo chos nyi shu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan pa ni /
translated: Those who possess these twenty-two qualities of uprightness

original: chos kyi longs spyod dam /
analyzed: chos kyi longs spyod dam /
translated: are the ones who enjoy the Dharma.

original: zang zing gi longs spyod kyis phyogs gnyis ka la mi brten pa yin no //
analyzed: zang zing gi longs spyod kyis phyogs gnyis ka la mi brten pa yin no //
translated: He does not rely on either of the two groups for material support.

original: yang 'di lta ste /
analyzed: yang 'di lta ste /
translated: Moreover,

original: gzu bo'i dge slong gis rgol ba dang ldan pa'i dge slong rnams la lhan cig tu smra ba dang / phyag byed pa dang / sngar ldang ba dang / thal mo sbyor ba dang / gdud par byed par gyur pa'i las rnams bdag gir mi bya'o //
analyzed: gzu bo'i dge slong gis rgol ba dang ldan pa'i dge slong rnams la lhan cig tu smra ba dang / phyag byed pa dang / sngar ldang ba dang / thal mo sbyor ba dang / gdud par byed par gyur pa'i las rnams bdag gir mi bya'o //
translated: the upright monk should not accept any of the actions of the monks who are the adversaries, such as speaking together, greeting, rising up, joining palms, or bowing.

original: de dag bsnyen bkur byed na yang nyams su mi blang ngo //🔽lhung bzed 'bul na yang mi blang /
analyzed: de dag bsnyen bkur byed na yang nyams su mi blang ngo // lhung bzed 'bul na yang mi blang /
translated: If they are venerated, he should not consent.🔽If they offer a bowl, he should not accept it.

original: chos gos 'bul na yang mi blang /
analyzed: chos gos 'bul na yang mi blang /
translated: If they offer a Dharma robe, he should not accept it.

original: yo byad gzhan ci yang rung ba 'bul ba bdag gir mi bya'o //
analyzed: yo byad gzhan ci yang rung ba 'bul ba bdag gir mi bya'o //
translated: He should not accept any other articles they offer.

original: des kyang de dag la bsnyen par mi bya /
analyzed: des kyang de dag la bsnyen par mi bya /
translated: He should not serve them.

original: lhung bzed mi sbyin /
analyzed: lhung bzed mi sbyin /
translated: He should not give them a bowl.

original: chos gos mi sbyin /🔽zas mi sbyin /
analyzed: chos gos mi sbyin / zas mi sbyin /
translated: He should not give them a Dharma robe.🔽He should not give them food.

original: sman mi sbyin na /
analyzed: sman mi sbyin na /
translated: He should not give them medicine.

original: yo byad gzhan ci yang rung ba sbyin par mi bya'o //
analyzed: yo byad gzhan ci yang rung ba sbyin par mi bya'o //
translated: He should not give them any other articles.

original: de dag las lung 'bogs pa yang mi blang /
analyzed: de dag las lung 'bogs pa yang mi blang /
translated: He should not receive instruction from them.

original: dran par bya ba yang ma yin /
analyzed: dran par bya ba yang ma yin /
translated: They should not be made to recite.

original: rnal 'byor yang ma yin /
analyzed: rnal 'byor yang ma yin /
translated: They should not be made to practice.

original: yid la byed pa yang mi 'dri'o //
analyzed: yid la byed pa yang mi 'dri'o //
translated: They should not be made to think.

original: de dag la lung 'bogs par sbyin par mi bya'o //🔽dran par bya ba yang ma yin /
analyzed: de dag la lung 'bogs par sbyin par mi bya'o // dran par bya ba yang ma yin /
translated: They should not be made to teach.🔽They should not be made to recite.

original: kun dri bar bya ba yang ma yin /
analyzed: kun dri bar bya ba yang ma yin /
translated: They should not be made to ask questions.

original: rnal 'byor yang ma yin /
analyzed: rnal 'byor yang ma yin /
translated: They should not be made to practice.

original: yid la bya ba yang mi bsko /🔽stan gcig la 'dug par yang mi bya'o //
analyzed: yid la bya ba yang mi bsko / stan gcig la 'dug par yang mi bya'o //
translated: They should not be made to think.🔽They should not be made to sit on the same seat.

original: 'chag sa gcig tu bcag par mi bya /
analyzed: 'chag sa gcig tu bcag par mi bya /
translated: They should not be made to walk on the same path.

original: gnas khang gcig tu 'khod par mi bya'o //🔽gzhan du na tshig 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: gnas khang gcig tu 'khod par mi bya'o // gzhan du na tshig 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
translated: They should not be made to stay in the same place.

original: tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis 'di lta ste /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis 'di lta ste /
translated: They should be told, ‘Venerable, you have not found

original: las legs pa rnyed pa ci yod kyis /
analyzed: las legs pa rnyed pa ci yod kyis /
translated: what you should have found,

original: legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas /
analyzed: legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas /
translated: namely, going forth in the well-proclaimed Dharma and Vinaya.

original: 'thab par gyur ;🔽ma tshang 'dru bar gyur /
analyzed: 'thab par gyur ; ma tshang 'dru bar gyur /
translated: You have found quarrels,🔽disputes,

original: rtsod par gyur /🔽'gyed par gyur cing gnas pa ni ma rnyed de /
analyzed: rtsod par gyur / 'gyed par gyur cing gnas pa ni ma rnyed de /
translated: arguments,🔽and strife.

original: rnyed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rnyed pa ma yin no //
translated: You have not found what you should have found,🔽namely,

original: rnyed pa rnyed de legs pa rnyed pa ma yin gyi tshe dang ldan pa rnams khyed cag ma 'thab cig / ma rtsod cig / ma 'gyed cig /'gyed pa gnyis ka rgyal ba med do //
analyzed: rnyed pa rnyed de legs pa rnyed pa ma yin gyi tshe dang ldan pa rnams khyed cag ma 'thab cig / ma rtsod cig / ma 'gyed cig /'gyed pa gnyis ka rgyal ba med do //
translated: If you get something, it’s not good to get something. Venerables, don’t fight, don’t quarrel, don’t dispute. In a dispute, both sides are defeated.

original: rgyug pa gnyis ka rgyal ba med med do //
analyzed: rgyug pa gnyis ka rgyal ba med med do //
translated: In a race, both sides are defeated.

original: de dag gtan la phab na gcig rgyal gcig 'pham du 'gyur ro zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag gtan la phab na gcig rgyal gcig 'pham du 'gyur ro zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: If you settle them, one will be victorious and one will be defeated.”

original: 'di ni gzu bos bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gzu bos bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called “the upright procedure.”

original: de'i ngo bo nyid tshol bas sbyin pas bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid tshol bas sbyin pas bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the procedure for the one who is seeking the nature of reality to give?”

original: dge slong gang gis nyes par spyod pa de khas len /🔽khas blangs pa las kyang bsnyen /
analyzed: dge slong gang gis nyes par spyod pa de khas len / khas blangs pa las kyang bsnyen /
translated: “The monk who has committed a misdeed admits it.🔽Having admitted it, he is close.

original: bsnyen pa las kyang slar @218a * //
analyzed: bsnyen pa las kyang slar @218a * //
translated: Having been close, he is again

original: khas len pa de la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang / bzhi'i las mi g-yo ba gzhag par mi 'os pas /
analyzed: khas len pa de la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang / bzhi'i las mi g-yo ba gzhag par mi 'os pas /
translated: not worthy to be placed in the irreversible procedure of the Saṅgha with a proposal and a fourfold procedure.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba sbyin pa'i dge slong gis bya ba de lta bu la 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba sbyin pa'i dge slong gis bya ba de lta bu la 'jug par bya'o //
translated: The monk who is seeking the nature of reality should engage in that kind of procedure for giving.”

original: de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba'i dge slong gis rab tu 'byung bar mi bya ba nas snga ma bzhin te /
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba'i dge slong gis rab tu 'byung bar mi bya ba nas snga ma bzhin te /
translated: The monk who is seeking the essence of his nature should not go forth, as before.

original: gang la dge 'dun gyis de'i ngo bo nyid chol ba sbyin pa dang / gang de dang 'dra bas kyang rung ste /
analyzed: gang la dge 'dun gyis de'i ngo bo nyid chol ba sbyin pa dang / gang de dang 'dra bas kyang rung ste /
translated: The Saṅgha should not grant the essence of his nature, or anything similar to it,

original: nyes pa de lta bu 'byung bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: nyes pa de lta bu 'byung bar mi bya'o //
translated: to one who commits such an offense.

original: de bas thu bar yang mi bya ba'i bar du ste snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: de bas thu bar yang mi bya ba'i bar du ste snga ma bzhin no //
translated: He should not be given anything better, as before.

original: de ni 'di ltar gang zag bcu gnyis po sdom pas mi sko ba de ni de'i ngo bo nyid tshol bas sbyin pas bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar gang zag bcu gnyis po sdom pas mi sko ba de ni de'i ngo bo nyid tshol bas sbyin pas bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Thus, the Saṅgha should not grant the essence of his nature to the twelve types of persons who are not to be granted the vows.

original: pham pa byung ba la bslab pa byin pa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: pham pa byung ba la bslab pa byin pa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the procedure for granting training to one who has committed a defeating offense?

original: dge slong gang mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten kyang de la se gol gtogs pa gcig tsam du yang bcabs pa'i sems ma skyes pa ste /
analyzed: dge slong gang mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten kyang de la se gol gtogs pa gcig tsam du yang bcabs pa'i sems ma skyes pa ste /
translated: A monk who has engaged in sexual intercourse, but who has not had a single moment of concealing it,

original: de la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las mi g-yo ba gzhag par mi 'os pas bslab pa sbyin par bya ste /
analyzed: de la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las mi g-yo ba gzhag par mi 'os pas bslab pa sbyin par bya ste /
translated: The Saṅgha should give him the training.

original: 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed bzhin du rgyas par gang de dang 'dra ba gzhan yang rung ste /🔽de lta bu'i ltung ba phyin chad kyang mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed bzhin du rgyas par gang de dang 'dra ba gzhan yang rung ste / de lta bu'i ltung ba phyin chad kyang mi bya'o //
translated: Just as the venerable Nandaka did, or as another monk did,🔽so you should not commit such a downfall again.

original: de bas thu bar yang mi bya'o //
analyzed: de bas thu bar yang mi bya'o //
translated: You should not commit one that is worse than that.

original: zhes bya ba'i bar du ste snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i bar du ste snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The rest is as before.🔽The training is not given to twelve kinds of persons.🔽The training is not given to a monk who has violated the training.🔽The training is given to a monk who has violated the training.

analyzed: de ni 'di ltar gang zag bcu gnyis kyi phyir sdom pa mi bsko'o //

original: des bsnyen par rdzogs pa rnams la byin len bya'o //
analyzed: des bsnyen par rdzogs pa rnams la byin len bya'o //
translated: He should give the formal support to those who have completed the preliminary service.

original: bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang lhan cig nyal ba bsgyur zhing gud du 'byung ngo //
analyzed: bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang lhan cig nyal ba bsgyur zhing gud du 'byung ngo //
translated: He should not sleep with those who have completed the preliminary service.

original: bslab pa byin pa'i dge slong gi las rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: bslab pa byin pa'i dge slong gi las rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: There are two duties of the monk who has given the formal support:

original: gso sbyong dang dgag dbye'o //
analyzed: gso sbyong dang dgag dbye'o //
translated: the purification and the invitation.

original: bslab pa byin pa grangs su bskang ste gso sbyong mi bya'o //
analyzed: bslab pa byin pa grangs su bskang ste gso sbyong mi bya'o //
translated: The purification should not be done with the formal support counted as present.

original: de bzhin du dge 'dun gyi las gzhan la yang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du dge 'dun gyi las gzhan la yang ngo //
translated: The same applies to the other duties of the community.

original: gal te bslab pa byin pa gso sbyong gi nang du 'ongs na ni mi bskrad do //
analyzed: gal te bslab pa byin pa gso sbyong gi nang du 'ongs na ni mi bskrad do //
translated: If the one who has given the formal support comes to the purification, he should not be expelled.

original: gal te song na yang mi bzung ngo //
analyzed: gal te song na yang mi bzung ngo //
translated: If he has gone, he should not be sought out.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽des dge 'dun 'dus pas rjes su ma zhugs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / des dge 'dun 'dus pas rjes su ma zhugs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Why is that?🔽Because the community does not come together by his not taking part.

original: 'dus par yang mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dus par yang mi 'gyur te /
translated: And it does not come together by his being sought out.

original: 'di ni pham pa byung ba las bslab pa byin pas bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni pham pa byung ba las bslab pa byin pas bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the duty of the one who has given the formal support when there is an offense entailing expulsion.

original: mtshams bcad @218b pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: mtshams bcad @218b pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the duty of the most senior monk in a monastery where the boundaries have been defined?

original: mtshams bcad pa'i gnas brtan gyi dge slong gis bya ba de lta bu la 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: mtshams bcad pa'i gnas brtan gyi dge slong gis bya ba de lta bu la 'jug par bya'o //
translated: The elder monk who has set the boundary should engage in such activities.

original: de na gsar bu'i dge slong 'khod pa rnams la de dag mthun par shes par bya /🔽bskyang bar bya /
analyzed: de na gsar bu'i dge slong 'khod pa rnams la de dag mthun par shes par bya / bskyang bar bya /
translated: He should know the young monks who are living there.🔽He should support them.

original: rjes su bstan par bya /
analyzed: rjes su bstan par bya /
translated: He should instruct them.

original: sdig pa las slar bzlog par bya /
analyzed: sdig pa las slar bzlog par bya /
translated: He should turn them away from evil.

original: dge ba la gzhug par bya /
analyzed: dge ba la gzhug par bya /
translated: He should engage them in virtue.🔽He should recite the scriptures with them, ask them questions, and make them confess their sins.

original: kha don byed pa dang / kun 'dri ba dang / spong ba dang / so sor dben par 'jug pa dang / rnal 'byor dang / yid la byed pa rnams te /
analyzed: kha don byed pa dang / kun 'dri ba dang / spong ba dang / so sor dben par 'jug pa dang / rnal 'byor dang / yid la byed pa rnams te /
translated: He should give them instructions in solitude, in yoga, and in mental attention.

original: de dag la so sor lung 'bogs par bya /
analyzed: de dag la so sor lung 'bogs par bya /
translated: He should give them the scriptures individually.

original: kun tshangs par spyod pa la gzhug par bya /🔽bslab par bya /
analyzed: kun tshangs par spyod pa la gzhug par bya / bslab par bya /
translated: He should engage them all in pure conduct.🔽He should train them.

original: bslab par bya ba la so sor bstab par bya /
analyzed: bslab par bya ba la so sor bstab par bya /
translated: He should give them the precepts.

original: rnyed pa bsgrub par bya /
analyzed: rnyed pa bsgrub par bya /
translated: He should provide for their needs.

original: nam so sor rnyed pa 'god pa'i chos so so'i bgo skal snyoms par mig sngar bgo'o //
analyzed: nam so sor rnyed pa 'god pa'i chos so so'i bgo skal snyoms par mig sngar bgo'o //
translated: He should distribute the property of those who have died without relatives equally among those present.

original: nad pa la blta bar bya /
analyzed: nad pa la blta bar bya /
translated: He should look after the sick.

original: nad pa'i nad g-yog tu dge slong rnams spro bar bya /
analyzed: nad pa'i nad g-yog tu dge slong rnams spro bar bya /
translated: The monks should be encouraged to nurse the sick.

original: nad pa rnams la chos kyi gtam bya /
analyzed: nad pa rnams la chos kyi gtam bya /
translated: They should give Dharma teachings to the sick.

original: lam dang lam ma yin pa yang dag par bsgrag par bya'o //
analyzed: lam dang lam ma yin pa yang dag par bsgrag par bya'o //
translated: They should proclaim what is and is not the path.

original: ye shes dang mthong pa rnam par sbyang ba'i rgyud mi gtong bar bya /
analyzed: ye shes dang mthong pa rnam par sbyang ba'i rgyud mi gtong bar bya /
translated: They should not give up the practice of purifying wisdom and insight.

original: rnam pa thams cad du 'ang nad pa la g-yel bar mi bya /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du 'ang nad pa la g-yel bar mi bya /
translated: They should not neglect the sick in any way.

original: mtshams bcad pa'i gnas su dge slong rnams lhags pa la gzhan ci yang rung bya bar gyur pa de thams cad la dge slong gnas brtan gyis thog mar 'jug bar bya ba ni /
analyzed: mtshams bcad pa'i gnas su dge slong rnams lhags pa la gzhan ci yang rung bya bar gyur pa de thams cad la dge slong gnas brtan gyis thog mar 'jug bar bya ba ni /
translated: When the monks have gathered in the place where the boundaries are being set, the most senior monk should begin by doing whatever needs to be done.

original: mtshams bcad pa'i gnas brtan gyis bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mtshams bcad pa'i gnas brtan gyis bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called “the most senior monk doing the work of setting the boundaries.”

original: kun dga' ra ba'i bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: kun dga' ra ba'i bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the work of the monastery?”

original: kun dga' ra ba zhes bya ba ni 'di rnams kyang yin te /
analyzed: kun dga' ra ba zhes bya ba ni 'di rnams kyang yin te /
translated: The monastery is as follows:

original: kun dga' ra ba'i nang na khang phran dang / khang pa dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khang pa 'khor du bcas pa dang / spyil po dang / spyil po'i dngos po dang / 'chags dang / skyed cing dang / gsing ma rnams te thams cad kyang rgan rims bzhin du bsko bar bya'o //
analyzed: kun dga' ra ba'i nang na khang phran dang / khang pa dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khang pa 'khor du bcas pa dang / spyil po dang / spyil po'i dngos po dang / 'chags dang / skyed cing dang / gsing ma rnams te thams cad kyang rgan rims bzhin du bsko bar bya'o //
translated: In the monastery, the huts, the houses, the multi-storied buildings, the circular houses, the huts, the hut-like structures, the open pavilions, the upper stories, the terraces, the courtyards, all should be assigned to the monks in order of seniority.

original: phyi bdar bya ba de ni kun dga' ra ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: phyi bdar bya ba de ni kun dga' ra ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: The work of cleaning is called the work of the monastery.

original: kun dga' ra ba'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: kun dga' ra ba'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the work of the elders in the monastery?

original: dge 'dun rnams kyi kun dga' ra ba'i gnas te ;
analyzed: dge 'dun rnams kyi kun dga' ra ba'i gnas te ;
translated: It is the place of the Saṅgha’s monastery.

original: der so so nas dge slong dag lhags pa rnams bya bar bcas pa'i yang tha dad pas na /
analyzed: der so so nas dge slong dag lhags pa rnams bya bar bcas pa'i yang tha dad pas na /
translated: There, each of the monks who have arrived should be assigned work.🔽The monk should say, “Wait a moment, until I know whether this work that has been assigned to you is in accordance with the Dharma or not.

original: dge slong des 'di dag gi bya ba bcas pa de'i chos sam pra bar ta zhes ma byung gi bar du skad cig sdod cig / gdod thams cad la snyoms par brims shig ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong des 'di dag gi bya ba bcas pa de'i chos sam pra bar ta zhes ma byung gi bar du skad cig sdod cig / gdod thams cad la snyoms par brims shig ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: Then I will distribute it equally to all.”

original: dge slong gnas brtan gyis @219a * //
analyzed: dge slong gnas brtan gyis @219a * //
translated: The elder monks

original: gnas brtan dang / bar ma dang / gsar bu rnams kyi rjes su mthun par bya /
analyzed: gnas brtan dang / bar ma dang / gsar bu rnams kyi rjes su mthun par bya /
translated: should be in harmony with the elder, middle, and new monks.

original: gnas brtan gyis de'i gnas brtan dang bar ma dang / gsar bu rnams kyis kyang de'i rjes su mthun par bya'o //
analyzed: gnas brtan gyis de'i gnas brtan dang bar ma dang / gsar bu rnams kyis kyang de'i rjes su mthun par bya'o //
translated: The elder monks should be in harmony with the elders, the middle monks, and the new monks.

original: gal te bram ze'am /
analyzed: gal te bram ze'am /
translated: If brahmins or

original: khyim bdag tha dad pa rnams lhags na de dag la yang mtshungs par bgo bsha' bya zhing sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: khyim bdag tha dad pa rnams lhags na de dag la yang mtshungs par bgo bsha' bya zhing sbyin par bya'o //
translated: householders come, they should be given a share and given gifts.

original: gal te mgron mi 'dod dam /
analyzed: gal te mgron mi 'dod dam /
translated: If they do not want to be guests,

original: bram ze'am khyim bdag dad pa can rnams dag mi 'dod na yang dge slong gnas brtan gyis chos dang ldan pa'i gtam yang dag par bstan par bya /
analyzed: bram ze'am khyim bdag dad pa can rnams dag mi 'dod na yang dge slong gnas brtan gyis chos dang ldan pa'i gtam yang dag par bstan par bya /
translated: even if the faithful brahmins or householders do not want , the elder monk should teach them the Dharma correctly.

original: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas la bdag cag la ni 'di yod do zhes smra bar bya ste /
analyzed: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas la bdag cag la ni 'di yod do zhes smra bar bya ste /
translated: He should delight them correctly and say, “We have this.”

original: 'di ni kun dga' ra ba'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni kun dga' ra ba'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called “the duties of the elder in the monastery.”

original: gnas khang gi bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: gnas khang gi bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What are the duties in the dwelling place?

original: dge slong gang gnas khang du 'dug pa des gnas khang der dus dus su chag chag gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong gang gnas khang du 'dug pa des gnas khang der dus dus su chag chag gdab par bya'o //
translated: The monk who is staying in a dwelling should sprinkle it and sweep it from time to time.

original: phyag dar dor ba dang / ba lang gi lci bas shin tu 'jam por byug par bya'o //
analyzed: phyag dar dor ba dang / ba lang gi lci bas shin tu 'jam por byug par bya'o //
translated: He should make it smooth with cow dung.

original: sdo cung zad byung na yang bsrab par bya /
analyzed: sdo cung zad byung na yang bsrab par bya /
translated: If there is a little dirt, he should remove it.

original: ral pa dang 'drums pa dang / gogs pa rnams slar bcos par bya /
analyzed: ral pa dang 'drums pa dang / gogs pa rnams slar bcos par bya /
translated: He should repair any cracks, holes, or breaks.

original: bum pa chus bkang ste gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: bum pa chus bkang ste gzhag par bya'o //
translated: He should fill the water pots.

original: yongs su spyad pa'i bum pa dang btsang ma'i ril pa dang / snam phyi ba'i ril ba dang / rkang pa dag bkru ba'i ril ba rnams bkang ste gzhag pa de ni gnas khang gi bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yongs su spyad pa'i bum pa dang btsang ma'i ril pa dang / snam phyi ba'i ril ba dang / rkang pa dag bkru ba'i ril ba rnams bkang ste gzhag pa de ni gnas khang gi bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: He should fill the pots for general use, the pots for drinking water, the pots for washing water, and the pots for washing feet. This is called the duties in the dwelling.

original: gnas khang gi gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: gnas khang gi gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What are the duties of the senior monk in the dwelling?

original: gnas khang gi dge slong gnas brtan gyi bya ba ni /
analyzed: gnas khang gi dge slong gnas brtan gyi bya ba ni /
translated: The duties of the senior monk in the dwelling are as follows.

original: des 'di lta bu la 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: des 'di lta bu la 'jug par bya'o //
translated: He should engage in the following.

original: dge slong gsar bu gang dag na 'khod par 'gyur bde dag shes par byas nas gnas brtan zhes bya ba'i bar na snga ma bzhin te /
analyzed: dge slong gsar bu gang dag na 'khod par 'gyur bde dag shes par byas nas gnas brtan zhes bya ba'i bar na snga ma bzhin te /
translated: Having learned who the newly arrived monks are, the elder should do all that is necessary, as before, up to:

original: gnas brtan gyis thams cad la thog mar 'jug par bya /
analyzed: gnas brtan gyis thams cad la thog mar 'jug par bya /
translated: The elder should be the first to enter.

original: rgyud mi gtong ba'i bya ba'i bar du ste /
analyzed: rgyud mi gtong ba'i bya ba'i bar du ste /
translated: Up to: He should not interrupt the recitation of the scriptures.

original: 'di ni gnas khang gi gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gnas khang gi gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the duties of the elder in the dwelling place.

original: khang pa'i 'khor du gtogs pa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: khang pa'i 'khor du gtogs pa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What are the duties in the courtyard?

original: khang pa 'khor dang bcas pa na dge slong gang 'dug pa des /
analyzed: khang pa 'khor dang bcas pa na dge slong gang 'dug pa des /
translated: The monk who is in the courtyard together with the dwelling place

original: khang pa 'khor dang bcas pa de dus dus su byi dor bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: khang pa 'khor dang bcas pa de dus dus su byi dor bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: should clean it from time to time, as before.

original: rkang pa bkru ba'i rnams bkang ste gzhag pa'i bar du'o //
analyzed: rkang pa bkru ba'i rnams bkang ste gzhag pa'i bar du'o //
translated: He should fill the foot-washing water trough and set it out.

original: khang pa 'khor dang bcas pa de na dge slong dag grogs gang dag 'khod pa rnams la yang byams pa'i @219b lus kyi las kyis mtshungs par spyad par bya /
analyzed: khang pa 'khor dang bcas pa de na dge slong dag grogs gang dag 'khod pa rnams la yang byams pa'i @219b lus kyi las kyis mtshungs par spyad par bya /
translated: He should be friendly with the monks who are his companions in the courtyard together with the dwelling place, and should practice with physical actions that are loving.

original: byams pa'i ngag gi las dang / byams pa'i yid kyi las kyis kyang mtshungs par spyad par bya /
analyzed: byams pa'i ngag gi las dang / byams pa'i yid kyi las kyis kyang mtshungs par spyad par bya /
translated: He should also act with loving speech and loving mind.

original: der yang 'thab mo mi 'byung bar bya /
analyzed: der yang 'thab mo mi 'byung bar bya /
translated: He should not let quarrels arise there.

original: mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'gyed pa dang / rtsod pa mi 'byung bar bya /
analyzed: mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'gyed pa dang / rtsod pa mi 'byung bar bya /
translated: He should not let disputes, arguments, and accusations arise there.

original: gal te der 'thab mo dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang ; 'gyed pa dang / rtsod pa zhig byung na zhi bar nus na ni de lta na legs gal te yang mi nus na gud du 'gro bar bya'o //
analyzed: gal te der 'thab mo dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang ; 'gyed pa dang / rtsod pa zhig byung na zhi bar nus na ni de lta na legs gal te yang mi nus na gud du 'gro bar bya'o //
translated: If quarrels, disputes, arguments, and accusations do arise there, if he is able to resolve them, that is good. But if he is not able, he should leave.

original: 'di ni khang pa'i 'khor du bcas pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni khang pa'i 'khor du bcas pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is said to be the duty of the one who has been appointed to the monastery.

original: khang pa'i 'khor du bcas pa'i gnas brtan kyi bya ba gang zhe na /🔽khang pa'i 'khor du bcas pa'i dge slong gi gnas brtan gyis bya ba de 'di lta bu la 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: khang pa'i 'khor du bcas pa'i gnas brtan kyi bya ba gang zhe na / khang pa'i 'khor du bcas pa'i dge slong gi gnas brtan gyis bya ba de 'di lta bu la 'jug par bya'o //
translated: What is the duty of the elder in the monastery?🔽The elder monk who has been appointed to the monastery should engage in the following activities.

original: de na dge slong gsar bu gang dag 'khod par gyur pa de dag kun shes par bya ba nas snga ma bzhin te /
analyzed: de na dge slong gsar bu gang dag 'khod par gyur pa de dag kun shes par bya ba nas snga ma bzhin te /
translated: He should know all the new monks who are living there, and so on, as before.

original: thams cad du yang dge slong gnas brtan gyis bya ba de 'di lta bu la 'jug par bya ba dang / rgyud mi gtong bar bya ba'i bar du ste /
analyzed: thams cad du yang dge slong gnas brtan gyis bya ba de 'di lta bu la 'jug par bya ba dang / rgyud mi gtong bar bya ba'i bar du ste /
translated: In all cases, the elder monk should engage in this activity and not abandon it.

original: 'di ni khang pa'i 'khor du bcas pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //🔽nags kyi bya ba gang zhe na nags zhes bya ba ni shing ljon pa'i gnas de na dge slong 'khod pa rnams kyis bdag cag gnas 'di na 'khod pa la srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: 'di ni khang pa'i 'khor du bcas pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o // nags kyi bya ba gang zhe na nags zhes bya ba ni shing ljon pa'i gnas de na dge slong 'khod pa rnams kyis bdag cag gnas 'di na 'khod pa la srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba'am /
translated: This is called the activity of the elder monk in a monastery with a fixed residence.

original: tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du gyur pa lta yod dam med ces rgyang grags gcig tshun chad kho ra khor yug tu brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du gyur pa lta yod dam med ces rgyang grags gcig tshun chad kho ra khor yug tu brtag par bya'o //
translated: What is the activity in the forest? The forest is a place with trees. The monks who live there should investigate within a distance of one krośa whether there are any obstacles to life or obstacles to pure conduct for those who live in that place.

original: gal te yod par ma mthong na ni ring du dor bar bya'o //
analyzed: gal te yod par ma mthong na ni ring du dor bar bya'o //
translated: If they do not see any, they should go far away.

original: gal te med par mthong la dogs par gyur na rgyang grags gcig tshun chad nags nyul ba bsko bar bya'o //
analyzed: gal te med par mthong la dogs par gyur na rgyang grags gcig tshun chad nags nyul ba bsko bar bya'o //
translated: If they see that there are none, but they are suspicious, they should appoint a monk to investigate the forest within a distance of one krośa.

original: gso sbyong gi gnas kyang bsko bar bya'o //
analyzed: gso sbyong gi gnas kyang bsko bar bya'o //
translated: and the site for the observance-day ceremony should be assigned.

original: de na phan tshun zang zing gi longs spyod dang / chos kyi longs spyod kyis spro ba bskyed par bya /
analyzed: de na phan tshun zang zing gi longs spyod dang / chos kyi longs spyod kyis spro ba bskyed par bya /
translated: There, they should encourage each other with both material gifts and the gift of the Dharma.

original: de na 'thab mo mi 'byung ba dang / mtshang 'dru ba mi 'byung ba dang / khon du 'dzin pa mi 'byung ba dang / rtsod pa mi 'byung ba de ni nags kyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de na 'thab mo mi 'byung ba dang / mtshang 'dru ba mi 'byung ba dang / khon du 'dzin pa mi 'byung ba dang / rtsod pa mi 'byung ba de ni nags kyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: There, they should not quarrel, should not be contentious, should not be hostile, and should not dispute. This is called the “forest duty.”

original: gnas mal gyi bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: gnas mal gyi bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the duty concerning bedding?

original: rim gyis gnas mal dus dus su brtag par bya /
analyzed: rim gyis gnas mal dus dus su brtag par bya /
translated: From time to time, one should inspect the bedding.

original: bskam par bya /🔽sprug par bya /🔽bsgrangs par bya /
analyzed: bskam par bya / sprug par bya / bsgrangs par bya /
translated: One should dry it.🔽One should beat it.

original: spa bar bya /
analyzed: spa bar bya /
translated: One should spread it out.🔽One should fumigate it with incense.

original: gal te dri ma can du gyur na bkru bar bya /
analyzed: gal te dri ma can du gyur na bkru bar bya /
translated: If it becomes dirty, one should wash it.

original: bug rdol du gyur tam /
analyzed: bug rdol du gyur tam /
translated: If it has holes,

original: sha zad pa'i chos su gyur na ci nus su bcom zhing glan par bya /
analyzed: sha zad pa'i chos su gyur na ci nus su bcom zhing glan par bya /
translated: one should darn it as much as one can.

original: bcom zhing glan du gzhug pa bya /🔽dge slong gis phyogs @220a * //
analyzed: bcom zhing glan du gzhug pa bya / dge slong gis phyogs @220a * //
translated: One should have it darned.

original: bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi gos bgos nas bshad pa'i sar mi 'gro /
analyzed: bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi gos bgos nas bshad pa'i sar mi 'gro /
translated: A monk should not go to a place where there is a Dharma talk without wearing the robe of the Saṅgha of the four directions.

original: gci ba'i sar mi 'gro /🔽bsro khang du ma yin /
analyzed: gci ba'i sar mi 'gro / bsro khang du ma yin /
translated: Do not go to the toilet.🔽Do not go to the sauna.🔽Do not go to the foot-washing place.

original: rkang pa bkru ba'i sar ma yin /🔽tshang ma du ma yin /
analyzed: rkang pa bkru ba'i sar ma yin / tshang ma du ma yin /
translated: Do not go to the kitchen.

original: char 'bab pa la gyon te 'dug par mi bya /
analyzed: char 'bab pa la gyon te 'dug par mi bya /
translated: Do not sit in the rain wearing it.

original: nyi ma tsha ba la ma yin /
analyzed: nyi ma tsha ba la ma yin /
translated: Do not sit in the hot sun.

original: me khang du gzhag par mi bya /
analyzed: me khang du gzhag par mi bya /
translated: Do not leave it in the fire hut.

original: ci nas gnod par 'gyur ba'i sa thams cad du phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi gos dang 'jug par mi bya /🔽bgo bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: ci nas gnod par 'gyur ba'i sa thams cad du phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi gos dang 'jug par mi bya / bgo bar mi bya'o //
translated: Do not use the saṅgha’s robes in any way that would damage them.🔽Do not wear them.

original: gzhag par mi bya'o //
analyzed: gzhag par mi bya'o //
translated: Do not leave them lying around.

original: dge slong rnams kyis gnas mal rnam pa 'di lta bu spyad par mi bya ste /
analyzed: dge slong rnams kyis gnas mal rnam pa 'di lta bu spyad par mi bya ste /
translated: “Monks should not use bedding in the following ways:

original: lnga gang zhe na /
analyzed: lnga gang zhe na /
translated: What are the five?

original: dud pa dang / dri ma dang / dri ma dang / rdul dang / bshad ba dang / 'drud pa'o //
analyzed: dud pa dang / dri ma dang / dri ma dang / rdul dang / bshad ba dang / 'drud pa'o //
translated: Smoke, stains, dirt, dust, and dragging.

original: dge slong rnams kyis phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi gos bgos bzhin du gtsug lag khang chag chag mi gdab mi phyag / phyag dar mi dor /🔽ba lang gi lci bas byug par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong rnams kyis phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi gos bgos bzhin du gtsug lag khang chag chag mi gdab mi phyag / phyag dar mi dor / ba lang gi lci bas byug par mi bya'o //
translated: “Monks should not sweep, sprinkle, or wipe the floors of the temple while wearing the saṅgha’s robes.🔽Do not anoint it with cow dung.

original: chu'i bum pa dgang bar mi bya /
analyzed: chu'i bum pa dgang bar mi bya /
translated: Do not fill the water pots.

original: yongs su spyad par ma yin /🔽gtsang ma'i ril bar ma yin /🔽bshad pa'i ril bar ma yin /
analyzed: yongs su spyad par ma yin / gtsang ma'i ril bar ma yin / bshad pa'i ril bar ma yin /
translated: It is not for using.🔽It is not for washing the mouth.🔽It is not for washing the feet.

original: rkang pa dag bkru ba'i ril ba dgang bar mi bya /
analyzed: rkang pa dag bkru ba'i ril ba dgang bar mi bya /
translated: It is not for washing the begging-bowl.

original: gtsug lag khang skyong du ma yin /🔽lhung bzed kyi las byed par ma yin /
analyzed: gtsug lag khang skyong du ma yin / lhung bzed kyi las byed par ma yin /
translated: It is not for the caretaker of the monastery.🔽It is not for the one who has the duty of the begging-bowls.

original: gos kyi las byed par ma yin /🔽dge slong rnams kyis phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi gos lus kyi mtha' la bgo bar mi bya /
analyzed: gos kyi las byed par ma yin / dge slong rnams kyis phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi gos lus kyi mtha' la bgo bar mi bya /
translated: It is not for the one who has the duty of the robes.🔽The monks should not wear the robes of the Saṅgha of the four directions around their bodies.

original: dge slong dag gis phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi mal cha dang / stan rnams bla gab med par bting ste /
analyzed: dge slong dag gis phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi mal cha dang / stan rnams bla gab med par bting ste /
translated: The monks should not spread out the bedding and seats of the Saṅgha of the four directions in the open air.

original: sgo khang phan chad nye 'khor 'dom bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i bar du bor te 'gro bar mi bya'o /🔽gal te bshad ba'am /
analyzed: sgo khang phan chad nye 'khor 'dom bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i bar du bor te 'gro bar mi bya'o / gal te bshad ba'am /
translated: They should not go beyond the threshold of the door, up to a distance of thirty-nine fathoms.

original: gci ba'i sar 'gro na yang dge slong 'khod pa rnams la bsgo la 'gro bar bya'o //
analyzed: gci ba'i sar 'gro na yang dge slong 'khod pa rnams la bsgo la 'gro bar bya'o //
translated: If they go to the place for defecating or urinating, they should inform the monks who are there.

original: ji ltar bdag nyid kyi lhung bzed dang / chos gos lus kyi pags pa bzhin du dge slong dag gis phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi mal cha dang / stan rnams yongs su bsrung bar bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar bdag nyid kyi lhung bzed dang / chos gos lus kyi pags pa bzhin du dge slong dag gis phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi mal cha dang / stan rnams yongs su bsrung bar bya'o //
translated: Just as the monk protects his own alms-bowl and robe as if they were his own skin, so too he should protect the bedding and seats of the community of monks in the four directions.

original: dge slong dag gis ci nas kyang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi mal cha dang / stan rnams yal bar dor bar mi bya ste /
analyzed: dge slong dag gis ci nas kyang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi mal cha dang / stan rnams yal bar dor bar mi bya ste /
translated: The monks should not neglect the bedding and seats of the community of monks in the four directions.

original: 'di ni dge 'dun gyi gnas mal gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni dge 'dun gyi gnas mal gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the duty concerning the dwellings of the community.

original: sgo glegs kyi bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: sgo glegs kyi bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the duty concerning the door bolt?

original: sgo glegs zhes bya ba ni sgo'i bar ma ste /
analyzed: sgo glegs zhes bya ba ni sgo'i bar ma ste /
translated: The door bolt is the middle part of the door.

original: dge slong gis brdung na yun ring du brdung bar mi bya /
analyzed: dge slong gis brdung na yun ring du brdung bar mi bya /
translated: If a monk strikes it, he should not strike it for a long time.

original: sngar nang na 'khod pa rnams kyis tshor bar bya ba'i phyir dal bus bags @220b kyis brdung bar bya'o //🔽'byed pa'i tshe yang drag tu mi dbye /
analyzed: sngar nang na 'khod pa rnams kyis tshor bar bya ba'i phyir dal bus bags @220b kyis brdung bar bya'o // 'byed pa'i tshe yang drag tu mi dbye /
translated: He should strike it slowly and gently so that those inside can hear it.🔽When opening it, he should not open it suddenly.

original: gcod pa'i tshe yang drag tu mi gcod /
analyzed: gcod pa'i tshe yang drag tu mi gcod /
translated: When closing it, he should not close it suddenly.

original: shes bzhin du dal bus bags kyis 'jug cing 'byung bar bya /
analyzed: shes bzhin du dal bus bags kyis 'jug cing 'byung bar bya /
translated: One should enter and exit slowly and carefully, with full awareness.

original: sgo'i phyogs gnyi gar ma 'drud bzhin du 'byung bar bya ste /
analyzed: sgo'i phyogs gnyi gar ma 'drud bzhin du 'byung bar bya ste /
translated: One should not drag one’s feet when entering or exiting.

original: 'di ni sgo glegs kyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni sgo glegs kyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the activity of the door bolt.

original: 'khor lo'i bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'khor lo'i bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the activity of the wheel?

original: 'khor gtan zhes bya ba ni sgo'i gtan pa bla 'og ste /
analyzed: 'khor gtan zhes bya ba ni sgo'i gtan pa bla 'og ste /
translated: The wheel is the upper and lower door bolts.

original: de bzhin du 'byor par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'byor par bya'o //
translated: One should fasten them in the same way.

original: dge slong gtsug lag khang nas gud du 'dod na /
analyzed: dge slong gtsug lag khang nas gud du 'dod na /
translated: If a monk wishes to leave the monastery,

original: bla 'og gnyis ka bcug la 'gro bar bya ste /
analyzed: bla 'og gnyis ka bcug la 'gro bar bya ste /
translated: he should fasten both the upper and lower bolts and leave.

original: gtsug lag khang rung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gtsug lag khang rung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The monastery will be suitable.

original: gtsug lag khang rung ban bdag cag nyid dang / lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / mal cha dang / stan rnams kyang rung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gtsug lag khang rung ban bdag cag nyid dang / lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / mal cha dang / stan rnams kyang rung bar 'gyur te /
translated: The monastery, the begging bowl, the Dharma robes, the bedding, and the seat will be suitable.

original: 'di ni 'khor lo'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni 'khor lo'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the activity of the wheel.

original: gnas stong pa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: gnas stong pa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the activity of an empty dwelling?

original: dge slong gi gnas stong pa der chag chag gdab par bya /🔽sa phyag par bya /
analyzed: dge slong gi gnas stong pa der chag chag gdab par bya / sa phyag par bya /
translated: One should sprinkle water on the empty dwelling of a monk,🔽sweep it,

original: phyag dar dor bar bya /
analyzed: phyag dar dor bar bya /
translated: and remove the trash.

original: ci nus su ba lang gi lci bas zhal ba 'jam por bya /
analyzed: ci nus su ba lang gi lci bas zhal ba 'jam por bya /
translated: One should smooth the ground as much as possible with cow dung.

original: ral ba dang / grum pa dang / go gas pa rnams slar bcos par bya'o //
analyzed: ral ba dang / grum pa dang / go gas pa rnams slar bcos par bya'o //
translated: One should repair any cracks, holes, or gaps.

original: gal te snod rnams so so na 'jug par gyur na yang spyad du bzod na ni bkrus te gzhag par bya /
analyzed: gal te snod rnams so so na 'jug par gyur na yang spyad du bzod na ni bkrus te gzhag par bya /
translated: If the vessels are used separately, but can be used again, one should wash them and put them away.

original: mi bzod na ni dor bar bya /
analyzed: mi bzod na ni dor bar bya /
translated: If they cannot be used again, one should throw them away.

original: gal te rung bar byed pa yod na yang rtsva sngon po rnams bsrab par bya ;
analyzed: gal te rung bar byed pa yod na yang rtsva sngon po rnams bsrab par bya ;
translated: If there is someone who can repair them, one should cut the green grass.

original: re zhig khyim pa dag lhags na yang de dag la chos kyi gtam bya /
analyzed: re zhig khyim pa dag lhags na yang de dag la chos kyi gtam bya /
translated: If householders come, one should speak to them about the Dharma.

original: dge slong gis gnas stong par zhugs na yang yal bar 'dor bar mi bya /
analyzed: dge slong gis gnas stong par zhugs na yang yal bar 'dor bar mi bya /
translated: If a monk enters an empty house, he should not ignore it.

original: gal te der gnas par mi 'dod na des ga las 'gro ba brtag par bya /
analyzed: gal te der gnas par mi 'dod na des ga las 'gro ba brtag par bya /
translated: If he does not want to stay there, he should investigate where he will go.

original: 'gro ba'i nyen 'khor dang / bshang ba'i sa dang / gci ba'i sa dang / skas khang dang / them skas dang / sgo gcad pa dang / spyod yul rnams brtags la gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i nyen 'khor dang / bshang ba'i sa dang / gci ba'i sa dang / skas khang dang / them skas dang / sgo gcad pa dang / spyod yul rnams brtags la gnas par bya'o //
translated: He should investigate the dangers of the road, the place for defecating, the place for urinating, the staircase, the door locks, and the surroundings, and then stay there.

original: ji ltar de dag gi phyir 'brel pa dang / gnod par mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas stong pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar de dag gi phyir 'brel pa dang / gnod par mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas stong pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the activity of the elder who is the resident of an empty monastery.

original: gnas stong pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: gnas stong pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the activity of the elder who is the resident of an empty monastery?

original: gnas stong pa'i gnas brtan gyis bya ba de 'di lta bu la 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: gnas stong pa'i gnas brtan gyis bya ba de 'di lta bu la 'jug par bya'o //
translated: The elder who is the resident of an empty monastery should engage in the following activities.

original: gnas stong pa'i dge slong la gnas brtan gyis bzhin gyi mdangs gsal ba dang / khro gnyer med pa nas snga ma bzhin te /
analyzed: gnas stong pa'i dge slong la gnas brtan gyis bzhin gyi mdangs gsal ba dang / khro gnyer med pa nas snga ma bzhin te /
translated: The elder who is the resident of an empty monastery should have a clear complexion and be free of frowns, as explained above.

original: 'thab mo dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'gyed pa dang / rtsod pa rnams byung bar gyur pa gdul bar nan tan bya /
analyzed: 'thab mo dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'gyed pa dang / rtsod pa rnams byung bar gyur pa gdul bar nan tan bya /
translated: He should be diligent in subduing disputes, quarrels, conflicts, and arguments that arise.

original: zhi bar @221a * //🔽bya rnam par zhi bar bya ba'i bar du ste /
analyzed: zhi bar @221a * // bya rnam par zhi bar bya ba'i bar du ste /
translated: He should be peaceful,🔽and he should be completely peaceful.

original: 'di ni gnas stong pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gnas stong pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the activity of the elder who is the resident of an empty monastery.

original: lhung bzed kyi bya ba gang zhe na /🔽dge slong gis lhung bzed thal ba ma btsags pas bkru bar mi bya /
analyzed: lhung bzed kyi bya ba gang zhe na / dge slong gis lhung bzed thal ba ma btsags pas bkru bar mi bya /
translated: “What is the activity related to the alms bowl?🔽A monk should not wash his alms bowl with ashes that contain gravel.

original: lci ba gseg ma can gyis mi bkru /
analyzed: lci ba gseg ma can gyis mi bkru /
translated: He should not wash it with heavy, coarse ashes.

original: bye ma dang 'dres pa'i sas ma yin /
analyzed: bye ma dang 'dres pa'i sas ma yin /
translated: not with sand mixed with earth,🔽not with a lump of cow dung mixed with sand.

original: bye ma dang 'dres pa'i ba lang gi lci ba'i ri lus ma yin mod kyi sran phyes lhung bzed bkru bar bya'o //
analyzed: bye ma dang 'dres pa'i ba lang gi lci ba'i ri lus ma yin mod kyi sran phyes lhung bzed bkru bar bya'o //
translated: One should wash the begging bowl with cooked beans.

original: lhung bzed langs te bkru bar mi bya /
analyzed: lhung bzed langs te bkru bar mi bya /
translated: One should not wash the begging bowl while standing.

original: skam par mi bya /🔽snod du gzhug par mi bya /
analyzed: skam par mi bya / snod du gzhug par mi bya /
translated: One should not dry it.🔽One should not put it in a container.

original: sba bar mi bya /
analyzed: sba bar mi bya /
translated: One should not store it.

original: lam du 'gro bar ma yin /
analyzed: lam du 'gro bar ma yin /
translated: One should not carry it on the road.

original: chu rgal ba las ma yin /
analyzed: chu rgal ba las ma yin /
translated: One should not carry it across a river.

original: sa mi bde bar lhung bzed gzhag par mi bya /
analyzed: sa mi bde bar lhung bzed gzhag par mi bya /
translated: One should not place the begging bowl on uneven ground.

original: dge slong gis lhung bzed kyis gnas khang du chag chag gdab par mi bya /
analyzed: dge slong gis lhung bzed kyis gnas khang du chag chag gdab par mi bya /
translated: A monk should not sprinkle the dwelling place with the begging bowl.

original: phyag dar dor bar mi bya /
analyzed: phyag dar dor bar mi bya /
translated: He should not sweep it.

original: ba lang gi lci bas zhal zhal 'jam pos byug par mi bya /
analyzed: ba lang gi lci bas zhal zhal 'jam pos byug par mi bya /
translated: He should not anoint it with a smooth paste of cow dung.

original: lag pa bkru ba'i chu blang bar mi bya /
analyzed: lag pa bkru ba'i chu blang bar mi bya /
translated: He should not take water to wash his hands.

original: rkang pa bkru ba'i chu ma yin /🔽gdong bkru ba'i chu ma yin /
analyzed: rkang pa bkru ba'i chu ma yin / gdong bkru ba'i chu ma yin /
translated: It is not for washing the feet.🔽It is not for washing the face.

original: lus bkru ba'i chu ma yin //
analyzed: lus bkru ba'i chu ma yin //
translated: It is not for washing the body.

original: des chu'i bum pa dgang bar mi bya /
analyzed: des chu'i bum pa dgang bar mi bya /
translated: He should not fill the water pot with it.

original: dge slong gis lhung bzed bshang ba'i sar bskur bar mi bya /
analyzed: dge slong gis lhung bzed bshang ba'i sar bskur bar mi bya /
translated: A monk should not carry the begging bowl to the toilet.

original: gci ba'i sar ma yin //🔽bsro khang du ma yin //
analyzed: gci ba'i sar ma yin // bsro khang du ma yin //
translated: not in a place for defecating;🔽not in a sauna;

original: rkang pa bkru ba'i sar ma yin te /
analyzed: rkang pa bkru ba'i sar ma yin te /
translated: not in a place for washing the feet.

original: ci nas dge slong gis mi gtsang ba thams cad du bskur bar mi bya /
analyzed: ci nas dge slong gis mi gtsang ba thams cad du bskur bar mi bya /
translated: In no case should a monk throw any filth.

original: dge slong gis lhung bzed thogs bzhin du mchod rten la phyag mi bya /
analyzed: dge slong gis lhung bzed thogs bzhin du mchod rten la phyag mi bya /
translated: A monk should not pay homage to a stūpa while holding his alms bowl.

original: glan par rigs pa rnams la glan par bya /🔽gsher bzhin du gzhug par mi bya /
analyzed: glan par rigs pa rnams la glan par bya / gsher bzhin du gzhug par mi bya /
translated: He should give it to those who are suitable to receive it.🔽He should not insert it while wet.

original: shin tu skams par g-yel bar mi bya /
analyzed: shin tu skams par g-yel bar mi bya /
translated: He should not leave it out while very dry.

original: dal bus bags kyis shes bzhin du yongs su longs spyod par bya ste /
analyzed: dal bus bags kyis shes bzhin du yongs su longs spyod par bya ste /
translated: He should use it slowly, gradually, mindfully, and fully.

original: na ma chag pa'i mthar thug gi bar du bcang bar bya'o //
analyzed: na ma chag pa'i mthar thug gi bar du bcang bar bya'o //
translated: He should keep it until it is completely worn out.

original: dge slong gis lhung bzed mig bzhin du bsrung bar bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong gis lhung bzed mig bzhin du bsrung bar bya'o //
translated: A monk should guard his alms bowl as he would his eyes.

original: ci nas kyang phyin chad btsal mi dgos par bya ste /
analyzed: ci nas kyang phyin chad btsal mi dgos par bya ste /
translated: He should act in such a way that he will not need to search for another.

original: de ni lhung bzed kyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni lhung bzed kyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the proper conduct with regard to the alms bowl.

original: chos gos kyi bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: chos gos kyi bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the proper conduct with regard to the Dharma robes?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la chos gos gsum rjes su gnang ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la chos gos gsum rjes su gnang ste /
translated: The Blessed One allowed the monks three Dharma robes.

original: dregs pa'i phyir ma yin /
analyzed: dregs pa'i phyir ma yin /
translated: not for the sake of pride,

original: rgyags ba skyed pa'i phyir ma yin /🔽brgyan pa'i phyir ma yin /
analyzed: rgyags ba skyed pa'i phyir ma yin / brgyan pa'i phyir ma yin /
translated: not for the sake of generating arrogance,🔽not for the sake of adornment,

original: cha gzhag gi phyir ma yin gyi /
analyzed: cha gzhag gi phyir ma yin gyi /
translated: not for the sake of decoration.

original: de ni 'di ltar dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par spyod pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par spyod pa'i phyir te /
translated: It is for the sake of the comfort of the monks.

analyzed: de la snam sbyar yang snam sbyar gyi spyad pa bzhin spyad par bya'o // bla gos kyang bla gos kyi spyad pa bzhin spyad par bya'o //

analyzed: mthang gos kyang mthang gos kyi spyad pa bzhin spyad par bya'o //

analyzed: de la snam sbyar mi spyad pa ni 'di rnams yin te /

original: chos gos kyi las su ma yin /

analyzed: khrus mi bya / snam sbyar bgos nas rtsva'am shing ngam /

original: rkang pa bkru ba'i sar ma yin /
analyzed: rkang pa bkru ba'i sar ma yin /

original: de rgyun du bgo ste /
analyzed: de rgyun du bgo ste /

analyzed: zas la 'jug par bya ; skyo ma la 'jug par bya /

analyzed: thug pa la 'jug par bya'o // snam sbyar la 'dug par mi bya /

original: nyal bar mi bya ste /
analyzed: nyal bar mi bya ste /

original: 'di ni snam sbyar de lta bur mi spyod pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni snam sbyar de lta bur mi spyod pa'o //

analyzed: yang na steng du bgo bar bya /

original: phyag dar dor bar mi bya /
analyzed: phyag dar dor bar mi bya /

original: ba lang gi lci bas zhal zhal 'jam por byug par mi bya /🔽lhung bzed kyi las mi bya /
analyzed: ba lang gi lci bas zhal zhal 'jam por byug par mi bya / lhung bzed kyi las mi bya /

original: chos gos kyi las mi bya /
analyzed: chos gos kyi las mi bya /
translated: Do not do any work with the Dharma robes.

original: khrus mi bya'o //
analyzed: khrus mi bya'o //
translated: Do not wash.

original: bla gos @222a * //🔽bgos bzhin du rtsva'am /
analyzed: bla gos @222a * // bgos bzhin du rtsva'am /
translated: The upper robe

original: shing ngam / sa bskur bar mi bya /🔽bla gos bgos pas bshang ba'i sar 'jug par mi bya /🔽gci ba'i sar 'jug par mi bya /
analyzed: shing ngam / sa bskur bar mi bya / bla gos bgos pas bshang ba'i sar 'jug par mi bya / gci ba'i sar 'jug par mi bya /

analyzed: bsro khang du ma yin / rkang pa bkru ba'i sar ma yin /

original: rgyun du spyad cing bgo bar mi bya ste /

original: 'di ni bla gos te /
analyzed: 'di ni bla gos te /

original: 'di bla gos mi spyod pa'o //
analyzed: 'di bla gos mi spyod pa'o //

analyzed: bla gos 'di ltar spyad par bya ste /

original: gtsang ma'i ril ba dgang /
analyzed: gtsang ma'i ril ba dgang /

original: rkang pa bkru ba'i ra li ba dgang bar bya /
analyzed: rkang pa bkru ba'i ra li ba dgang bar bya /

original: snod bgo bar bya /
analyzed: snod bgo bar bya /

analyzed: gtsug lag khang skyong bya ba dang / gzhan yang rung ste / rung bar 'gyur ba thams cad la bla gos bgo'o //

original: mthang gos thams cad bgo ste /
analyzed: mthang gos thams cad bgo ste /

original: lus kyi mthang la yang bgo /
analyzed: lus kyi mthang la yang bgo /

analyzed: rtag tu yang bgo zhing spyad par bya'o //

analyzed: kha bsgyur bar 'os pa kha bsgyur bar bya //

analyzed: dge slong gis tshon chen po rnam pa lnga nyid bcang par mi bya ste /

original: lnga gang zhe na /
analyzed: lnga gang zhe na /

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /

analyzed: mthing shing dang / le brgan rtsi dang / rgya skyegs dang / gur kum dang / mtshal dang ngo //

original: mthang gos kyang med do //
analyzed: mthang gos kyang med do //

original: dge slong chos gos ngan nam /
analyzed: dge slong chos gos ngan nam /

analyzed: lnga'am bdun nam /

analyzed: dgu'am bcu gcig gam /

analyzed: bcu gsum mam lhag par yang rung ste de ltar dge slong gis snam sbyar spyad du yod do //

analyzed: bla gos spyad pa ni bla gos su spyad par bya /

analyzed: mthang gos su spyad pa ni mthang gos su spyad par bya ste /

analyzed: dge slong gis rang gi pags pa bzhin du chos gos bsrung bar bya'o //

analyzed: ci nas de phyi phyir btsal @222b mi dgos par bya ste /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la gding ba gnyis rjes su gnang ste /

analyzed: gding ba med par gzhan du gnas par mi bya /

original: dge slong gis gding ba la nan tan du bya /
analyzed: dge slong gis gding ba la nan tan du bya /

original: ci nas de phyi phyir btsal mi dgos par bya ste /
analyzed: ci nas de phyi phyir btsal mi dgos par bya ste /
translated: One should not have to look for it again and again.

original: 'di ni gding ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gding ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o //

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la khab rnam pa gnyis rjes su gnang ste /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la khab ral rjes su gnang ste /

analyzed: dge slong gis khab ral legs par gzhag par bya /

analyzed: bsnyems pa'i phyir ma yin /

analyzed: bza' ba'i phyir ma yin gyi / lus kyi rma @223a * //

analyzed: 'di ni bsod snyoms kyi bya ba zhes bya'o //

analyzed: khyim gyi sgor song nas khar gsil dkrol te /

original: dal bus bags kyis sgo la gtug par bya /

analyzed: mgron du bos na yang bdag gir bya ste /

analyzed: zas len pa'i dge slong gis dus tshod rig par byas la bsod snyoms blang ngo // shes par bya /
