analyzed: dran pa mngon du gzhag par bya / sems mi g-yeng bar bya / mi rnyog par bya /
translated: He should be mindful of it.🔽He should not be distracted.🔽He should not be agitated.

original: ma 'dres par bya /
analyzed: ma 'dres par bya /
translated: He should not be confused.

original: ci nas kyang mdzes shing dben par bya /
analyzed: ci nas kyang mdzes shing dben par bya /
translated: He should be beautiful and secluded.

original: ci nas kyang des mi gtsang ba'i 'bags pa dang / rings shing brtab pa'i tshul du mi bya /
analyzed: ci nas kyang des mi gtsang ba'i 'bags pa dang / rings shing brtab pa'i tshul du mi bya /
translated: He should not be defiled by impurities, nor should he be in a hurry or agitated.

original: gtsang zhing mdzes par bya /
analyzed: gtsang zhing mdzes par bya /
translated: He should be clean and beautiful.

original: rings shing 'dun pa ltar 'ong bar bya /
analyzed: rings shing 'dun pa ltar 'ong bar bya /
translated: He should come in a timely and orderly manner.

original: skabs su ma bab pa'i don gzhan mi gnyer /
analyzed: skabs su ma bab pa'i don gzhan mi gnyer /
translated: He should not pursue other matters that are not timely.

original: gtsug lag khang du song nas dge slong de la bzhin gyi mdangs gsal ba dang / khro gnyer med pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / mgu bar byas la zas blang ngo //
analyzed: gtsug lag khang du song nas dge slong de la bzhin gyi mdangs gsal ba dang / khro gnyer med pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / mgu bar byas la zas blang ngo //
translated: When he has gone to the monastery, he should receive the food from that monk with a clear face, without frowns, with pleasant words, and with a pleasing manner.

original: 'di ni zas len pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni zas len pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the activity of receiving food.

original: dgon pa pa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: dgon pa pa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What are the duties of the monk in the wilderness?

original: dgon pa'i dge slong gis bzhin gyi mdangs gsal ba dang / khro gnyer med par bya /
analyzed: dgon pa'i dge slong gis bzhin gyi mdangs gsal ba dang / khro gnyer med par bya /
translated: The monk in the wilderness should be cheerful and not frown.

original: dran pa mngon par gzhag par bya /
analyzed: dran pa mngon par gzhag par bya /
translated: He should be mindful.

original: thog mar snyan pa'i tshig gis tshur shog 'ongs pa legs so //
analyzed: thog mar snyan pa'i tshig gis tshur shog 'ongs pa legs so //
translated: First, he should greet them with pleasant words, saying, “Come here! Welcome!”

original: zhes tshig snyan pas bsu bar bya /
analyzed: zhes tshig snyan pas bsu bar bya /
translated: He should greet them with pleasant words.

original: khyed cag legs par gnas sa ma legs par bya ba byas sam zhes thog mar dri'o //
analyzed: khyed cag legs par gnas sa ma legs par bya ba byas sam zhes thog mar dri'o //
translated: “Are you all well? Are you doing well?”

original: dgon pa pa'i dge slong rnams kyis chu legs par bsros te gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: dgon pa pa'i dge slong rnams kyis chu legs par bsros te gzhag par bya'o //
translated: The monk in the wilderness should heat water well and set it aside.

original: chu snod kyang gzhag go //
analyzed: chu snod kyang gzhag go //
translated: He should also set out a water vessel.

original: zas kyang g-yos zos la zas kyi snod kyang gzhag go //
analyzed: zas kyang g-yos zos la zas kyi snod kyang gzhag go //
translated: He should also set out food and a vessel for food.

original: me yang gsos te gzhag go //🔽zhugs shing gsos te gzhag go //🔽mar me yang gsos te gzhag par bya /🔽mar me'i snod kyang gsos te gzhag go //
analyzed: me yang gsos te gzhag go // zhugs shing gsos te gzhag go // mar me yang gsos te gzhag par bya / mar me'i snod kyang gsos te gzhag go //
translated: He should also set out a fire and fuel.🔽He should also set out a lamp.🔽He should also set out a lamp vessel.

original: mar me'i snying po yang gsos te gzhag go //
analyzed: mar me'i snying po yang gsos te gzhag go //
translated: He should also set out lamp wicks.

original: mar dang / 'bru mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang / snad pa'i bcings pa yang bshams te gzhag go //🔽ko ba'i dum bu yang bshams te gzhag go //🔽rgyus pa dang / 'breng bu dang / snyung yang bshams te gzhag go //
analyzed: mar dang / 'bru mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang / snad pa'i bcings pa yang bshams te gzhag go // ko ba'i dum bu yang bshams te gzhag go // rgyus pa dang / 'breng bu dang / snyung yang bshams te gzhag go //
translated: He should also prepare and keep leather thongs.🔽He should also prepare and keep rope, cords, and bandages.

original: khab dang gri gu dang / skud pa dang / zas rnams kyang bshams te gzhag go //
analyzed: khab dang gri gu dang / skud pa dang / zas rnams kyang bshams te gzhag go //
translated: He should also prepare and keep needles, knives, thread, and food.

original: sman rnams kyang @225a * //
analyzed: sman rnams kyang @225a * //
translated: He should also keep medicines.

original: bcang do // lus brtan pa'i 'khar ba yang bcang ngo //
analyzed: bcang do // lus brtan pa'i 'khar ba yang bcang ngo //
translated: He should also keep a walking stick for support.

original: dgon pa'i dge slong gis me shel dang / chu shel gzhan la bstan par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dgon pa'i dge slong gis me shel dang / chu shel gzhan la bstan par mi bya'o //
translated: A monk in the wilderness should not show a fire glass or a water glass to others.

original: dgon pa'i dge slong gis khron pa'i rgyus shes par bya'o //
analyzed: dgon pa'i dge slong gis khron pa'i rgyus shes par bya'o //
translated: A monk in the wilderness should know the water-trough.

original: nye bar spyad pa la mkhas par bya /
analyzed: nye bar spyad pa la mkhas par bya /
translated: He should be skilled in the use of things.

original: mtshan mo la mkhas par bya ;
analyzed: mtshan mo la mkhas par bya ;
translated: He should be skilled in the night.

original: yul phyogs la mkhas par bya /
analyzed: yul phyogs la mkhas par bya /
translated: He should be skilled in the region.

original: dgon pa'i dge slong gis mdo sde la mkhas par bya /
analyzed: dgon pa'i dge slong gis mdo sde la mkhas par bya /
translated: A monk in the wilderness should be skilled in the sūtras.

original: 'dul ba la mkhas par bya /
analyzed: 'dul ba la mkhas par bya /
translated: He should be skilled in the Vinaya.

original: ma mo la mkhas par bya /
analyzed: ma mo la mkhas par bya /
translated: He should be skilled in the mātṛkā.

original: smra ba la mkhas pa dang / chos ston pa la mkhas pa dang / phung po la mkhas pa dang / khams la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par bya /
analyzed: smra ba la mkhas pa dang / chos ston pa la mkhas pa dang / phung po la mkhas pa dang / khams la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par bya /
translated: They should be skilled in teaching the Dharma, skilled in the aggregates, skilled in the elements, skilled in the sense spheres, skilled in dependent origination, and skilled in what is possible and impossible.

original: dgon pa pa'i dge slong rnams kyis chog shes par bya'o //
analyzed: dgon pa pa'i dge slong rnams kyis chog shes par bya'o //
translated: Monks who live in the wilderness should be content.

original: dus shes pa dang / tshod shes pa dang / bdag nyid shes pa dang / 'khor shes pa dang / gang zag shes pa dang / gang zag gi khyad par shes par bya /
analyzed: dus shes pa dang / tshod shes pa dang / bdag nyid shes pa dang / 'khor shes pa dang / gang zag shes pa dang / gang zag gi khyad par shes par bya /
translated: They should know the right time and the right occasion, they should know themselves, they should know their retinue, they should know individuals, and they should know the differences between individuals.

original: dgon pa pa'i dge slong rnams kyis dregs pa mi bskyed /
analyzed: dgon pa pa'i dge slong rnams kyis dregs pa mi bskyed /
translated: Monks who live in the wilderness should not be arrogant.

original: gcam bu mi bya /
analyzed: gcam bu mi bya /
translated: They should not be deceitful.

original: bkur stir bcas pa dang / dbang gzhan la rag las pa dang bcas pa dang / kha mi rgod pa dang / tshig brtan par bya /
analyzed: bkur stir bcas pa dang / dbang gzhan la rag las pa dang bcas pa dang / kha mi rgod pa dang / tshig brtan par bya /
translated: They should be respectful, dependent on others, not boastful, and steadfast.

original: ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod par bya /
analyzed: ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod par bya /
translated: They should be conscientious and have a sense of shame.

original: gtam mi mang ba dang / 'thab mor gyur pa rnams mi smra ba dang / brtson 'grus su bya /
analyzed: gtam mi mang ba dang / 'thab mor gyur pa rnams mi smra ba dang / brtson 'grus su bya /
translated: do not speak in quarrels, and be diligent.

original: le lor mi bya /
analyzed: le lor mi bya /
translated: Do not be lazy.

original: dran pa dang shes bzhin du spyod par bya /
analyzed: dran pa dang shes bzhin du spyod par bya /
translated: Act with mindfulness and vigilance.

original: dbang po dben par bya /
analyzed: dbang po dben par bya /
translated: Keep the senses restrained.

original: zas la tshod zin par bya /
analyzed: zas la tshod zin par bya /
translated: Eat in moderation.

original: bdag gir mi bya /
analyzed: bdag gir mi bya /
translated: Do not be possessive.

original: srod dang tho rangs kyi tshe rnal 'byor bya ba la nan tan du bya /
analyzed: srod dang tho rangs kyi tshe rnal 'byor bya ba la nan tan du bya /
translated: Be diligent in the practice of yoga in the evening and at dawn.

original: gnyid kyi bde ba dang / 'phres pa'i bde ba dang / nyal ba'i bde ba nyams su mi blang /
analyzed: gnyid kyi bde ba dang / 'phres pa'i bde ba dang / nyal ba'i bde ba nyams su mi blang /
translated: Do not indulge in the pleasures of sleep, sex, or lying down.

original: dus su spyod pa dang / dus ma yin par spyod pa shes par bya /
analyzed: dus su spyod pa dang / dus ma yin par spyod pa shes par bya /
translated: Know the proper time for action and the improper time for action.🔽Be skilled in sitting and lying down.🔽Do not disparage the senior monks, and do not disparage the junior monks.

original: stan la mkhas pa dang / 'dug pa la mkhas pa dang / dge slong gnas brtan rnams la mi smad pa dang / dge slong gsar bu rnams la'ang mi smad pa dang / dgon pa'i dge slong gis brtson 'grus g-yel bar mi bya /
analyzed: stan la mkhas pa dang / 'dug pa la mkhas pa dang / dge slong gnas brtan rnams la mi smad pa dang / dge slong gsar bu rnams la'ang mi smad pa dang / dgon pa'i dge slong gis brtson 'grus g-yel bar mi bya /
translated: The monks in the wilderness should not be lazy in their diligence.

original: ma thob thob par bya ba dang / ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba dang / mngon sum du ma byas pa rnams mngon sum du bya ba dang / dgon par gnas pa'i dge slong gis chos kyi dbyig gu dang / gdos bu dang / pho long gi @225b srod dang /🔽tho rangs la rnal 'byor bya'o //
analyzed: ma thob thob par bya ba dang / ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba dang / mngon sum du ma byas pa rnams mngon sum du bya ba dang / dgon par gnas pa'i dge slong gis chos kyi dbyig gu dang / gdos bu dang / pho long gi @225b srod dang / tho rangs la rnal 'byor bya'o //
translated: A monk who lives in the wilderness should practice yoga in the evening and at dawn, with the staff of the Dharma, the water pot, and the bowl.

original: dgon pa pa'i dge slong gis kun du spyod pa'i chos rnams bcas pa bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par ma byas na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dgon pa pa'i dge slong gis kun du spyod pa'i chos rnams bcas pa bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par ma byas na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
translated: If a monk who lives in the wilderness does not practice the rules of training in their entirety, he becomes guilty of an offense.

original: 'di ni dgon pa pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni dgon pa pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the practice of a monk who lives in the wilderness.

original: dgon pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na /🔽dgon pa'i dge slong gnas brtan gyis bya ba de 'di lta bu la 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: dgon pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na / dgon pa'i dge slong gnas brtan gyis bya ba de 'di lta bu la 'jug par bya'o //
translated: “What is the practice of a monk who lives in the wilderness and is an elder?🔽A monk who lives in the wilderness and is an elder should practice as follows.

original: dge slong gsar bu de na 'khod pa rnams kun shes par bya ba nas snga ma bzhin te /
analyzed: dge slong gsar bu de na 'khod pa rnams kun shes par bya ba nas snga ma bzhin te /
translated: He should make the new monks study and so on, as before.

original: thams cad du'ang dge slong gnas brtan gyis thog mar 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad du'ang dge slong gnas brtan gyis thog mar 'jug par bya'o //
translated: The elder monk should be the first to enter everywhere.

original: rgyud gtang bar mi bya ba'i bar du ste /🔽dgon pa na gnas pa'i bya ba rnams gzung bar bya /
analyzed: rgyud gtang bar mi bya ba'i bar du ste / dgon pa na gnas pa'i bya ba rnams gzung bar bya /
translated: He should not give up his lineage.🔽He should take up the duties of the wilderness dweller.

original: dgon pa'i bya ba rnams la gzung bar bya /
analyzed: dgon pa'i bya ba rnams la gzung bar bya /
translated: He should take up the duties of the wilderness dweller.

original: de dag gis kyang nges rjes su bstan pa'i tshig mnyan cing bsgrub par bya ste /
analyzed: de dag gis kyang nges rjes su bstan pa'i tshig mnyan cing bsgrub par bya ste /
translated: They should listen to the words of instruction and practice them.

original: 'di ni dgon pa'i gnas brtan gyis thog mar bya ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni dgon pa'i gnas brtan gyis thog mar bya ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is called the duties of the elder in the wilderness dwelling.

original: grong mtha'i bya ba gang zhe na /🔽grong 'dab kyi dge slong gis mdangs gsal bar bya ba nas snga ma bzhin te /
analyzed: grong mtha'i bya ba gang zhe na / grong 'dab kyi dge slong gis mdangs gsal bar bya ba nas snga ma bzhin te /
translated: “What are the duties of the elder in the village?

original: bde bar brgyus sam zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: bde bar brgyus sam zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: The elder monk in the village should be radiant, as before, up to ‘Are you comfortable?’🔽He should ask the newly arrived monks, ‘Welcome.

original: dge slong 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la bde bar 'ongs sam zhes dri bar bya //
analyzed: dge slong 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la bde bar 'ongs sam zhes dri bar bya //
translated: Are you comfortable?’

original: ji ltar rigs par ngal bso bar bya /
analyzed: ji ltar rigs par ngal bso bar bya /
translated: He should rest as is appropriate.

original: mal stan dag kyang ci lta bu yod pa sbyin par bya /
analyzed: mal stan dag kyang ci lta bu yod pa sbyin par bya /
translated: He should give them bedding as is available.

original: gal te snga dro lhags na ni kha zas ci 'byor pa bzhin du bgo zhing sbyin par bya /
analyzed: gal te snga dro lhags na ni kha zas ci 'byor pa bzhin du bgo zhing sbyin par bya /
translated: If it is windy in the morning, then the food should be distributed and given out according to what has been obtained.

original: des zas kyi 'og rol tu 'ongs na btung ba dang / bu ram dang / sha kha ra dang / hvags dang / ha se rnams ci 'byor pa sbyin zhing tshim par bya /
analyzed: des zas kyi 'og rol tu 'ongs na btung ba dang / bu ram dang / sha kha ra dang / hvags dang / ha se rnams ci 'byor pa sbyin zhing tshim par bya /
translated: If he arrives after the meal, then he should be satisfied with whatever drink, molasses, sugar, honey, and ghee are available.

original: nub mo mal stan yang bsgo zhing sbyin par bya /
analyzed: nub mo mal stan yang bsgo zhing sbyin par bya /
translated: At night, a bed and a seat should be assigned to him.

original: rkang pa bkru ba dang / rkang pa'i bkru ba sbyin par bya /
analyzed: rkang pa bkru ba dang / rkang pa'i bkru ba sbyin par bya /
translated: He should be given a foot-stool and a foot-washing vessel.

original: kun dga' ra ba nas phyir 'byung ba dang / nang du 'jug pa dang / nye 'khor dang bshang ba'i sa dang / gci ba'i sa dang / skas ka dang / them skas dang / bcad pa dang / dbye ba'i rnams so sor bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: kun dga' ra ba nas phyir 'byung ba dang / nang du 'jug pa dang / nye 'khor dang bshang ba'i sa dang / gci ba'i sa dang / skas ka dang / them skas dang / bcad pa dang / dbye ba'i rnams so sor bstan par bya'o //
translated: He should be shown the monastery’s boundaries, the toilet, the urinal, the stairs, the ladders, the places to be avoided, and the places to be divided.

original: dge 'dun gyis khrims su bya ba bcas pa rnams kyang bsgrag par bya'o //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis khrims su bya ba bcas pa rnams kyang bsgrag par bya'o //
translated: The rules of the saṅgha should be proclaimed to him.

original: gal te bsod snyoms pa zhig yin na yang spyod yul rnams rig par bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: gal te bsod snyoms pa zhig yin na yang spyod yul rnams rig par bstan par bya'o //
translated: If he is an alms-goer, the alms-rounds should be shown to him.

original: 'ongs pa la yang zas dang skom rnams sbyar bar bya /
analyzed: 'ongs pa la yang zas dang skom rnams sbyar bar bya /
translated: If they come, he should offer them food and drink.

original: gal te 'dug par gyur na de la dris te /🔽gnas par gyur na gnas khang dang khang pa brtsegs pa yang rung /
analyzed: gal te 'dug par gyur na de la dris te / gnas par gyur na gnas khang dang khang pa brtsegs pa yang rung /
translated: If they sit down, he should ask them questions.

original: dben pa rub pa gcig sbyin no //🔽gal te 'gro @226a * //
analyzed: dben pa rub pa gcig sbyin no // gal te 'gro @226a * //
translated: If they stay, he should give them a private room, a house, or a hut.

original: bar gyur na mgu bar byas la phyi bzhin du bskyal lo //
analyzed: bar gyur na mgu bar byas la phyi bzhin du bskyal lo //
translated: If they leave, he should be pleased and see them off.

original: gal te khyim pa lhags pa na yang grong mtha' pa'i dge slong gis mgu ba'i bzhin dang khro gnyer med par byas la mdun du bsu ste /
analyzed: gal te khyim pa lhags pa na yang grong mtha' pa'i dge slong gis mgu ba'i bzhin dang khro gnyer med par byas la mdun du bsu ste /
translated: If a layperson comes, the village monk should greet him with a smile and a pleasant face.

original: tshig snyan pa brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: tshig snyan pa brjod par bya'o //
translated: He should speak pleasantly to him.

original: gal te zas dang skom bgos na yang sbyin no ;
analyzed: gal te zas dang skom bgos na yang sbyin no ;
translated: If he offers food and drink, he should accept it.

original: / nyal na yang mal stan sbyin no //
analyzed: / nyal na yang mal stan sbyin no //
translated: If he offers a bed, he should accept it.

original: gal te chos nyan 'dod na des nus pa'i bdag nyid kyis chos kyi gtam bya'o //
analyzed: gal te chos nyan 'dod na des nus pa'i bdag nyid kyis chos kyi gtam bya'o //
translated: If he wants to listen to the Dharma, the monk should give a Dharma talk to the best of his ability.

original: gal te bdag nyid kyis mi nus na dge slong gzhan bsko ste chos kyi gtam bsgrag par bya'o //
analyzed: gal te bdag nyid kyis mi nus na dge slong gzhan bsko ste chos kyi gtam bsgrag par bya'o //
translated: If he is unable to do it himself, he should appoint another monk to give a Dharma talk.

original: grong mtha'i dge slong gis bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag la 'jug pa rnams dang / skyabs su 'gro ba rnams dang / bslab pa'i gzhi 'dzin du 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: grong mtha'i dge slong gis bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag la 'jug pa rnams dang / skyabs su 'gro ba rnams dang / bslab pa'i gzhi 'dzin du 'jug par bya'o //
translated: The village monk should give gifts to the brahmins and householders who have come and gathered, and he should make them enter into the giver and the master of the gifts, and he should make them enter into going for refuge and taking up the bases of training.

original: spos dang me tog dang dri dag kyang sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: spos dang me tog dang dri dag kyang sbyin par bya'o //
translated: He should also give them incense, flowers, and perfumes.

original: mchod rten la bskor ba dang / phyag 'tshal du gzhug go //
analyzed: mchod rten la bskor ba dang / phyag 'tshal du gzhug go //
translated: He should make them circumambulate the stūpa and prostrate.

original: ci nus kyis bslabs shing bstan nas btang bar bya ste /
analyzed: ci nus kyis bslabs shing bstan nas btang bar bya ste /
translated: He should send them away after teaching them as much as he can.

original: 'di ni grong mtha'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni grong mtha'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the activity of the village monk.

original: grong mtha'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: grong mtha'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the activity of the village elder monk?

original: grong mtha'i dge slong gnas brtan gyis bya ba de 'di lta bu la 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: grong mtha'i dge slong gnas brtan gyis bya ba de 'di lta bu la 'jug par bya'o //
translated: The village elder monk should engage in the following activities:

original: dge slong gsar bu de nas 'khod pa kun shes par bya ba ni snga ma bzhin te /
analyzed: dge slong gsar bu de nas 'khod pa kun shes par bya ba ni snga ma bzhin te /
translated: He should know all the new monks who have come and settled in, as before.

original: grong mtha'i dge slong gnas brtan gyis thams cad du yang thog mar 'jug par bya /
analyzed: grong mtha'i dge slong gnas brtan gyis thams cad du yang thog mar 'jug par bya /
translated: The elder monk from the outskirts of town should first enter everywhere.

original: rgyud mi gtang ba'i bar du ste /🔽grong mtha'i bya ba rnams la de dag gzud par bya /
analyzed: rgyud mi gtang ba'i bar du ste / grong mtha'i bya ba rnams la de dag gzud par bya /
translated: He should not abandon the continuity of the practice.🔽He should lead them in the activities of the outskirts of town.

original: grong mtha'i bya ba rnams gzhag par bya /
analyzed: grong mtha'i bya ba rnams gzhag par bya /
translated: He should stop the activities of the outskirts of town.

original: bya ba bzang po la gzud par bya /
analyzed: bya ba bzang po la gzud par bya /
translated: He should lead them in good activities.

original: 'di skad ces bsgo bar bya ste /

original: bya'o ; / glo bur du 'ongs pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: bya'o ; / glo bur du 'ongs pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: “The activity of the newly arrived” refers to the activity of the newly arrived elder who, after having gone for alms, having finished his meal, having put away his bowl and robes, and having sat down, should rest his body, refresh himself, and then meditate.🔽“The activity of the elder who has arrived unexpectedly” refers to the activity of the elder who has arrived unexpectedly.🔽He should inform the monks.

original: glo bur du lhags pa'i gnas brtan dge slong rnams rig par bya'o //🔽de dag la yang mdangs gsal bar bya'o //
analyzed: glo bur du lhags pa'i gnas brtan dge slong rnams rig par bya'o // de dag la yang mdangs gsal bar bya'o //
translated: He should be given a seat.

original: khro gnyer med par bya'o //
analyzed: khro gnyer med par bya'o //
translated: He should not frown.

original: tshig snyan pas dge slong rnams mgu bar bya'o //
analyzed: tshig snyan pas dge slong rnams mgu bar bya'o //
translated: He should please the monks with his words.

original: glo bur du lhags pa'i dge slong rnams kyi phyir gnas mal brnya bar bya /
analyzed: glo bur du lhags pa'i dge slong rnams kyi phyir gnas mal brnya bar bya /
translated: He should be given a bed and a seat for the newly arrived monk.

original: 'dug 'dug pa las 'gro ba rnam pa lngar bsgo bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'dug 'dug pa las 'gro ba rnam pa lngar bsgo bar bya ste /
translated: He should be given instructions on five topics:

original: gtsug lag khang 'di re /
analyzed: gtsug lag khang 'di re /
translated: “This is the temple.🔽Look at the temple.”

original: gtsug lag khang ltos shig ces bsgo ba dang / gnas mal 'di re /
analyzed: gtsug lag khang ltos shig ces bsgo ba dang / gnas mal 'di re /
translated: “This is the bed and the seat.

original: gnas mal ltos shig ces bya ba dang / lde mig 'di re zhes bsgo zhing gtad pa dang lnga ste /
analyzed: gnas mal ltos shig ces bya ba dang / lde mig 'di re zhes bsgo zhing gtad pa dang lnga ste /
translated: The elder should say, Look for a bed and seat, and give him the key.

original: 'di ni glo bur du 'ongs pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni glo bur du 'ongs pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the duties of the elder who has suddenly arrived.

original: 'gro bas bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'gro bas bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What are the duties of the departing monk?

original: 'gro ba'i dge slong des yul phyogs gang du dang / phyogs gang du 'gro ba de'i yul phyogs brtag par bya /
analyzed: 'gro ba'i dge slong des yul phyogs gang du dang / phyogs gang du 'gro ba de'i yul phyogs brtag par bya /
translated: The departing monk should examine the region and direction to which he is going.🔽He should ask the monks who have come from that region and direction,

original: de'i phyogs nas 'ongs pa'i dge slong rnams la gang der song na bar chad brgyad po dang las gang yang rung ba'i bar chad du 'gyur ba de med dam zhes 'dri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyogs nas 'ongs pa'i dge slong rnams la gang der song na bar chad brgyad po dang las gang yang rung ba'i bar chad du 'gyur ba de med dam zhes 'dri bar bya'o //
translated: whether there are any obstacles in that place, such as the eight dangers and other obstacles.

original: gang der song na bsod snyoms dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / bsnyen bkur byed pas brel bar mi 'gyur ram /
analyzed: gang der song na bsod snyoms dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / bsnyen bkur byed pas brel bar mi 'gyur ram /
translated: Will there be any trouble from begging for alms, or from illness, or from lack of service?

original: bdag la bsod snyoms dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / bsnyen bkur byed pas kyang rung brel cing ma rnyed par gyur na /
analyzed: bdag la bsod snyoms dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / bsnyen bkur byed pas kyang rung brel cing ma rnyed par gyur na /
translated: If I am troubled by begging for alms, or by illness, or by lack of service, and do not obtain them,

original: lus nyams shing dus las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ram /
analyzed: lus nyams shing dus las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ram /
translated: Will my body deteriorate and die?🔽If I go there, will I be happy in body and mind?

original: lus bde ba dang / sems bde ba dang / bdag der song na dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa /
analyzed: lus bde ba dang / sems bde ba dang / bdag der song na dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa /
translated: Will I be with monks who are ethical,

original: yon tan dang ldan pa /
analyzed: yon tan dang ldan pa /
translated: have good qualities,

original: des pa / dge ba'i chos can /
analyzed: des pa / dge ba'i chos can /
translated: are gentle, have virtuous qualities,

original: lta ba mtshungs pa /
analyzed: lta ba mtshungs pa /
translated: have similar views,

original: gnas pa mtshungs pa 'gyur ram /
analyzed: gnas pa mtshungs pa 'gyur ram /
translated: and live similarly?

original: bdag the tshom ma skyes par de dag skyed par byed dam /
analyzed: bdag the tshom ma skyes par de dag skyed par byed dam /
translated: Will I not give rise to doubts that have not yet arisen?

original: skyes pa rnams yang sel bar byed dam /🔽sdig pa'i lta ba ma skyes pa mi skyed par byed dam /
analyzed: skyes pa rnams yang sel bar byed dam / sdig pa'i lta ba ma skyes pa mi skyed par byed dam /
translated: Will I eliminate doubts that have already arisen?🔽Will I not give rise to nonvirtuous views that have not yet arisen?

original: skyes pa rnams slar zlog par byed dam /
analyzed: skyes pa rnams slar zlog par byed dam /
translated: Will I eliminate nonvirtuous views that have already arisen?

original: bdag tshe dang ldan pa de dag dang lus bde ba dang / sems bde bar 'gyur ram ;
analyzed: bdag tshe dang ldan pa de dag dang lus bde ba dang / sems bde bar 'gyur ram ;
translated: Will I be happy in body and mind with those elders?

original: bdag tshe dang ldan pa de dag dang lhan cig tu dge ba'i chos rnams 'phel bar 'gyur ram zhes dri bar bya ste /
analyzed: bdag tshe dang ldan pa de dag dang lhan cig tu dge ba'i chos rnams 'phel bar 'gyur ram zhes dri bar bya ste /
translated: Will I increase virtuous qualities with those elders?”

original: de ltar na yul phyogs brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar na yul phyogs brtag par bya'o //
translated: In this way, you should examine the region.

original: grogs rnams la yang brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: grogs rnams la yang brtag par bya ste /
translated: You should also examine your companions.

original: tshe dang ldan pa 'di dag tshul khrims dang ldan nam /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa 'di dag tshul khrims dang ldan nam /
translated: Are these venerable ones endowed with ethical conduct?

original: des pa dge ba'i chos can yin nam /
analyzed: des pa dge ba'i chos can yin nam /
translated: Are they gentle and virtuous?

original: @228b lta ba mtshungs sam /
analyzed: @228b lta ba mtshungs sam /
translated: Do they have similar views?

original: gnas pa mtshungs sam /
analyzed: gnas pa mtshungs sam /
translated: Do they have similar conduct?

original: gal te 'di ltar bdag the tshom ma skyes pa mi skyed par byed dam /
analyzed: gal te 'di ltar bdag the tshom ma skyes pa mi skyed par byed dam /
translated: If I do not give rise to doubts that have not yet arisen,

original: skyed pa rnams slar sel bar byed dam /
analyzed: skyed pa rnams slar sel bar byed dam /
translated: or if I eliminate those that have arisen,

original: sdig pa'i lta ba yang ma skyed pa mi skyed par byed dam skyes pa rnams yang slar zlog par byed dam /
analyzed: sdig pa'i lta ba yang ma skyed pa mi skyed par byed dam skyes pa rnams yang slar zlog par byed dam /
translated: and if I do not give rise to sinful views that have not yet arisen, or if I eliminate those that have arisen,

original: bdag tshe dang ldan pa de dag dang lhan cig lus dang sems bde bar 'gyur ram /
analyzed: bdag tshe dang ldan pa de dag dang lhan cig lus dang sems bde bar 'gyur ram /
translated: will I be happy in body and mind in the company of these venerable ones?

original: bdag tshe dang ldan pa de dag dang lhan cig tu dge ba'i chos rnams 'phel bar 'gyur ram /
analyzed: bdag tshe dang ldan pa de dag dang lhan cig tu dge ba'i chos rnams 'phel bar 'gyur ram /
translated: Will I increase virtuous qualities in the company of these venerable ones?

original: gal te tshe dang ldan pa 'di dag gis bdag lam du nad kyis btab na mi 'dor bar 'gyur ram snyam du grogs la brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: gal te tshe dang ldan pa 'di dag gis bdag lam du nad kyis btab na mi 'dor bar 'gyur ram snyam du grogs la brtag par bya ste /
translated: If I am stricken with illness on the road, will these venerable ones not abandon me?”

original: bdag lam der bar chad du 'gyur ba brgyad bo dag las gang yang rung ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur ram /
analyzed: bdag lam der bar chad du 'gyur ba brgyad bo dag las gang yang rung ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur ram /
translated: Will any of the eight obstacles arise on that path for me?

original: bdag lam der bsod snyoms dang / na pa'i gsos sman dang / bsnyen bkur byed pas brel bar mi 'gyur ram /
analyzed: bdag lam der bsod snyoms dang / na pa'i gsos sman dang / bsnyen bkur byed pas brel bar mi 'gyur ram /
translated: Will I be busy with alms, medicine for the sick, and service on that path?

original: gal te bsod snyoms dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa med na gnod cing /
analyzed: gal te bsod snyoms dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa med na gnod cing /
translated: If there is no alms, medicine for the sick, and service, will I be harmed?

original: dus las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ram /
analyzed: dus las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ram /
translated: Will I die before my time?

original: bdag lam der lus bde ba dang / sems bde bar 'gyur ram /
analyzed: bdag lam der lus bde ba dang / sems bde bar 'gyur ram /
translated: Will my body and mind be happy on that path?

original: bdag lam de na dge ba'i chos rnams 'phel bar 'gyur ram /
analyzed: bdag lam de na dge ba'i chos rnams 'phel bar 'gyur ram /
translated: Will my virtuous qualities increase on that path?

original: gal te brel bar mi 'gyur na 'gro bar bya'o //
analyzed: gal te brel bar mi 'gyur na 'gro bar bya'o //
translated: If I am not busy, I will go.

original: de lta bur yul phyogs dang / grogs dang lam rnams brtags nas /
analyzed: de lta bur yul phyogs dang / grogs dang lam rnams brtags nas /
translated: In this way, having examined the region, companions, and path,

original: gal te sngar 'gro'o snyam na des deng slob dbon dang mkhan po rnams la blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: gal te sngar 'gro'o snyam na des deng slob dbon dang mkhan po rnams la blta bar bya ste /
translated: if he thinks, “I will go first,” he should look at his preceptor and teacher,

original: bdag yul phyogs ni 'di lta bu grong khyer ni 'di lta bur mchi'o zhes zhus so //
analyzed: bdag yul phyogs ni 'di lta bu grong khyer ni 'di lta bur mchi'o zhes zhus so //
translated: and say, “I will go to such and such a region, to such and such a town.”

original: slob dpon dang mkhan pos kyang de'i yu la phyogs brtag par bya /
analyzed: slob dpon dang mkhan pos kyang de'i yu la phyogs brtag par bya /
translated: The preceptor and the master should also examine the direction in which he is going.

original: lam brtag par bya /
analyzed: lam brtag par bya /
translated: They should examine the road.

original: dge slong grogs rnams la brtag par bya ste ;
analyzed: dge slong grogs rnams la brtag par bya ste ;
translated: They should examine the monk friends.

original: 'di'i grogs po dge slong rnams ci 'dra /
analyzed: 'di'i grogs po dge slong rnams ci 'dra /
translated: What are the monk friends of this one like?

original: 'di'i 'khor ci 'dra /
analyzed: 'di'i 'khor ci 'dra /
translated: What is his retinue like?

original: 'di'i grogs po rjes su 'brang ba ci 'dra ba rnams brtags la /
analyzed: 'di'i grogs po rjes su 'brang ba ci 'dra ba rnams brtags la /
translated: What are his friends and followers like?

original: gal te mthun par gyur na zhu ba la yang lan sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: gal te mthun par gyur na zhu ba la yang lan sbyin par bya'o //
translated: If they are suitable, then he should be given permission to go.

original: mthun par ma gyur na sbyin par mi bya'o //
analyzed: mthun par ma gyur na sbyin par mi bya'o //
translated: If they are not suitable, then he should not be given permission.

original: 'gro ba'i dge slong gis ma zhus par 'gro na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i dge slong gis ma zhus par 'gro na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
translated: If the going forth monk goes without asking permission, he commits an offense.

original: gal te dge ba'i phyogs 'phel ba zhig tu gyur na slob dpon dang mkhan po yang nga bzhin du gnas pa ma yin na ma zhus par song na yang bla'o //
analyzed: gal te dge ba'i phyogs 'phel ba zhig tu gyur na slob dpon dang mkhan po yang nga bzhin du gnas pa ma yin na ma zhus par song na yang bla'o //
translated: If the virtuous side is increasing, then even if the preceptor and the master do not stay as they were told, it is all right if he goes without asking permission.

original: gnas gang du gnas pa'i gnas khang de chag chag gdab par bya /🔽phyag dar bya /
analyzed: gnas gang du gnas pa'i gnas khang de chag chag gdab par bya / phyag dar bya /
translated: The dwelling place where he is staying should be sprinkled with water.🔽It should be swept.

original: phyag dar dor bar bya /🔽ba @229a * //
analyzed: phyag dar dor bar bya /🔽ba @229a * //
translated: It should be swept clean.🔽It should be smeared.🔽It should be smeared with cow dung.

original: lang gi lci bas zhal zhal 'jam par byug par bya /
analyzed: lang gi lci bas zhal zhal 'jam par byug par bya /
translated: Rub it with a paste of ox bezoar.

original: nang par sngar rgyud chags gsum pa klog par bya /
analyzed: nang par sngar rgyud chags gsum pa klog par bya /
translated: In the morning, first read the third chapter of the sutra.

original: bklags nas sbyin pa'i yon tan brjod par bya /
analyzed: bklags nas sbyin pa'i yon tan brjod par bya /
translated: After reading it, speak of the virtues of generosity.

original: nang par langs nas gnas mal rnams ji ltar dgos pa de rnams bsgrangs te sprug par bya'o //
analyzed: nang par langs nas gnas mal rnams ji ltar dgos pa de rnams bsgrangs te sprug par bya'o //
translated: In the morning, having risen, arrange the bedding and seats as needed and shake them out.

original: de nas rtsig pa las sor bzhi tsam gyis spogs la bcer bzhag la /
analyzed: de nas rtsig pa las sor bzhi tsam gyis spogs la bcer bzhag la /
translated: Then, having moved them four fingerbreadths away from the wall,

original: sgo bcad de gnas gzer dang 'phred gtan bcug la de na gnas pa dang gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams la gtad de ltos shig ces bsgos la 'gro bar bya'o //
analyzed: sgo bcad de gnas gzer dang 'phred gtan bcug la de na gnas pa dang gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams la gtad de ltos shig ces bsgos la 'gro bar bya'o //
translated: close the door and put in a bolt and bar. Then, having entrusted them to the resident and resident-for-a-time monks, you should go, having told them, “Take care of them.”

original: gnas mal la sogs pa la ltos shig ces bsgo ba la lnga ste /
analyzed: gnas mal la sogs pa la ltos shig ces bsgo ba la lnga ste /
translated: There are five things in the instruction to take care of bedding and so forth:

original: gnas khang 'di re gnas khang 'di la ltos shig / gnas mal 'di re /
analyzed: gnas khang 'di re gnas khang 'di la ltos shig / gnas mal 'di re /
translated: “Take care of this dwelling place, take care of this dwelling place.”🔽“Take care of this bedding, take care of this bedding.”

original: gnas mal 'di rnams la ltos shig / lde mig gtad pa ni lnga pa yin no //
analyzed: gnas mal 'di rnams la ltos shig / lde mig gtad pa ni lnga pa yin no //
translated: “Take care of these bedding and seats.”🔽“Take care of this key.”

original: kun dga' ra ba'i phyi rol du byung nas dge slong grogs po rnams la brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: kun dga' ra ba'i phyi rol du byung nas dge slong grogs po rnams la brtag par bya ste /
translated: Having gone outside the monastery, he should examine the companions, the monks.

original: ring por ma son par su yi yang brjod cing lus pa med dam zhes phan tshun du dri'o //
analyzed: ring por ma son par su yi yang brjod cing lus pa med dam zhes phan tshun du dri'o //
translated: Not far away, he should ask each other, “Who has forgotten anything? Who has left anything behind?”

original: gal te brjed cing lus pa zhig yod na /
analyzed: gal te brjed cing lus pa zhig yod na /
translated: If something has been forgotten or left behind,

original: dge slong de slar bzlog la blangs te 'ongs kyi bar du ni bsdad par bya ba 'di ni 'gro ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong de slar bzlog la blangs te 'ongs kyi bar du ni bsdad par bya ba 'di ni 'gro ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: the monk should return and wait until the forgotten item is brought. This is called the duty of going.

original: 'gro ba'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'gro ba'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the duty of the senior monk who is going?

original: 'gro ba'i gnas brtan gyis sngar langs te /
analyzed: 'gro ba'i gnas brtan gyis sngar langs te /
translated: The senior monk who is going should rise first

original: 'dong ba'i dge slong rnams char gzhug go //
analyzed: 'dong ba'i dge slong rnams char gzhug go //
translated: and let the monks who are going enter.

original: de dag la tshe dang ldan pa rnams lhung bzed dang chos gos rnams legs par longs la khyer te 'dong ngo //
analyzed: de dag la tshe dang ldan pa rnams lhung bzed dang chos gos rnams legs par longs la khyer te 'dong ngo //
translated: He should say to them, “Venerables, take your bowls and robes and go.

original: sus kyang brjed par mi bya'o //
analyzed: sus kyang brjed par mi bya'o //
translated: No one should forget anything.”

original: 'dong ba'i dge slong rnams dong ba'i 'og tu dge slong gnas brtan nyid kyis de dag gis brjed pa lta yod dam med ces brtag par byas la thams cad kyi mjug tu 'gro bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dong ba'i dge slong rnams dong ba'i 'og tu dge slong gnas brtan nyid kyis de dag gis brjed pa lta yod dam med ces brtag par byas la thams cad kyi mjug tu 'gro bar bya'o //
translated: After the monks who are going have left, the senior monk should check whether they have forgotten anything. He should go last of all.

original: ring por ma son par de dag la /
analyzed: ring por ma son par de dag la /
translated: Before they have gone far, he should ask them,

original: la la'i cung zad ma lus sam zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: la la'i cung zad ma lus sam zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: ‘Has anyone left anything behind?’

original: dge slong gnas brtan gyis dge slong de thams cad la rjes su bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: dge slong gnas brtan gyis dge slong de thams cad la rjes su bstan par bya ste /
translated: The senior monk should instruct all the monks:

original: tshe dang ldan pa rnams las gang yang rung sngon du 'dong ste 'gro bar mi bya'o //🔽phyir nur te 'gro bar ma 'khod cig thams cad kyang lhan cig tu 'dus la phan tshun du bltas te /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rnams las gang yang rung sngon du 'dong ste 'gro bar mi bya'o // phyir nur te 'gro bar ma 'khod cig thams cad kyang lhan cig tu 'dus la phan tshun du bltas te /
translated: ‘None of you should go ahead.🔽Do not fall behind. All of you should go together, looking at one another.

original: rtog bzhin du 'dong bar bya'o //
analyzed: rtog bzhin du 'dong bar bya'o //
translated: Go while keeping an eye out.

original: dge slong gnas brtan gyis lam du zhugs pa'i tshe /
analyzed: dge slong gnas brtan gyis lam du zhugs pa'i tshe /
translated: When the senior monk has set out on the road,

original: bde ba dang ldan nam mi ldan pa rig par byas la bdag nyid kyis 'di dag la sngon du 'dor te 'dong ste yod dam med /
analyzed: bde ba dang ldan nam mi ldan pa rig par byas la bdag nyid kyis 'di dag la sngon du 'dor te 'dong ste yod dam med /
translated: Having understood whether they are happy or not, one should go ahead of them and ask, “Are you coming or not?

original: phyir @229b nur te lus pa lta yod dam med /🔽gal te sngon du 'dor te 'dong ba lta yod na ni de dgag par bya /
analyzed: phyir @229b nur te lus pa lta yod dam med / gal te sngon du 'dor te 'dong ba lta yod na ni de dgag par bya /
translated: Are you staying behind or not?”🔽If they are coming, one should stop them.

original: gal te phyir nur zhing lus pa zhig yod na de dag bskul zhing 'dod bar bya /
analyzed: gal te phyir nur zhing lus pa zhig yod na de dag bskul zhing 'dod bar bya /
translated: If some are staying behind, one should encourage them and make them come.

original: bdag nyid kyang dge slong rnams kyi dbus su zhugs la 'gro bar bya'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyang dge slong rnams kyi dbus su zhugs la 'gro bar bya'o //
translated: One should enter the midst of the monks and go with them.

original: gal te 'gro mi nus na bdag nyid kyi lhung bzed dang chos gos la sogs pa de dag la bgo zhing bskur bar bya /
analyzed: gal te 'gro mi nus na bdag nyid kyi lhung bzed dang chos gos la sogs pa de dag la bgo zhing bskur bar bya /
translated: If one is unable to go, one should divide and give one’s begging-bowl, Dharma robes, and so forth to them.

original: gal te 'gro mi nus pa zhig tu gyur na dge slong de dag gis dge slong de phrag pa'am /🔽khur du khyer te /
analyzed: gal te 'gro mi nus pa zhig tu gyur na dge slong de dag gis dge slong de phrag pa'am / khur du khyer te /
translated: If one is unable to go, those monks should carry that monk on their shoulders or back.

original: dgon pa de las phyung la grong 'dab tu phyin par gyur na /
analyzed: dgon pa de las phyung la grong 'dab tu phyin par gyur na /
translated: Having taken him out of the wilderness, they should go to a village.

original: dge slong de la nye gnas kyi dge slong de yang sbyin no nye gnas dge slong des kyang de'i zas dang sman gzhan las btsal bar bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong de la nye gnas kyi dge slong de yang sbyin no nye gnas dge slong des kyang de'i zas dang sman gzhan las btsal bar bya'o //
translated: The attendant monk should also be given a share of the alms. The attendant monk should also seek out food and medicine for him from others.

original: gal te lam de 'jigs pa dang bcas par gyur na rings shing myur bar 'dong ste /
analyzed: gal te lam de 'jigs pa dang bcas par gyur na rings shing myur bar 'dong ste /
translated: If the road is dangerous, they should go quickly and

original: de nas phyung ba dang ngal bso bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas phyung ba dang ngal bso bar bya'o //
translated: rest when they have left the danger behind.🔽If they are able, they should look for a place to stay,

original: gal te yang nus par gyur na gang nas chu 'gram mam /🔽nags mtha' 'am /
analyzed: gal te yang nus par gyur na gang nas chu 'gram mam / nags mtha' 'am /
translated: such as a riverbank,🔽a forest,

original: gsing ma sngon po'am /🔽sa phyogs gang dga' ba zhig tu brtags te /
analyzed: gsing ma sngon po'am / sa phyogs gang dga' ba zhig tu brtags te /
translated: or a grassy area.

original: dge slong rnams ngal bsor gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong rnams ngal bsor gzhug par bya'o //
translated: They should rest there.

original: ngal bsos nas yang 'dong bar bya ste /
analyzed: ngal bsos nas yang 'dong bar bya ste /
translated: After resting, they should continue on.

original: dge slong gnas brtan gyis de dag kun la /
analyzed: dge slong gnas brtan gyis de dag kun la /
translated: The senior monk should tell everyone:

original: kye thams cad kyis kyang 'dir sbyin pa'i yon tan re re brjod cig ces bsgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: kye thams cad kyis kyang 'dir sbyin pa'i yon tan re re brjod cig ces bsgo bar bya'o //
translated: ‘Please, everyone, recite the qualities of generosity here.’

original: de dge slong thams cad kyis sbyin pa'i yon tan gyi tshigs su bcad pa bklags zin pa dang / dge slong gnas brtan gyis mjug tu sbyin pa'i yon tan gyi tshigs su bcad pa bklags te /
analyzed: de dge slong thams cad kyis sbyin pa'i yon tan gyi tshigs su bcad pa bklags zin pa dang / dge slong gnas brtan gyis mjug tu sbyin pa'i yon tan gyi tshigs su bcad pa bklags te /
translated: After all the monks have recited the verses on the virtues of generosity, the most senior monk should recite the verses on the virtues of generosity at the end.

original: sa phyogs de logs su lan gnyis sam lan gsum du brtags te 'gro bar bya'o //
analyzed: sa phyogs de logs su lan gnyis sam lan gsum du brtags te 'gro bar bya'o //
translated: He should then examine the area twice or thrice and depart.

original: grong mthar phyin pa dang / de dge slong rnams kyi phyir gnas btsal bar bya'o //
analyzed: grong mthar phyin pa dang / de dge slong rnams kyi phyir gnas btsal bar bya'o //
translated: When he reaches the outskirts of the village, he should look for a place for the monks.

original: mal stan btsal bar bya'o //
analyzed: mal stan btsal bar bya'o //
translated: He should look for bedding.

original: yang na rtsva dang lo ma btsal lo //
analyzed: yang na rtsva dang lo ma btsal lo //
translated: He should look for grass or leaves.

original: gal te yang 'byor par gyur na rkang pa bkru ba dang / rkang pa bsku ba dang / tshogs pa'i btung ba dang / bu ram dang / hvags la sogs pa blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: gal te yang 'byor par gyur na rkang pa bkru ba dang / rkang pa bsku ba dang / tshogs pa'i btung ba dang / bu ram dang / hvags la sogs pa blang bar bya'o //
translated: If he is able, he should also bring water for washing the feet, oil for massaging the feet, drinking water, and molasses, sugar cane, and so on.

original: gci ba dang / bshang ba'i sa dang dris te brtags la mtshan mo gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: gci ba dang / bshang ba'i sa dang dris te brtags la mtshan mo gnas par bya'o //
translated: He should examine the area for defecating and urinating, and then stay there for the night.

original: khyim gyi lha rnams kyi phyir yang rgyud chags gsum pa dang / sbyin pa'i yon tan brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: khyim gyi lha rnams kyi phyir yang rgyud chags gsum pa dang / sbyin pa'i yon tan brjod par bya'o //
translated: For the sake of the household gods, he should also recite the third chapter of the scriptures and praise the virtues of generosity.

original: der gnas na yang /🔽dge slong gnas brtan gyis de ngag zan dang / thug pa dang / skyo ma rnams gtams shing btsal nas dge slong rnams la @230a * //
analyzed: der gnas na yang / dge slong gnas brtan gyis de ngag zan dang / thug pa dang / skyo ma rnams gtams shing btsal nas dge slong rnams la @230a * //
translated: Even if he is staying there,

original: bsnyod par bya /
analyzed: bsnyod par bya /
translated: the elder monk should fill the bowls with rice, soup, and vegetables and serve the monks.

original: de nas dge slong gsar bu rnams 'khod pa la smra bar bya /
analyzed: de nas dge slong gsar bu rnams 'khod pa la smra bar bya /
translated: Then, when the young monks are seated, he should speak to them.

original: yang dag par smra bar bya /🔽kun du shes par bya /
analyzed: yang dag par smra bar bya / kun du shes par bya /
translated: He should speak correctly.🔽He should make them understand.

original: rtog par bya /🔽stan par bya /
analyzed: rtog par bya / stan par bya /
translated: He should make them think.🔽He should teach them.

original: rjes su bstan par bya /
analyzed: rjes su bstan par bya /
translated: He should instruct them.

original: ci nas de dag dregs pa'am /
analyzed: ci nas de dag dregs pa'am /
translated: He should turn them away from pride,

original: mi rigs pa'am /
analyzed: mi rigs pa'am /
translated: from what is improper,

original: rtsed mo las bzlog par bya'o /
analyzed: rtsed mo las bzlog par bya'o /
translated: and from play.

original: 'gro ba'i dge slong gnas brtan gyis ji ltar kun du spyod pa'i chos bcas pa bzhin du mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'gro ba'i dge slong gnas brtan gyis ji ltar kun du spyod pa'i chos bcas pa bzhin du mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur te /
translated: If the elder monk who is traveling does not act in accordance with the rules of training, he commits an offense.

original: 'di ni 'gro ba'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni 'gro ba'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is explained as the duty of the elder monk who is traveling.

original: rkang pa bkru ba'i bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: rkang pa bkru ba'i bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the duty of washing the feet?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la rkang pa bkru ba rjes su gnang ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la rkang pa bkru ba rjes su gnang ste /
translated: The Blessed One allowed the monks to wash their feet.

original: dge slong dag gis snod stong par mthong nas bdag nyid kyis dgongs par bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong dag gis snod stong par mthong nas bdag nyid kyis dgongs par bya'o //
translated: When the monks saw that the foot-washing vessel was empty, they filled it themselves.

original: yang na dge slong gis kun dga' ra ba na gnas pa rnams la khod shig ces bsgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: yang na dge slong gis kun dga' ra ba na gnas pa rnams la khod shig ces bsgo bar bya'o //
translated: Or a monk should order those who live in the monastery to fill it.

original: rkang pa brku ba ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: rkang pa brku ba ni 'di yin te /
translated: This is the procedure for washing the feet:

original: dge slong rnams shes bzhin nang du zhugs la rkang pa bkru bar bya /
analyzed: dge slong rnams shes bzhin nang du zhugs la rkang pa bkru bar bya /
translated: The monks should enter the monastery mindfully and wash their feet.

original: dge slong gi rkang pa bkru ba'i sar yun ring du 'dug par mi bya /🔽snyoms par 'jug par mi bya /
analyzed: dge slong gi rkang pa bkru ba'i sar yun ring du 'dug par mi bya / snyoms par 'jug par mi bya /
translated: Monks should not stay long in the place where the feet are washed.🔽They should not enter into meditative absorption.

original: dran par mi bya /
analyzed: dran par mi bya /
translated: They should not be mindful.

original: 'dri bar mi bya /
analyzed: 'dri bar mi bya /
translated: They should not ask questions.

original: gtan la zhugs te 'dug par mi bya /
analyzed: gtan la zhugs te 'dug par mi bya /
translated: They should not sit down and engage in philosophical debate.

original: myur du rkang pa bkrus nas shes bzhin du slar 'byung bar bya ste /
analyzed: myur du rkang pa bkrus nas shes bzhin du slar 'byung bar bya ste /
translated: After quickly washing their feet, they should leave mindfully.

original: 'di ni rkang pa bkru ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rkang pa bkru ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the procedure for washing the feet.

original: rkang pa bkru ba'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: rkang pa bkru ba'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the procedure for the senior monk in the place where the feet are washed?

original: rkang pa bkru ba'i dge slong gnas brtan gyis dge slong rkang pa bkru ba la zhugs pa na /
analyzed: rkang pa bkru ba'i dge slong gnas brtan gyis dge slong rkang pa bkru ba la zhugs pa na /
translated: When the elder monk who is in charge of washing feet is washing the feet of a monk,

original: ma zin gyi bar du bslang zhing dbyung bar mi bya /
analyzed: ma zin gyi bar du bslang zhing dbyung bar mi bya /
translated: he should not get up or leave until the other monk’s feet are washed.

original: rkang pa bkru ba la zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rkang pa bkru ba la zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Washing the feet” means

original: khung du rkang pa chus gsher bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: khung du rkang pa chus gsher bar gyur pa'o //
translated: washing the feet in a basin.

original: gal te dge slong dag spyod lam mi mdzes par gyur tam /
analyzed: gal te dge slong dag spyod lam mi mdzes par gyur tam /
translated: If the monks are not sitting properly,

original: gtam la zhugs shing 'khod na dge slong gnas brtan gyis de dag la bzlog par bya'o //🔽lung 'bogs par bya /
analyzed: gtam la zhugs shing 'khod na dge slong gnas brtan gyis de dag la bzlog par bya'o // lung 'bogs par bya /
translated: or if they are talking, the elder monk should stop them.🔽He should give them instructions.

original: rjes su bstan par bya /
analyzed: rjes su bstan par bya /
translated: He should teach them.

original: spyod lam mdzes pa la gzud par bya /
analyzed: spyod lam mdzes pa la gzud par bya /
translated: He should make them sit properly.

original: ji skad du rkang pa bkru ba'i gnas brtan gyis kun du spyod pa'i chos rnams la gzud par bya ste di /
analyzed: ji skad du rkang pa bkru ba'i gnas brtan gyis kun du spyod pa'i chos rnams la gzud par bya ste di /
translated: As it says in the section on the elder monk who is in charge of washing feet,

original: 'di ni rkang pa bkru ba'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rkang pa bkru ba'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: “This is the proper conduct for the elder monk who is in charge of washing feet.”

original: 'dug pa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'dug pa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the proper conduct for the elder monk who is in charge of seats?

original: gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge slong dag gis tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang bco lnga la gcig tu 'dug ste /🔽sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'am /
analyzed: gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge slong dag gis tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang bco lnga la gcig tu 'dug ste / sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'am /
translated: fourteenth, and fifteenth days of each month.🔽They should recite the teachings of the Buddha

original: nyan thos kyis @230b bshad pa'i chos kyang rung ste /🔽smra bar bya'o //
analyzed: nyan thos kyis @230b bshad pa'i chos kyang rung ste / smra bar bya'o //
translated: or the teachings of the disciples.

original: de dag nang par sngar bsgo ba 'am /
analyzed: de dag nang par sngar bsgo ba 'am /
translated: In the morning, they should announce

original: gand'i brdung ma thag tu 'du bar bya se /🔽myur du 'das nas shes bzhin du 'khod par bya'o //
analyzed: gand'i brdung ma thag tu 'du bar bya se / myur du 'das nas shes bzhin du 'khod par bya'o //
translated: the time by striking the gandi.🔽They should quickly gather and sit down mindfully.

original: shes bzhin du 'khod nas dran pa nye bar gzhag par bya /
analyzed: shes bzhin du 'khod nas dran pa nye bar gzhag par bya /
translated: Having sat down mindfully, they should establish mindfulness.

original: sems rnams par mi g-yeng bar bya /
analyzed: sems rnams par mi g-yeng bar bya /
translated: They should not let their minds be distracted.

original: spyod lam mdzes shing phun sum tshogs pa bya /🔽shin tu bsdam par bya /
analyzed: spyod lam mdzes shing phun sum tshogs pa bya / shin tu bsdam par bya /
translated: They should have a beautiful and perfect deportment.🔽They should be very restrained.

original: shin tu dgag par bya /
analyzed: shin tu dgag par bya /
translated: They should be very controlled.

original: sgra dbyung bar mi bya /
analyzed: sgra dbyung bar mi bya /
translated: They should not make noise.

original: mig mi g-yeng ba dang / gnya' shing gang tsam du blta bar bya /
analyzed: mig mi g-yeng ba dang / gnya' shing gang tsam du blta bar bya /
translated: They should not look around. They should look ahead only the length of a yoke.

original: bkur sti dang bcas pa dang / bdag dman pa dang bcas pa dang / 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i dbang du gyur pa dang / yid dam na ba phyag dar ba lta bu'i sems su bya /
analyzed: bkur sti dang bcas pa dang / bdag dman pa dang bcas pa dang / 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i dbang du gyur pa dang / yid dam na ba phyag dar ba lta bu'i sems su bya /
translated: with respect, with a sense of inferiority, and with fear; and with a mind like a broom, which removes what is bad.

original: gnas brtan dang / bar ma dang gsar bu rnams la byams pa'i sems su bya /
analyzed: gnas brtan dang / bar ma dang gsar bu rnams la byams pa'i sems su bya /
translated: He should have a mind of love for the elders, the middle-aged, and the young.

original: pha dang / phu nu pa dang / bur 'du shes nye bar gzhag par bya /
analyzed: pha dang / phu nu pa dang / bur 'du shes nye bar gzhag par bya /
translated: He should be mindful of the thought that they are his father, brother, and son.

original: stan la 'dug pa la mkhas pa dang / 'dug nas yang phyi phyir zhing nges pa'i chos kyi gtam gyis mtshan mo nam zad par bya'o //
analyzed: stan la 'dug pa la mkhas pa dang / 'dug nas yang phyi phyir zhing nges pa'i chos kyi gtam gyis mtshan mo nam zad par bya'o //
translated: He should be skilled in sitting on his seat, and, having sat down, he should spend the night listening to the Dharma.

original: gal te mi bde na yang spyod lam gnyis kyis dus 'da' bar bya se /
analyzed: gal te mi bde na yang spyod lam gnyis kyis dus 'da' bar bya se /
translated: If he is not comfortable, he should spend his time in two postures.

original: 'chag pa'am 'greng bas so //
analyzed: 'chag pa'am 'greng bas so //
translated: Either he should walk or stand.

original: dge slong rnams 'dus nas 'khod na yang dus dus su chos mnyan par bya /
analyzed: dge slong rnams 'dus nas 'khod na yang dus dus su chos mnyan par bya /
translated: If the monks have gathered and are sitting, he should listen to the Dharma from time to time.

original: bkur sti dang bcas pas mnyan par bya /
analyzed: bkur sti dang bcas pas mnyan par bya /
translated: He should listen with respect.

original: smad par mi bya /
analyzed: smad par mi bya /
translated: He should not be contemptuous.

original: tshul bzhin du 'jug par bya /
analyzed: tshul bzhin du 'jug par bya /
translated: He should listen properly.

original: glags btsal bar mi bya /
analyzed: glags btsal bar mi bya /
translated: He should not look for faults.

original: chos la bkur sti mngon du gzhag par bya /
analyzed: chos la bkur sti mngon du gzhag par bya /
translated: One should manifest respect for the Dharma.

original: chos smra ba'i gang zag la'ang brnyas par mi bya /
analyzed: chos smra ba'i gang zag la'ang brnyas par mi bya /
translated: One should not despise the person who teaches the Dharma.

original: bdag nyid la smad par mi bya /
analyzed: bdag nyid la smad par mi bya /
translated: One should not despise oneself.

original: sems gcig tu thub pa dang dka' ba yin no zhes bya bar bsams pa dang / rna ba mi g-yengs pa dang / sems gus pa dang / sems thams cad gcig tu bsdus la chos mnyan par bya'o //
analyzed: sems gcig tu thub pa dang dka' ba yin no zhes bya bar bsams pa dang / rna ba mi g-yengs pa dang / sems gus pa dang / sems thams cad gcig tu bsdus la chos mnyan par bya'o //
translated: One should listen to the Dharma with a one-pointed mind, thinking, “The Muni is difficult to find,” without distraction, with respect, and with all one’s mind.

original: de'i 'og tu lha rnams dang / rgyal po dang / sbyin bdag dang / sbyin pa po rnams kyi phyir /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu lha rnams dang / rgyal po dang / sbyin bdag dang / sbyin pa po rnams kyi phyir /
translated: After that, for the sake of the gods, kings, donors, and benefactors,

original: sbyin pa'i yon tan gyi tshigs su bcad pa gdon par bya ste /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i yon tan gyi tshigs su bcad pa gdon par bya ste /
translated: one should recite verses on the qualities of generosity.

original: 'di ni 'dug pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni 'dug pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the duties while sitting.

original: 'dug pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na ;
analyzed: 'dug pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na ;
translated: What are the duties of the senior monk while sitting?

original: dge slong ngas brtan gyis sngar bsgo ba'am /
analyzed: dge slong ngas brtan gyis sngar bsgo ba'am /
translated: The senior monk should go first,

original: gand'i brdungs kyang rung ste /
analyzed: gand'i brdungs kyang rung ste /
translated: even if he is told to go later,🔽or if the gavel has been struck.

original: thog mar 'gro bar bya /🔽thogs mar 'greng bar bya /
analyzed: thog mar 'gro bar bya / thogs mar 'greng bar bya /
translated: He should go first,🔽stand first,

original: thog mar 'dug par bya /
analyzed: thog mar 'dug par bya /
translated: and sit first.

original: 'dug nas kyang skad cig mi smra bar bya /
analyzed: 'dug nas kyang skad cig mi smra bar bya /
translated: Having sat down, one should not speak for a moment.

original: de nas bdag nyid kyis chos smra bar bya /
analyzed: de nas bdag nyid kyis chos smra bar bya /
translated: Then one should oneself expound the Dharma.

original: yang na nus pa'i dge slong la chos smras shig ces @231a * //
analyzed: yang na nus pa'i dge slong la chos smras shig ces @231a * //
translated: Or one should request a monk who is able to expound the Dharma.

original: gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
translated: One should make a request.

original: bdag nyid kyis chos ma smras sam /
analyzed: bdag nyid kyis chos ma smras sam /
translated: If one does not oneself expound the Dharma,

original: dge slong nus pa yang gsol ba ma btab na 'gal chabs can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dge slong nus pa yang gsol ba ma btab na 'gal chabs can du 'gyur ro //
translated: or if one does not request a monk who is able, one commits an offense.

original: gal te 'khod pa la yang bram ze dang / khyim bdag dag lhags na /
analyzed: gal te 'khod pa la yang bram ze dang / khyim bdag dag lhags na /
translated: If brahmins and householders come while the assembly is seated,

original: des de dag la yang chos dang ldan pa'i gtam bya'o //
analyzed: des de dag la yang chos dang ldan pa'i gtam bya'o //
translated: one should also give them a Dharma talk.

original: gal te gzhan mu stegs can kun du rgyu glags tshol lam /
analyzed: gal te gzhan mu stegs can kun du rgyu glags tshol lam /
translated: If non-Buddhist ascetics come seeking an opportunity

original: klan ka tshol zhing lhags na /
analyzed: klan ka tshol zhing lhags na /
translated: or seeking to find fault,

original: de dag la yang chos kyis brgal ba la 'jug par bya /
analyzed: de dag la yang chos kyis brgal ba la 'jug par bya /
translated: one should engage them in a Dharma debate.

original: 'di ni mi 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni mi 'dra ba'o //
translated: This is not similar.🔽This is not established.

original: 'di ni ma grub pa'o zhes rigs pa'i chos kyis 'dul bar bya /🔽khro ba mi bskyed par bya /🔽mi khro bar bya /
analyzed: 'di ni ma grub pa'o zhes rigs pa'i chos kyis 'dul bar bya / khro ba mi bskyed par bya / mi khro bar bya /
translated: One should refute them with the Dharma of reasoning.🔽One should not give rise to anger.🔽One should not be angry.

original: mi smod par bya ste /
analyzed: mi smod par bya ste /
translated: One should not criticize.

original: 'di ni 'dug pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni 'dug pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the duties of the elder who is seated.

original: chos 'chad pa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: chos 'chad pa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the duty of teaching the Dharma?

original: chos 'chad pa'i dge slong gis gus pa dang / bcas pa dang / sems dma' ba dang bcas pa dang / 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i dbang du gyur pas gnas pa dang / yid dman zhing phyag dar ba lta bu'i sems su bya ste /
analyzed: chos 'chad pa'i dge slong gis gus pa dang / bcas pa dang / sems dma' ba dang bcas pa dang / 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i dbang du gyur pas gnas pa dang / yid dman zhing phyag dar ba lta bu'i sems su bya ste /
translated: The monk who teaches the Dharma should be respectful, humble, fearful, and conscientious.

original: 'khor gyi nang du zhugs te /
analyzed: 'khor gyi nang du zhugs te /
translated: He should enter the assembly

original: chos bshad par bya ba ni rigs pa dang grol ba'i tshig dang / ma 'khrul pa'i tshig dang / ma 'dres pa dang / 'brel pa dang / ma 'khrugs pa dang / sems mi g-yeng ba dang / zang zing gi sems su ma yin pa dang /
analyzed: chos bshad par bya ba ni rigs pa dang grol ba'i tshig dang / ma 'khrul pa'i tshig dang / ma 'dres pa dang / 'brel pa dang / ma 'khrugs pa dang / sems mi g-yeng ba dang / zang zing gi sems su ma yin pa dang /
translated: and teach the Dharma with words that are correct, liberated, unconfused, unmixed, connected, not agitated, with a mind that is not distracted, and with a mind that is not attached to material things.

original: chos nyid la yang bkur sti mngon du bya /
analyzed: chos nyid la yang bkur sti mngon du bya /
translated: He should also show respect for the Dharma itself.

original: chos nyan pa'i dge slong rnams la yang bkur sti mngon du bya /
analyzed: chos nyan pa'i dge slong rnams la yang bkur sti mngon du bya /
translated: He should also show respect for the monks who listen to the Dharma.

original: chos la brnyas par mi bya /
analyzed: chos la brnyas par mi bya /
translated: He should not despise the Dharma.

original: chos mnyan pa rnams la yang brnyas par mi bya /
analyzed: chos mnyan pa rnams la yang brnyas par mi bya /
translated: He should also not despise those who listen to the Dharma.

original: bdag nyid kyang smad par mi bya /
analyzed: bdag nyid kyang smad par mi bya /
translated: One should not disparage oneself.

original: chos rnams la yang chos nyid rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin par rtogs par bya ste /
analyzed: chos rnams la yang chos nyid rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin par rtogs par bya ste /
translated: One should understand that all phenomena are dependently arisen.

original: bya ba'i tshul du rjes su brtse ba dang / chos 'di yun ring du gnas par 'gyur bar bya'o //
analyzed: bya ba'i tshul du rjes su brtse ba dang / chos 'di yun ring du gnas par 'gyur bar bya'o //
translated: One should teach the Dharma with a mind of love, and one should do so in a way that will cause the Dharma to remain for a long time.

original: chos nyid la brten gyis zang zing la brten te chos bshad par mi bya /
analyzed: chos nyid la brten gyis zang zing la brten te chos bshad par mi bya /
translated: One should teach the Dharma based on the Dharma, not based on material things.

original: 'di ltar 'chad pa'i dge slong gis dus su chos bshad par bya /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'chad pa'i dge slong gis dus su chos bshad par bya /
translated: The monk who is teaching the Dharma should teach the Dharma at the appropriate time.🔽He should teach the Dharma with a mind of love and compassion, not with a mind of desire for material things.

original: bkur sti thog mar bya rjes su mthun pa dang / rjes su 'byor par bya /🔽rims su bya /
analyzed: bkur sti thog mar bya rjes su mthun pa dang / rjes su 'byor par bya / rims su bya /
translated: He should teach the Dharma with a mind that is respectful, not with a mind that is disrespectful.🔽He should teach the Dharma with a mind that is not agitated, not with a mind that is agitated.🔽He should teach the Dharma with a mind that is loving, compassionate, sympathetic, and tender, not with a mind that is not loving.

original: mgu ba dang / dad pa dang ; rangs pa dang / spro ba dang / mos pa dang / rigs par ldan pa dang / ma 'khrugs pas chos bstan par bya ji ltar 'khor rnams la byams pa'i sems dang / rjes su brtse ba'i sems su gnas par bya /🔽rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang / grags pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mgu ba dang / dad pa dang ; rangs pa dang / spro ba dang / mos pa dang / rigs par ldan pa dang / ma 'khrugs pas chos bstan par bya ji ltar 'khor rnams la byams pa'i sems dang / rjes su brtse ba'i sems su gnas par bya /🔽rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang / grags pas ni ma yin no //
translated: He should teach the Dharma with a mind that is not attached to material things, not with a mind that is attached to material things.

original: chos 'chad pa'i tshe @231b bdag nyid la bstod par yang mi bya /
analyzed: chos 'chad pa'i tshe @231b bdag nyid la bstod par yang mi bya /
translated: When teaching the Dharma, one should not praise oneself

original: gzhan la smod par yang mi bya ste /
analyzed: gzhan la smod par yang mi bya ste /
translated: or disparage others.

original: 'di ni chos 'chad pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni chos 'chad pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the activity of teaching the Dharma.

original: chos 'chad pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: chos 'chad pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the activity of the elder who teaches the Dharma?

original: chos 'chad pa'i dge slong gnas brtan gyis gang na chos 'chad pa der 'gro bar bya'o //
analyzed: chos 'chad pa'i dge slong gnas brtan gyis gang na chos 'chad pa der 'gro bar bya'o //
translated: The elder monk who teaches the Dharma should go to the place where the Dharma is being taught.

original: dge slong 'di chos bzhin du 'chad dam 'on te chos bzhin ma yin par 'chad mnyan la /
analyzed: dge slong 'di chos bzhin du 'chad dam 'on te chos bzhin ma yin par 'chad mnyan la /
translated: He should listen to whether this monk teaches the Dharma in accordance with the Dharma or not.

original: gal te chos bzhin du 'chad na ni spro ba bskyed par bya /
analyzed: gal te chos bzhin du 'chad na ni spro ba bskyed par bya /
translated: If he teaches in accordance with the Dharma, he should encourage him.

original: chos bzhin ma yin par 'chad na ni slar bcos par bya /
analyzed: chos bzhin ma yin par 'chad na ni slar bcos par bya /
translated: If he teaches not in accordance with the Dharma, he should correct him.

original: gal te slar bcos nus na ni de lta na legs /
analyzed: gal te slar bcos nus na ni de lta na legs /
translated: If he is able to correct him, that is good.

original: gal te slar 'chos mi nus na ci btub kyis smad par bya ste /
analyzed: gal te slar 'chos mi nus na ci btub kyis smad par bya ste /
translated: If he is not able to correct him, he should criticize him as much as he can.

original: dge slong 'di ni chos ma yin /
analyzed: dge slong 'di ni chos ma yin /
translated: He should say, “This monk does not teach the Dharma,

original: 'dul ba ma yin ston pa'i bstan pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'dul ba ma yin ston pa'i bstan pa ma yin gyi /
translated: he does not teach the Vinaya, he does not teach the Teacher’s teachings.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi gzhi ma bshig cig / chos kyi spyan ma bzhar cig ces smra la langs te 'gro bar bya ba 'di ni chos 'chad pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi gzhi ma bshig cig / chos kyi spyan ma bzhar cig ces smra la langs te 'gro bar bya ba 'di ni chos 'chad pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Do not cut off the eye of the doctrine! and then rise and leave. This is called the elder's duty in the place of teaching the doctrine.

original: dus kyi bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: dus kyi bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the duty with regard to time?

original: dge slong rnams dus su 'gro bar bya ste /
analyzed: dge slong rnams dus su 'gro bar bya ste /
translated: Monks should go at the proper time.

original: 'di ni dus kyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni dus kyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the duty with regard to time.

original: dus ma yin pa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: dus ma yin pa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the duty with regard to improper time?

original: dge slong gis dus ma yin par grong du 'jug par mi bya /
analyzed: dge slong gis dus ma yin par grong du 'jug par mi bya /
translated: A monk should not enter a village at the improper time.

original: de 'dra ba'i rkyen byung ba ma gtogs te /
analyzed: de 'dra ba'i rkyen byung ba ma gtogs te /
translated: Except in the case of necessity,

original: 'khod pa'i dge slong la ma bsko bar mi 'gro ba 'di ni /
analyzed: 'khod pa'i dge slong la ma bsko bar mi 'gro ba 'di ni /
translated: he should not go to the house of a monk who is not his attendant without being accompanied by another monk.

original: dus ma yin pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dus ma yin pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the duty with regard to improper time.

original: dus ma yin pa'i dge 'dun 'du ba'i bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: dus ma yin pa'i dge 'dun 'du ba'i bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the duty with regard to the improper time for the assembly of the community?

original: tshes brgyad dang / tshes bcu bzhi dang / tshes bco lnga la dge 'dun 'du ba ma gtogs par de las gzhan gyi phyir dge 'dun 'du ba dang / dge 'dun gyi las dang / dge 'dun gyi bya ba dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa rnams yin te /
analyzed: tshes brgyad dang / tshes bcu bzhi dang / tshes bco lnga la dge 'dun 'du ba ma gtogs par de las gzhan gyi phyir dge 'dun 'du ba dang / dge 'dun gyi las dang / dge 'dun gyi bya ba dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa rnams yin te /
translated: except on the eighth, fourteenth, and fifteenth days of the month, when the Saṅgha gathers, and on other occasions when the Saṅgha gathers, and on the occasions of the Saṅgha’s actions, the Saṅgha’s activities, and the Saṅgha’s business.

original: de la sngar bsgo ba'am /
analyzed: de la sngar bsgo ba'am /
translated: In that case, whether the announcement has been made beforehand

original: gand'i brdungs kyang rung myur du 'du bar bya /
analyzed: gand'i brdungs kyang rung myur du 'du bar bya /
translated: or the gavel has been struck, one should quickly gather.

original: shes bzhin du 'dong bar bya ba nas snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: shes bzhin du 'dong bar bya ba nas snga ma bzhin no //
translated: One should go there mindfully, as before.

original: 'dug pa la mkhas par bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: 'dug pa la mkhas par bya ba'i bar du'o //

original: der dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis rgan rims su phyag bya ba nas /
analyzed: der dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis rgan rims su phyag bya ba nas /
translated: There, the most senior monk in the Saṅgha should bow to the most junior monk,

analyzed: bdag gi stan gang na bar 'dug par bya /

original: gnas brtan gnyis pas kyang dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan la phyag byas nas rang gi stan la 'dug par bya /
analyzed: gnas brtan gnyis pas kyang dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan la phyag byas nas rang gi stan la 'dug par bya /
translated: The second most senior monk should bow to the most senior monk in the Saṅgha and then sit down on his seat.

original: de bzhin du gnas brtan gsum pa dang / bzhi pa nas dge 'dun gyi gsar bu'i bar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du gnas brtan gsum pa dang / bzhi pa nas dge 'dun gyi gsar bu'i bar te /
translated: In the same way, the third most senior monk, the fourth most senior monk, and so on, up to the most junior monk in the Saṅgha,

original: rgan rims su phyag byas nas /
analyzed: rgan rims su phyag byas nas /
translated: should bow to the most senior monk,🔽and then sit down on the seat that is his.

original: rang gi stan gang na ba der 'khod par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi stan gang na ba der 'khod par bya'o //
translated: They should sit down on their own seats.

original: der dge slong gnas brtan dang / bar @232a * //
analyzed: der dge slong gnas brtan dang / bar @232a * //
translated: There, the senior,

analyzed: ma dang ; gsar bu rnams kyis chos ji lta bu dang / ston pa'i bstan pa ji lta bur dge 'dun gyi las bya /
translated: middle, and junior monks should perform the Saṅgha’s business in accordance with the Dharma and in accordance with the Teacher’s instructions.

original: dge slong gnas brtan gyis dge slong rnams la sbyo bar mi bya /
analyzed: dge slong gnas brtan gyis dge slong rnams la sbyo bar mi bya /
translated: The senior monk should not befriend the monks,

original: smod par mi bya /
analyzed: smod par mi bya /
translated: should not criticize them,🔽and should not disrespect them.
