analyzed: ma gus par mi bya ba ni 'di ni dus ma yin par dge 'dun 'du ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the business of assembling the Saṅgha at the wrong time.

original: dus ma yin par dge 'dun 'du ba'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: dus ma yin par dge 'dun 'du ba'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the business of the senior monk in the business of assembling the Saṅgha at the wrong time?

original: dus ma yin par dge 'dun 'du ba'i dge slong gnas brtan gyis dus ma yin par dge 'dun 'du ba na /🔽sngar bsgo ba'am gand'i brdungs kyang rung ste /
analyzed: dus ma yin par dge 'dun 'du ba'i dge slong gnas brtan gyis dus ma yin par dge 'dun 'du ba na / sngar bsgo ba'am gand'i brdungs kyang rung ste /
translated: When the Saṅgha is assembling at the wrong time, the senior monk in the business of assembling the Saṅgha at the wrong time🔽should go first,

original: thog mar 'gro bar bya /🔽thog mar 'greng bar bya /
analyzed: thog mar 'gro bar bya / thog mar 'greng bar bya /

original: thog mar 'dug par bya ste /
analyzed: thog mar 'dug par bya ste /

original: bkur stir bcas pa dang / sems dman pa dang bcas pa dang / 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i dbang du gyur pa dang / yid phab la phyag dar ba lta bu'i sems su bcas la /
analyzed: bkur stir bcas pa dang / sems dman pa dang bcas pa dang / 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i dbang du gyur pa dang / yid phab la phyag dar ba lta bu'i sems su bcas la /

original: dge 'dun gyi nang du 'gro bar bya rgan rims su phyag byas nas rang gi stan gang na bar 'dug par bya gnas brtan dang bar ma dang / gsar bu rnams la yang byams pa'i sems su bya /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi nang du 'gro bar bya rgan rims su phyag byas nas rang gi stan gang na bar 'dug par bya gnas brtan dang bar ma dang / gsar bu rnams la yang byams pa'i sems su bya /
translated: He should go to his own seat in the order of seniority, and he should have a mind of love for the elders, the middle monks, and the new monks.

original: phan pa'i sems su bya /
analyzed: phan pa'i sems su bya /
translated: He should have a mind of benefit.

original: rjes su brtse ba'i sems su bya /
analyzed: rjes su brtse ba'i sems su bya /
translated: He should have a mind of compassion.

original: pha ma dang / phu nu po dang / bur 'du shes pa mngon du gzhag par bya /
analyzed: pha ma dang / phu nu po dang / bur 'du shes pa mngon du gzhag par bya /
translated: He should manifest the perception of the community as his parents, brothers, and sons.

original: 'khor rnams la yar blta bar bya ste /🔽gang cha lugs sdug / gang cha lugs mi sdug / gang mdzes bar gyur /🔽gang gis legs par bgos /
analyzed: 'khor rnams la yar blta bar bya ste / gang cha lugs sdug / gang cha lugs mi sdug / gang mdzes bar gyur / gang gis legs par bgos /
translated: He should look up to the community.🔽He should think, “Who has a good appearance? Who has a bad appearance? Who is beautiful?🔽Who is well dressed?

original: gang gis mi sdug par bgos /
analyzed: gang gis mi sdug par bgos /
translated: Who is badly dressed?

analyzed: gang cha lugs mdzes pa de dag ni btang snyoms su gzhag / gang cha lugs mi mdzes pa de dag la sbran par bya / bsgo bar bya /

original: gang zhig gis legs par bgos pa de ni btang snyoms su gzhag / gang zhig gis mi sdug par bgos pa de dag la ni brda bya /🔽des brda byas pas ma tshor na drung na mo la brda bya /

translated: Those who are not well covered should be admonished.🔽If, when admonished, they do not understand, they should be admonished in the presence of a senior monk.

analyzed: drung na mos kyang ma tshor na dge slong gnas brtan gyis ci nas mi 'khrul pa'i tshul du sbran par bya /
translated: If, when admonished in the presence of a senior monk, they still do not understand, the senior monk should admonish them in such a way that they do not make mistakes.

original: ci nas lags par bgos pa dang / sgra cher mi dbyung bar bya'o //
analyzed: ci nas lags par bgos pa dang / sgra cher mi dbyung bar bya'o //
translated: They should be well covered and not make a loud noise.

original: dge slong gnas brtan gyis 'khor gyi nang du brtag par bya ba ni /🔽ci 'khor 'di dag ni chos bzhin du byed dam /
analyzed: dge slong gnas brtan gyis 'khor gyi nang du brtag par bya ba ni / ci 'khor 'di dag ni chos bzhin du byed dam /
translated: The senior monk should examine the assembly:🔽‘Are these people acting in accordance with the Dharma?

analyzed: 'on te chos bzhin du yin na ni ci bder bya'o zhes las thams cad byed du gzhug go //

analyzed: gal te chos bzhin du ma yin na ni chos kyi phyogs su gnas par bya /
translated: If it is not in accordance with the Dharma, then one should remain on the side of the Dharma.

original: chos bzhin du 'dri ba la lan sbyin par bya /
analyzed: chos bzhin du 'dri ba la lan sbyin par bya /
translated: If one is asked a question in accordance with the Dharma, one should answer.

analyzed: yang na cang mi smra bar @232b langs te 'gro bar bya'o // de'i phyir rtsod pa dang 'khrugs pa rjes su 'byung bar mi bya ba 'di ni /
translated: Or, if one is not able to answer, one should get up and leave without arguing.

original: dus ma yin par dge 'dun 'du ba'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dus ma yin par dge 'dun 'du ba'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //

analyzed: rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na /
translated: In the great city of Rājagṛha,🔽there were other tīrthika practitioners who, on the eighth,

translated: They were honored and

translated: “Do the monks in that place fight, find fault with each other, quarrel, dispute, and argue?”

analyzed: des bdag ma thob pa thob par bya ba dang / ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba dang / mngon sum du mya bya sa pa rnams mngon sum du bya ba'i bar chad du mi 'gyur grang gnas de na dbyar gyi nang du dge 'dun bye bar mi 'gyur zhes de bzhin du bsams bzhin du bsams / brtags pa bzhin du brtags /
translated: He thinks: There will be no obstacle to my attaining what has not been attained, to my realizing what has not been realized, to my manifesting what has not been manifested.

original: dpyad pa bzhin du dpyad par bya'o //
analyzed: dpyad pa bzhin du dpyad par bya'o //
translated: He thinks as he has thought, examines as he has examined, analyzes as he has analyzed.🔽He thinks: In this place, the Saṃgha will not be divided during the rainy season.

original: na ba'i bsnyen bkur ba'i grogs su mthun pa dang 'gro bar bya ste /
analyzed: na ba'i bsnyen bkur ba'i grogs su mthun pa dang 'gro bar bya ste /
translated: He goes to a place where there is a companion who will nurse him if he falls ill.

original: 'di ni dbyar nye bar bsgrub pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni dbyar nye bar bsgrub pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the procedure for entering the rainy season.

original: dbyar gnas pa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: dbyar gnas pa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the procedure for staying in the rainy season?

original: dbyar gnas pa'i geg slong gis don med pa'i phyir zhag gcig kyang mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'gro bar mi bya /
analyzed: dbyar gnas pa'i geg slong gis don med pa'i phyir zhag gcig kyang mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'gro bar mi bya /
translated: Because the purpose of the rainy season is to avoid disturbing living beings, one should not go outside the boundaries even for one night.

original: don zhig yod par gyur na des zhag bdun nam /
analyzed: don zhig yod par gyur na des zhag bdun nam /
translated: If there is a purpose, one should go, having obtained permission for seven days.

original: zhag bzhi bcur byin gyis brlabs la 'gro bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhag bzhi bcur byin gyis brlabs la 'gro bar bya'o //
translated: Or, having obtained permission for forty days, one should go.

original: de yang don gyi phyir te /
analyzed: de yang don gyi phyir te /
translated: It is for the sake of a purpose.

original: don gang gi phyir zhe na /🔽dge slong gi don nam ;🔽dge slong ma'i don nam /
analyzed: don gang gi phyir zhe na / dge slong gi don nam ; dge slong ma'i don nam /
translated: What is the purpose?🔽It is for the sake of a monk,🔽for the sake of a nun,🔽for the sake of a novice monk,

original: dge tshul gyi don nam /🔽dge tshul ma'i don nam /🔽dge bsnyen gyi don nam /
analyzed: dge tshul gyi don nam / dge tshul ma'i don nam / dge bsnyen gyi don nam /
translated: for the sake of a novice nun,🔽for the sake of a male lay practitioner,

original: dge bsnyen ma'i don nam /
analyzed: dge bsnyen ma'i don nam /
translated: for the sake of a female lay practitioner,

original: nye du'i don nam /
analyzed: nye du'i don nam /
translated: for the sake of a relative,

original: bdag gi don kyang rung /
analyzed: bdag gi don kyang rung /
translated: or for the sake of oneself.

original: de gal te de sangs rgyas la'am /
analyzed: de gal te de sangs rgyas la'am /
translated: If one has doubts about the Buddha,

original: chos la'am / dge 'dun la'am /🔽sdug bsngal ba la'am /
analyzed: chos la'am / dge 'dun la'am / sdug bsngal ba la'am /
translated: the Dharma, the Saṅgha,🔽suffering,

original: kun 'byung ba la'am /🔽'gog pa la'am /
analyzed: kun 'byung ba la'am / 'gog pa la'am /
translated: the origin of suffering,🔽the cessation of suffering,

original: lam la'ang rung the tshom can du gyur tam /
analyzed: lam la'ang rung the tshom can du gyur tam /
translated: or the path,

original: yid gnyis su gyur tam /
analyzed: yid gnyis su gyur tam /
translated: or if one has two minds about it,

original: dogs par gyur tam /
analyzed: dogs par gyur tam /
translated: or if one is suspicious,

original: ma thob pa la thob pa'i 'du shes su gyur tam /
analyzed: ma thob pa la thob pa'i 'du shes su gyur tam /
translated: or if one has the perception of obtaining what has not been obtained,

original: ma rtogs pa la rtogs pa'i 'du shes dang / mngon sum du ma byas pa la mngon sum du byas pa'i 'du shes te ;
analyzed: ma rtogs pa la rtogs pa'i 'du shes dang / mngon sum du ma byas pa la mngon sum du byas pa'i 'du shes te ;
translated: or if one has the perception of realizing what has not been realized, or the perception of actualizing what has not been actualized,🔽or if it is for the sake of other tīrthikas,

original: 'di ltar gzhan mu stegs can kun du rgyu dag gi don la yang rung ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar gzhan mu stegs can kun du rgyu dag gi don la yang rung ste /
translated: or for the sake of other non-Buddhists,

original: gal te dge slong des gnas de na dbyar dge 'dun bye bar 'gyur ram /
analyzed: gal te dge slong des gnas de na dbyar dge 'dun bye bar 'gyur ram /
translated: If the monk sees that the Saṅgha will split,

original: mchod rten nam gtsug lag khang yang rung /🔽dral bar 'gyur ram /
analyzed: mchod rten nam gtsug lag khang yang rung / dral bar 'gyur ram /
translated: or that the stūpa or the monastery🔽will be destroyed,

original: zhig par gyur kyang rung ste /🔽der dge slong des sangs rgyas sam /🔽chos sam / @235a * //
analyzed: zhig par gyur kyang rung ste / der dge slong des sangs rgyas sam / chos sam / @235a * //
translated: or that it will be ruined,🔽then the monk should go for seven days🔽to the place where the Buddha,

original: dge 'dun gyi don la yang zhag bdun nam /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi don la yang zhag bdun nam /
translated: the Dharma, or the Saṅgha are,

original: bzhi bcur byin gyis brlabs la 'gro bar bya'o //
analyzed: bzhi bcur byin gyis brlabs la 'gro bar bya'o //
translated: or to the place where he can obtain the four requisites.

original: gal te der song ba las zhag bzhi bcu yang rung /🔽lon par gyur /
analyzed: gal te der song ba las zhag bzhi bcu yang rung / lon par gyur /
translated: If he stays there for more than forty days,

original: dge slong dbyar ral ba'i nyes pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: dge slong dbyar ral ba'i nyes pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: then he will have broken the rainy season retreat.

original: 'di ni dbyar gnas pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o ;
analyzed: 'di ni dbyar gnas pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o ;
translated: This is called the rainy season retreat.

original: / dbyar gnas pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: / dbyar gnas pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the duty of the senior monk who is staying for the rainy season?

original: dbyar gnas pa'i dge slong gnas brtan gyis gtsug lag khang rnams dang / mchod rten rnams shes par bya /
analyzed: dbyar gnas pa'i dge slong gnas brtan gyis gtsug lag khang rnams dang / mchod rten rnams shes par bya /
translated: The senior monk who is staying for the rainy season should know the state of the monasteries and the stūpas.

original: ji lta bur ral ba bcos par bye ba dang / su byed pa la spro ba bskyed par bya /
analyzed: ji lta bur ral ba bcos par bye ba dang / su byed pa la spro ba bskyed par bya /
translated: He should repair what is damaged and encourage those who are not enthusiastic to do the work.

original: bsgrag par bya /
analyzed: bsgrag par bya /
translated: He should be encouraged to proclaim it.

original: sum byed pa de la ni bskul bar bya /🔽dran par bya ba 'di ni /
analyzed: sum byed pa de la ni bskul bar bya / dran par bya ba 'di ni /
translated: He should be reminded of it.

original: dbyar gnas pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dbyar gnas pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the duty of the elder who is staying during the rainy season.

original: dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the duty of those who have undertaken the rainy season residence?

original: dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa'i dge slong rnams kyis las rnam pa gsum bya ste /
analyzed: dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa'i dge slong rnams kyis las rnam pa gsum bya ste /
translated: The monks who have undertaken the rainy season residence should perform three kinds of duties:

original: dbyar gang du gnas pa de'i gnas khang de dag ral pa dang 'drums pa rnams bcos su gzhug par bya /🔽mtshams brtag par bya /
analyzed: dbyar gang du gnas pa de'i gnas khang de dag ral pa dang 'drums pa rnams bcos su gzhug par bya / mtshams brtag par bya /
translated: They should repair any damage to the dwelling where they are staying during the rainy season.🔽They should inspect the boundaries of the monastery.

original: mtshams brtag par byed du gzhug go //
analyzed: mtshams brtag par byed du gzhug go //
translated: They should have the boundaries inspected.

original: gnas der gos gang rnyed pa'i gos des sra brkyang du gding bar bya /
analyzed: gnas der gos gang rnyed pa'i gos des sra brkyang du gding bar bya /
translated: They should spread out the thick mat in the dwelling where they are staying, using whatever cloth they have obtained.

original: yang na gding du gzhug pa 'di ni /
analyzed: yang na gding du gzhug pa 'di ni /
translated: Or they should have it spread out.

original: dbyar gnas pa'i bya ba khas blangs pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dbyar gnas pa'i bya ba khas blangs pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the duty of those who have undertaken the rainy season residence.

original: 'khor dang ldan pa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'khor dang ldan pa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the duty of those who have a following?

original: 'khor gyi gtso bo des dus dus su 'khor rnams la gang legs par spyod pa dang / gang legs par mi spyod pa dang / gang mdzes par bsgrub pa dang / gang mi mdzes par bsgrub pa brtags te /🔽gang legs par spyad cing /
analyzed: 'khor gyi gtso bo des dus dus su 'khor rnams la gang legs par spyod pa dang / gang legs par mi spyod pa dang / gang mdzes par bsgrub pa dang / gang mi mdzes par bsgrub pa brtags te / gang legs par spyad cing /
translated: The chief of the assembly, from time to time, examines the assembly to see who is acting well and who is not acting well, who is practicing beautifully and who is not practicing beautifully.

original: mdzes par bsgrub pa de la ni /🔽yongs su bskyang bar bya ste /
analyzed: mdzes par bsgrub pa de la ni / yongs su bskyang bar bya ste /
translated: He should protect those who are acting well and practicing beautifully.

original: tshe dang ldan pa legs so legs so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa legs so legs so //
translated: He should encourage them, saying, “Venerable, it is good, it is good.

original: ji ltar khyod spyod pa de lta bur spyod par bya'o zhes spro ba bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar khyod spyod pa de lta bur spyod par bya'o zhes spro ba bskyed par bya'o //
translated: You should continue to practice in this way.”

original: yang dag par dga' bar bya /🔽de la dus dus su phyi phyir zhing bstan par bya /
analyzed: yang dag par dga' bar bya / de la dus dus su phyi phyir zhing bstan par bya /
translated: He should delight them.

original: bslab par bya'o //🔽gang legs par mi spyod dam /
analyzed: bslab par bya'o // gang legs par mi spyod dam /
translated: From time to time, he should teach them and instruct them.

original: mdzes par mi sgrub pa de la ni /
analyzed: mdzes par mi sgrub pa de la ni /
translated: He should punish those who are not acting well and practicing beautifully.🔽He should punish them in accordance with the offense, in accordance with the rule.

original: gang la ji lta bur 'ongs pa de lta bur chad pas bcad pa ni 'khor dang ldan pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gang la ji lta bur 'ongs pa de lta bur chad pas bcad pa ni 'khor dang ldan pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the activity of one who is endowed with an assembly.

original: 'khor gyi nang du zhugs pa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'khor gyi nang du zhugs pa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the activity of one who has entered the assembly?

original: dge slong 'khor gyi nang du 'gro ba na dran pa nye bar gzhag nas 'khor gyi nang du 'gro bar bya ste /
analyzed: dge slong 'khor gyi nang du 'gro ba na dran pa nye bar gzhag nas 'khor gyi nang du 'gro bar bya ste /
translated: When a monk enters an assembly, he should enter with his mindfulness established.

original: 'di ni rgyal rigs kyi 'khor to //
analyzed: 'di ni rgyal rigs kyi 'khor to //
translated: “This is the assembly of the kṣatriyas.

original: @235b 'di ni bram ze'i rigs kyi 'khor to //
analyzed: @235b 'di ni bram ze'i rigs kyi 'khor to //
translated: This is the assembly of the brahmins.

original: 'di ni khyim bdag gi 'khor to //
analyzed: 'di ni khyim bdag gi 'khor to //
translated: This is the assembly of the householders.

original: 'di ni dge sbyong gi 'khor to //
analyzed: 'di ni dge sbyong gi 'khor to //
translated: This is the assembly of the ascetics.

original: der bdag gis 'di lta bur 'gro bar bya /🔽'di lta bur 'greng bar bya /
analyzed: der bdag gis 'di lta bur 'gro bar bya / 'di lta bur 'greng bar bya /
translated: I should go there like this.🔽I should stand like this.

original: 'di lta bur 'dug par bya /
analyzed: 'di lta bur 'dug par bya /
translated: I should sit like this.

original: 'di lta bur smra bar bya /
analyzed: 'di lta bur smra bar bya /
translated: I should speak like this.

original: 'di lta bur smra bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni 'khor gyi nang du 'gro ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di lta bur smra bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni 'khor gyi nang du 'gro ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: I should not speak like this.’ This is called ‘the activity of entering an assembly.’

original: 'khor gyi nang du zhugs pa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'khor gyi nang du zhugs pa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the activity of having entered an assembly?

original: dge slong 'khor gyi nang du zhugs pa des gtam sna tshogs mi bya /
analyzed: dge slong 'khor gyi nang du zhugs pa des gtam sna tshogs mi bya /
translated: When a monk has entered an assembly, he should not engage in various kinds of conversation.

original: gtam 'gal ba rnams mi bya /
analyzed: gtam 'gal ba rnams mi bya /
translated: He should not engage in contradictory kinds of conversation.

original: 'khor rnams dang rjes su mthun par byas la de dag dang rjes su mthun pa'i gtam smra bar bya /
analyzed: 'khor rnams dang rjes su mthun par byas la de dag dang rjes su mthun pa'i gtam smra bar bya /
translated: He should be in harmony with the assembly and speak in a way that is in harmony with them.

original: gtam byas nas stan las langs par bya ba de ni 'khor gyi nang du zhugs pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gtam byas nas stan las langs par bya ba de ni 'khor gyi nang du zhugs pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the activity of entering the assembly.

original: 'khor gyi nang du zhugs pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'khor gyi nang du zhugs pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the activity of the elder who has entered the assembly?

original: 'khor gyi nang du zhugs pa'i dge slong gnas brtan gyis 'khor rnams la 'di dag gtam ji lta bu la dga'/
analyzed: 'khor gyi nang du zhugs pa'i dge slong gnas brtan gyis 'khor rnams la 'di dag gtam ji lta bu la dga'/
translated: The elder bhikṣu who has entered the assembly should examine the assembly, thinking, “What kind of conversation do these people enjoy?

original: 'on te cang mi smra ba la dga' 'am zhes 'khor rnams la brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: 'on te cang mi smra ba la dga' 'am zhes 'khor rnams la brtag par bya'o //
translated: Do they enjoy conversation or do they enjoy silence?”

original: gal te de dag gtam la dga' ba zhig yin na ni /
analyzed: gal te de dag gtam la dga' ba zhig yin na ni /
translated: If they enjoy conversation,

original: de dag dang mthun pa'i gtam bya'o //
analyzed: de dag dang mthun pa'i gtam bya'o //
translated: he should engage in conversation that is appropriate for them.

original: gal te mi smra ba la dga' ba yin na ni der cang mi smra bar 'dug par bya ste /
analyzed: gal te mi smra ba la dga' ba yin na ni der cang mi smra bar 'dug par bya ste /
translated: If they enjoy silence, he should remain silent.

original: 'di ni 'khor gyi nang du zhugs pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni 'khor gyi nang du zhugs pa'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the activity of the elder who has entered the assembly.

original: gso sbyong gi bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: gso sbyong gi bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the activity of the poṣadha?

original: bcu bzhi pa'am /
analyzed: bcu bzhi pa'am /
translated: On the fourteenth or

original: gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid kyi tshe /
analyzed: gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid kyi tshe /
translated: fifteenth day of the month, the day of the poṣadha,

original: rang gi rgyud la brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: rang gi rgyud la brtag par bya ste /
translated: he should examine his own mind, thinking,🔽“

original: mtshan mo'i rgyud dang / nyin mo'i rgyud dang / bdag la skabs der ltung ba lta / ma byung ngam /🔽gal te byung ba yod na dge slong yid brtan pa zhig rnyed na ni /
analyzed: mtshan mo'i rgyud dang / nyin mo'i rgyud dang / bdag la skabs der ltung ba lta / ma byung ngam / gal te byung ba yod na dge slong yid brtan pa zhig rnyed na ni /
translated: the Tantra of the Night, the Tantra of the Day, and the Tantra of the Self.🔽If I have committed any offenses,

original: de'i mdun du bshags par bya ;
analyzed: de'i mdun du bshags par bya ;
translated: I will confess them in the presence of a monk who is trustworthy.🔽If I do not find such a monk, I will confess them mentally.

original: gal te ma rnyed na ni sems kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang / gal te nyes pa byung na ni sems bskyed par bya ste /
analyzed: gal te ma rnyed na ni sems kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang / gal te nyes pa byung na ni sems bskyed par bya ste /
translated: If I have committed any offenses, I will arouse the mind of awakening.

original: bdag ni ltung ba de las yongs su dag go zhes tshig tu brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag ni ltung ba de las yongs su dag go zhes tshig tu brjod par bya'o //
translated: I will declare with words, ‘I am completely purified of those offenses.’

original: gso sbyong ni tshul khrims yongs su dag par byed pa ste /
analyzed: gso sbyong ni tshul khrims yongs su dag par byed pa ste /
translated: Purification is the purification of morality.

original: 'di ni gso sbyong gi bya ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gso sbyong gi bya ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is called the activity of purification.

original: gso sbyong gi mngon du bya ba'i bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: gso sbyong gi mngon du bya ba'i bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the activity of actualizing purification?

original: dge slong gso sbyong mngon du bshags byung la /🔽min na ma dad bzhin du yang 'gro bar bya ste /
analyzed: dge slong gso sbyong mngon du bshags byung la / min na ma dad bzhin du yang 'gro bar bya ste /
translated: A monk who has actualized purification🔽should go to the confession ceremony even if he is not inspired to do so.

original: de yang shes bzhin du 'gro bar byas nas snga ma bzhin te /
analyzed: de yang shes bzhin du 'gro bar byas nas snga ma bzhin te /
translated: He should go there with mindfulness and do as before.

original: 'dug pa la mkhas par bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: 'dug pa la mkhas par bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: up to: being skilled in sitting.

original: 'dug pa las so sor thar pa'i mdo las @236a * //
analyzed: 'dug pa las so sor thar pa'i mdo las @236a * //
translated: “ Sitting” is taught in the Sutra on Individual Liberation.

original: bstan pa'o snyam pa'i 'du shes mngon du gzhag par bya /
analyzed: bstan pa'o snyam pa'i 'du shes mngon du gzhag par bya /
translated: “ One should establish the perception that it is the Buddha who is teaching.🔽“ One should listen with respect,

original: bkur stir bya /🔽ri mor byas la mnyan par bya /🔽bla mar bya /🔽gces par bya /
analyzed: bkur stir bya / ri mor byas la mnyan par bya / bla mar bya / gces par bya /
translated: with reverence,🔽with esteem,

original: yid la gzung bar bya /
analyzed: yid la gzung bar bya /
translated: with appreciation,

original: sems rtse gcig tu bya /
analyzed: sems rtse gcig tu bya /
translated: with one-pointed mind,

original: rna ba mi g-yeng bar bya /
analyzed: rna ba mi g-yeng bar bya /
translated: without distraction,

original: sems thams cad kyis gcig tu dmigs nas mnyan par bya'o ;
analyzed: sems thams cad kyis gcig tu dmigs nas mnyan par bya'o ;
translated: and with all one’s heart.

original: / mnyan nas kyang de lta bur nan tan du bya /
analyzed: / mnyan nas kyang de lta bur nan tan du bya /
translated: “ Having listened, one should practice accordingly.

original: bsgrub par bya ba gso sbyong mngon du bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba gso sbyong mngon du bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called ‘making the poṣadha one’s own.’

original: gso sbyong gi las kyi bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: gso sbyong gi las kyi bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: “ What is the procedure for the poṣadha ceremony?

original: gso sbyong gi las bya nga rnam pa lnga ste /
analyzed: gso sbyong gi las bya nga rnam pa lnga ste /
translated: There are five procedures for the poṣadha ceremony:🔽openly declaring,🔽blessing,🔽intention,🔽purification,

original: mngon par smra ba dang / byin gyis brlabs pa dang / 'dun pa dang / yongs su dag pa dang / dgag dbye dang ; sems kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par smra ba dang / byin gyis brlabs pa dang / 'dun pa dang / yongs su dag pa dang / dgag dbye dang ; sems kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o //

original: 'khrul pa'i phyir ma yin gyi /

analyzed: gzhan yang yon tan rnam pa lnga ste /

original: rdul dang dri ma 'byang ba dang / pags pa dang mdangs gsal ba dang / pags pa la yod pa'i nad rnams 'byin pa dang / rlung dang bad kan rnams med par byed pa dang / bsro khang du skyo ba skye bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: rdul dang dri ma 'byang ba dang / pags pa dang mdangs gsal ba dang / pags pa la yod pa'i nad rnams 'byin pa dang / rlung dang bad kan rnams med par byed pa dang / bsro khang du skyo ba skye bar byed pa'o //
translated: it removes dust and dirt, it invigorates and clarifies the complexion, it removes diseases of the skin, it eliminates wind and phlegm, and it makes one feel refreshed.

analyzed: dge slong gis bsro khang du khrus byed par 'dod na /

analyzed: gzhan la slar gtong du gzhug go zhes lhan cig gnas pas myur du spro ba bskyed par bya'o //

analyzed: byas kyang rung ste /

original: nges par 'byung snyam du lhan cig gnas pas myur du spro ba bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: nges par 'byung snyam du lhan cig gnas pas myur du spro ba bskyed par bya'o //
translated: I will definitely help him to leave that state.’

original: gal te mkhan po la dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung bar gyur na /
analyzed: gal te mkhan po la dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung bar gyur na /
translated: “If the preceptor has committed a saṅghāvaśeṣa offense,

original: de la ci nas bdag gis mkhan po la spro ba sbyin pa'am /
analyzed: de la ci nas bdag gis mkhan po la spro ba sbyin pa'am /
translated: the student should think, ‘In any case, I will help the preceptor to leave that state,

original: gzhi nas spro ba'am /
analyzed: gzhi nas spro ba'am /
translated: whether he has already done it or not.

original: spro ba spyad zin na /🔽mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa'am /
analyzed: spro ba spyad zin na / mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa'am /
translated: If he has already done it,🔽I will help him to leave that state,

original: gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba'am /
analyzed: gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba'am /
translated: whether he has already done it or not.🔽If he has already done it, I will help him to leave that state by giving him the penance.

original: mgu bar bya ba spyad nas dbyung ba sbyin par bya'o zhes lhan cig gnas pas spro ba bskyed par gyur na legs spro ba ma skyes na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mgu bar bya ba spyad nas dbyung ba sbyin par bya'o zhes lhan cig gnas pas spro ba bskyed par gyur na legs spro ba ma skyes na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
translated: Having practiced to please the preceptor, the student should be given leave.🔽If the student is inspired to practice in this way, it is good. If he is not inspired, he will be at fault.

original: de ltar lhan cig gnas pas mkhan po la bya ba ci dang ci yod kyang rung ste /🔽de la spro ba bskyed par bya ba de /
analyzed: de ltar lhan cig gnas pas mkhan po la bya ba ci dang ci yod kyang rung ste /🔽de la spro ba bskyed par bya ba de /
translated: “In this way, the student should help the preceptor in any way he can.

original: gzhan du mkhan pos kyang lhan cig gnas pa la bya ba ci dang ci yod kyang brtson pa shas chen pos bsgrub par bya ste /
analyzed: gzhan du mkhan pos kyang lhan cig gnas pa la bya ba ci dang ci yod kyang brtson pa shas chen pos bsgrub par bya ste /
translated: Otherwise, the preceptor should do whatever is necessary to help the student, even with great effort.

original: zhu ba rnams ni ma gtogs so //
analyzed: zhu ba rnams ni ma gtogs so //
translated: But he should not ask for anything in return.

original: lhan cig gnas pas @239b mkhan po'i stan gding bar bya /
analyzed: lhan cig gnas pas @239b mkhan po'i stan gding bar bya /
translated: The student should prepare the preceptor’s seat,

original: rkang pa bkru ba'i chu dang / lham yang bshams te /
analyzed: rkang pa bkru ba'i chu dang / lham yang bshams te /
translated: wash his feet, and set out his shoes.

original: phyogs gcig tu gzhag par bya /
analyzed: phyogs gcig tu gzhag par bya /
translated: He should then place them in one place.

original: rkang pa bgru bar bya /🔽bskur bar bya /
analyzed: rkang pa bgru bar bya / bskur bar bya /
translated: He should wash his feet.🔽He should massage them.🔽He should prepare the bed,

original: mal bya'o // gci ba'i snod dang / bshang ba'i snod bshams te gzhag par bya /
analyzed: mal bya'o // gci ba'i snod dang / bshang ba'i snod bshams te gzhag par bya /
translated: and set out the vessel for urine and the vessel for excrement.

original: gal te lung zhig nod par gyur na yang lung nod par bya /
analyzed: gal te lung zhig nod par gyur na yang lung nod par bya /
translated: If he needs to receive a recitation, he should receive a recitation.

original: yid la byed pa zhig nod dgos pa byung na yang yid la byed pa nod par bya ste /
analyzed: yid la byed pa zhig nod dgos pa byung na yang yid la byed pa nod par bya ste /
translated: If he needs to receive a mental focus, he should receive a mental focus.

original: phyogs gcig tu 'ongs te /
analyzed: phyogs gcig tu 'ongs te /
translated: He should come to one side

original: 'dug nas bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dug nas bsgom par bya'o //
translated: and sit down to meditate.

original: nang par langs nas gci ba'i snod dang bshang ba'i snod dbyung bar bya /
analyzed: nang par langs nas gci ba'i snod dang bshang ba'i snod dbyung bar bya /
translated: In the morning, he should remove the vessel for urine and the vessel for excrement.

original: mkhan po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas te /
analyzed: mkhan po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas te /
translated: He should bow his head to the preceptor’s feet.

original: mkhan po bde bar mdzad nas /🔽bde bar bgyis sam /
analyzed: mkhan po bde bar mdzad nas / bde bar bgyis sam /
translated: Having made the preceptor happy,🔽“Have you been happy?

original: bde bar spyad dam zhes dri bar bya'o //
analyzed: bde bar spyad dam zhes dri bar bya'o //
translated: Have you been comfortable?”

original: gal te na bar gyur na yang /
analyzed: gal te na bar gyur na yang /
translated: If he has been sick,

original: na ba'i gsos sman dang g-yog la spro ba bskyed par bya /
analyzed: na ba'i gsos sman dang g-yog la spro ba bskyed par bya /
translated: he should be encouraged to take medicine and to have attendants.

original: gal te min na ni bde bar btang snyoms su gzhag go //
analyzed: gal te min na ni bde bar btang snyoms su gzhag go //
translated: If he has not been sick, he should be left in a state of comfort.

original: gal te dge 'dun gyi zas zhig gam mgron du bos pa'i zas kyang rung ste /
analyzed: gal te dge 'dun gyi zas zhig gam mgron du bos pa'i zas kyang rung ste /
translated: If there is a meal for the Saṅgha or an invitation to a meal,

original: mkhan po la dge 'dun gyi zas mchis kyis deng bde bar spyod cig ces bsgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: mkhan po la dge 'dun gyi zas mchis kyis deng bde bar spyod cig ces bsgo bar bya'o //
translated: he should inform the preceptor, “There is a meal for the Saṅgha. Please enjoy it.”

original: gal te bsod snyoms kyi zas yin na yang /
analyzed: gal te bsod snyoms kyi zas yin na yang /
translated: If it is a meal of alms,

original: mkhan po bsod snyoms la gshegs kyi chos shig ces bsgo'o //
analyzed: mkhan po bsod snyoms la gshegs kyi chos shig ces bsgo'o //
translated: he should inform the preceptor, “Preceptor, let us go for alms.”

original: lhan cig gnas pas mkhan po la so shing dang / chu bde ba dang / ba lang gi lci ba dang / phye ma dbul ba dang / nam mkhan po'i chas de rnams zin pa de ni lhung bzed dang / chos gos bstab par bya /
analyzed: lhan cig gnas pas mkhan po la so shing dang / chu bde ba dang / ba lang gi lci ba dang / phye ma dbul ba dang / nam mkhan po'i chas de rnams zin pa de ni lhung bzed dang / chos gos bstab par bya /
translated: The student should offer the preceptor a tooth cleaner, water for washing, cow dung, and bath powder, and he should prepare the preceptor’s robes.

original: gal te dge 'dun dang lhan cig bsod snyoms la 'jug na ni /
analyzed: gal te dge 'dun dang lhan cig bsod snyoms la 'jug na ni /
translated: If he is going for alms with the Saṅgha,

original: mkhan po mdun du btang la /
analyzed: mkhan po mdun du btang la /
translated: he should go in front of the preceptor.

original: bdag gi gral gang du bsams nas 'gro bar bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gi gral gang du bsams nas 'gro bar bya'o //
translated: He should go to the place where he thinks his seat is.🔽If he is going for alms with an individual, he should carry the preceptor’s outer robes,

original: gal te gang zag dang lhan cig bsod snyoms la 'jug na ni mkhan po'i snam sbyar dang / lhung bzed dang khar gsil bskur bar bya /
analyzed: gal te gang zag dang lhan cig bsod snyoms la 'jug na ni mkhan po'i snam sbyar dang / lhung bzed dang khar gsil bskur bar bya /
translated: alms bowl, and water filter.

original: gal te rlung dang / char pa dang / dus grang ba zhig tu gyur na /
analyzed: gal te rlung dang / char pa dang / dus grang ba zhig tu gyur na /
translated: If it is windy, rainy, or cold,

original: mkhan po'i snam spyar 'og tu bcug la bdag gi steng du dbyung bar bya'o //
analyzed: mkhan po'i snam spyar 'og tu bcug la bdag gi steng du dbyung bar bya'o //
translated: he should put the preceptor’s outer robes under him and put his own on top.

original: gal te bdag gi yul dron bdag gi snam sbyar 'og tu bcug la /
analyzed: gal te bdag gi yul dron bdag gi snam sbyar 'og tu bcug la /
translated: If it is hot, he should put his own outer robes under him

original: mkhan po'i steng du dbyung ste /
analyzed: mkhan po'i steng du dbyung ste /
translated: and the preceptor’s on top.

original: lhan cig gnas pa mkhan po'i mdun du yongs la zil pa la sogs pa bsal bar bya /
analyzed: lhan cig gnas pa mkhan po'i mdun du yongs la zil pa la sogs pa bsal bar bya /
translated: The pupil should sit in front of the preceptor and remove any dew and so forth from the robes.

original: gal te chu 'gram mam /
analyzed: gal te chu 'gram mam /
translated: If they are going to a river,

original: gad ka'am / g-yang sa zhig na mkhan po'i lag pa nas bzung ste /
analyzed: gad ka'am / g-yang sa zhig na mkhan po'i lag pa nas bzung ste /
translated: a ravine, or a precipice, he should hold the preceptor’s hand

original: drang bar bya'o //
analyzed: drang bar bya'o //
translated: and lead him.

original: @240a * // song nas grong mthar phyin pa na /
analyzed: @240a * // song nas grong mthar phyin pa na /
translated: Having gone, when he arrives at the edge of the village,

original: snam sbyar dang / lhung bzed dang / khar gsil dbul bar bya /
analyzed: snam sbyar dang / lhung bzed dang / khar gsil dbul bar bya /
translated: he should offer his upper robe, bowl, and water filter.

original: phul te mkhan po mdun du btang nas grong gi nang du 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: phul te mkhan po mdun du btang nas grong gi nang du 'jug par bya'o //
translated: Having offered them, he should enter the village with the preceptor in front.

original: gal te skas sam /
analyzed: gal te skas sam /
translated: If he climbs a ladder

original: them skas la 'dzegs na yang lhan cig gnas pa mdun du 'dzegs la lag pa nas drang bar bya'o //
analyzed: them skas la 'dzegs na yang lhan cig gnas pa mdun du 'dzegs la lag pa nas drang bar bya'o //
translated: or a staircase, the pupil should climb in front and hold the preceptor’s hand.

original: der chos dang ldan pa'i rnyed pa grub na yang bdag gis blang bar bya /
analyzed: der chos dang ldan pa'i rnyed pa grub na yang bdag gis blang bar bya /
translated: If he obtains there a gain that is in accordance with the Dharma, he should accept it himself.

original: bdag gis bsod snyoms brgyus te /
analyzed: bdag gis bsod snyoms brgyus te /
translated: He should carry the alms himself.

original: slar grong gi phyi rol du phyung nas /
analyzed: slar grong gi phyi rol du phyung nas /
translated: Having gone out of the village again,

original: mkhan po'i snam sbyar dang / lhung bzed dang / khar gsil blangs te /
analyzed: mkhan po'i snam sbyar dang / lhung bzed dang / khar gsil blangs te /
translated: he should take the preceptor’s upper robe, bowl, and water filter,

original: mkhan po mdun du btang nas gtsug lag khang du 'dod par bya'o //
analyzed: mkhan po mdun du btang nas gtsug lag khang du 'dod par bya'o //
translated: and he should return to the monastery with the preceptor in front.

original: der lhags nas lhung bzed dang / chos gos bzhag ste /
analyzed: der lhags nas lhung bzed dang / chos gos bzhag ste /
translated: Having arrived there, he should put down the bowl and robes,

original: mkhan po'i gdan gding bar bya /
analyzed: mkhan po'i gdan gding bar bya /
translated: and he should prepare the preceptor’s seat.

original: rkang pa bkru ba'i chu dang / lham brten te gzhag la rkang pa bkru bar bya'o //
analyzed: rkang pa bkru ba'i chu dang / lham brten te gzhag la rkang pa bkru bar bya'o //
translated: He should wash his feet, put away his sandals, and wash his feet.

original: de nas dus la bab par gyur na /🔽mkhan po'i lhung bzed kyi gzhi gding zhing /
analyzed: de nas dus la bab par gyur na / mkhan po'i lhung bzed kyi gzhi gding zhing /
translated: Then, when the time comes,

original: lhung bzed dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: lhung bzed dbul bar bya'o //
translated: he should spread out the preceptor’s seat and offer him his alms-bowl.

original: bdag gis bca' ba dang / zhim pa dang / dam pa ci yod pa mkhan po la dbul bar bya /
analyzed: bdag gis bca' ba dang / zhim pa dang / dam pa ci yod pa mkhan po la dbul bar bya /
translated: He should offer the preceptor whatever he has that is good, delicious, and wholesome.

original: mkhan pos kyang blang ba'i tshod rig par bya /
analyzed: mkhan pos kyang blang ba'i tshod rig par bya /
translated: The preceptor should know the right amount to take.

original: zas kyi bya ba byas pa dang / bde ba'i chos bsnyad par bya /🔽ba lang gi lci ba dang / phye mas lhung bzed bkrus la /
analyzed: zas kyi bya ba byas pa dang / bde ba'i chos bsnyad par bya / ba lang gi lci ba dang / phye mas lhung bzed bkrus la /
translated: When the meal is finished, he should tell him about the Dharma that is conducive to well-being.🔽He should wash the alms-bowl with cow dung or clay,

original: lhung bzed dang / chos gos ltar gzhag par bya /
analyzed: lhung bzed dang / chos gos ltar gzhag par bya /
translated: and put away the alms-bowl and robes.

original: mkhan po la phyag byas nas /🔽mkhan po bzhin bzhugs sam /
analyzed: mkhan po la phyag byas nas / mkhan po bzhin bzhugs sam /
translated: He should bow to the preceptor🔽and ask, “Preceptor, are you comfortable?

original: nyin mo spyod par gshegs sam zhes dri bar bya'o //
analyzed: nyin mo spyod par gshegs sam zhes dri bar bya'o //
translated: Are you going out for a walk?”

original: gal te nyin mo spyod du 'gro ba na yang /
analyzed: gal te nyin mo spyod du 'gro ba na yang /
translated: If he is going out for a walk,

original: mkhan po'i khri dang gding ba dang / ril ba spyi blugs khyer la mkhan po mdun du btang ste /
analyzed: mkhan po'i khri dang gding ba dang / ril ba spyi blugs khyer la mkhan po mdun du btang ste /
translated: Carrying the preceptor’s seat, his sitting mat, and his water pitcher, and with the preceptor in front,

original: nyin mo spyod sa gang du spyod par 'gro bar bya'o //
analyzed: nyin mo spyod sa gang du spyod par 'gro bar bya'o //
translated: one should go to the place where the day’s activities are to be done.

original: song nas mkhan po'i stan bting la lung nod dgos na yang lung nod par bya /
analyzed: song nas mkhan po'i stan bting la lung nod dgos na yang lung nod par bya /
translated: Having gone there, one should set out the preceptor’s seat and, if one is required to recite the scriptures, one should recite the scriptures.

original: yid la byed pa nod dgos na yang yid la byed pa mnos nas phyogs gcig tu song ste bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: yid la byed pa nod dgos na yang yid la byed pa mnos nas phyogs gcig tu song ste bsgom par bya'o //
translated: If one is required to recite the mental recitation, having recited the mental recitation, one should go to one side and meditate.

original: de nas dus la bab na mkhan po'i khro 'u dang / gding ba dang / ril ba spyi blugs khyer te /
analyzed: de nas dus la bab na mkhan po'i khro 'u dang / gding ba dang / ril ba spyi blugs khyer te /
translated: Then, when the time has come, carrying the preceptor’s bowl, his sitting mat, and his water pitcher,

original: mkhan po mdun du bya sal 'gro bar bya'o //
analyzed: mkhan po mdun du bya sal 'gro bar bya'o //
translated: and with the preceptor in front, one should go.

original: gal te gso sbyong gi dus la bab ste /
analyzed: gal te gso sbyong gi dus la bab ste /
translated: If the time for the purification has come,

original: 'du bar gyur na mkhan po'i stan ltebs na brkyang bar bya /
analyzed: 'du bar gyur na mkhan po'i stan ltebs na brkyang bar bya /
translated: if the preceptor’s seat is folded, one should unfold it.

original: brkyang na ni legs par gding bar bya /
analyzed: brkyang na ni legs par gding bar bya /
translated: If it is unfolded, one should fold it well.🔽Then, at the proper time,

original: de nas dus su bsgo @240b ba'am /🔽gand'i brdungs kyang rung ste /
analyzed: de nas dus su bsgo @240b ba'am / gand'i brdungs kyang rung ste /
translated: whether the gavel is struck or not,

original: lag pa g-yon pas ni mkhan po'i lag pa nas bzung la /
analyzed: lag pa g-yon pas ni mkhan po'i lag pa nas bzung la /
translated: with the left hand one should take hold of the preceptor’s hand,🔽and with the right hand one should ring the bell.

original: g-yas pas ni me tog thogs te /🔽mkhan po mdun du byas la /
analyzed: g-yas pas ni me tog thogs te / mkhan po mdun du byas la /
translated: Holding a flower in his right hand,🔽he should approach the place of purification

original: gso sbyong gi gnas su 'ong bar bya'o //
analyzed: gso sbyong gi gnas su 'ong bar bya'o //
translated: in the presence of the preceptor.🔽When he has received this Sūtra of the Individual,

original: nam so sor thar pa'i mdo 'di nod zin nas mkhan po'i drung du yongs la mkhan po ci gshegs sam ;
analyzed: nam so sor thar pa'i mdo 'di nod zin nas mkhan po'i drung du yongs la mkhan po ci gshegs sam ;
translated: he should ask the preceptor, “Where are you going?

original: chos gsan cing bzhugs zhes dri bar bya'o //
analyzed: chos gsan cing bzhugs zhes dri bar bya'o //
translated: Are you staying to listen to the Dharma?”

original: gal te 'gro na ni lag pa g-yon pas ni mkhan po bzung /
analyzed: gal te 'gro na ni lag pa g-yon pas ni mkhan po bzung /
translated: If he is going, the student should hold the preceptor’s left hand

original: g-yas pas ni mar me thogs te /🔽mkhan po mdun du byas la /
analyzed: g-yas pas ni mar me thogs te / mkhan po mdun du byas la /
translated: and carry a lamp in his right hand.🔽He should go to the monastery

original: gtsug lag khang du 'gro bar bya'o //
analyzed: gtsug lag khang du 'gro bar bya'o //
translated: in the presence of the preceptor.

original: gal te bsro khang du khrus byed par gyur na /
analyzed: gal te bsro khang du khrus byed par gyur na /
translated: If he is going to bathe in the sauna,🔽he should get up early in the morning and tell the preceptor, “Today I will bathe in the sauna.

original: nang par sngar langs nas mkhan po la deng bsro khang du khrus mdzad kyi char gsol zhes bsgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: nang par sngar langs nas mkhan po la deng bsro khang du khrus mdzad kyi char gsol zhes bsgo bar bya'o //
translated: Please prepare the water.”

original: lhan cig gnas pas mkhan po'i phyir bsro khang gi stan dang / khri'u dang / ril ba spyi blugs dang / khrus ras dang / bsro khang gi gzhan gang yang rung ste /
analyzed: lhan cig gnas pas mkhan po'i phyir bsro khang gi stan dang / khri'u dang / ril ba spyi blugs dang / khrus ras dang / bsro khang gi gzhan gang yang rung ste /
translated: The student should prepare for the preceptor a seat in the sauna, a foot-stool, a water-jar, a sauna-towel, and anything else needed for the sauna.

original: khyer la mkhan po'i mdun du byas nas bsro khang du dong bar bya /
analyzed: khyer la mkhan po'i mdun du byas nas bsro khang du dong bar bya /
translated: Taking it, he should go to the preceptor’s sauna.

original: der 'ongs nas kyang chos gos phyogs gcig tu gzhag la /
analyzed: der 'ongs nas kyang chos gos phyogs gcig tu gzhag la /
translated: Having arrived there, he should put the robe aside in one place,

original: mkhan po las mi nye mi ring bar 'dug par bya /
analyzed: mkhan po las mi nye mi ring bar 'dug par bya /
translated: and sit neither too close to nor too far from the preceptor.

original: nam mkhan po rdul bar gyur na /
analyzed: nam mkhan po rdul bar gyur na /
translated: If the preceptor becomes dusty,

original: de na lhan cig gnas pa des de la rim bzhin du rjes su las rnams byas te /🔽dang por bkru bar bya /
analyzed: de na lhan cig gnas pa des de la rim bzhin du rjes su las rnams byas te / dang por bkru bar bya /
translated: then the pupil should perform his duties in order.🔽First he should bathe him.

original: bkrus nas mdun du byas te /
analyzed: bkrus nas mdun du byas te /
translated: Having bathed him, he should dry him.

original: gtsug lag khang du bskyal bar bya /
analyzed: gtsug lag khang du bskyal bar bya /
translated: Then he should take him to the monastery.

original: de'i 'og tu bdag nyid bsrung bar bya /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu bdag nyid bsrung bar bya /
translated: After that, he should protect himself.

original: gal te lhan cig gnas pa de mkhan po'i drung du dge ba'i chos mi 'phel bar gyur na /
analyzed: gal te lhan cig gnas pa de mkhan po'i drung du dge ba'i chos mi 'phel bar gyur na /
translated: If the pupil does not increase in virtue in the presence of the preceptor,

original: mkhan po la bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi bas 'di la gtad du gsol zhes smra bar bya'o //
analyzed: mkhan po la bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi bas 'di la gtad du gsol zhes smra bar bya'o //
translated: he should say to the preceptor, ‘May the preceptor give me to another.’

original: mkhan pos kyang dge slong la dge slong 'di ci 'dra /
analyzed: mkhan pos kyang dge slong la dge slong 'di ci 'dra /
translated: The preceptor should ask the monk, ‘What is this monk like?

original: de'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / drung na 'dug pa ci 'dra /
analyzed: de'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / drung na 'dug pa ci 'dra /
translated: What is he like in following and in sitting in his presence?

original: 'di lung rnams 'bogs sam /
analyzed: 'di lung rnams 'bogs sam /
translated: Should he give the scriptures?

original: gal te mi 'bogs /
analyzed: gal te mi 'bogs /
translated: If he does not give them,

original: rjes su ston tam /
analyzed: rjes su ston tam /
translated: should he teach them?

original: gal te mi ston brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: gal te mi ston brtag par bya'o //
translated: If he does not teach them, he should be examined.

original: dpyad par bya'o //
analyzed: dpyad par bya'o //
translated: He should be investigated.

original: de bzhin du brtags dpyad nas /
analyzed: de bzhin du brtags dpyad nas /
translated: In the same way, having examined and investigated,

original: gal te 'os par gyur na de la gtad par bya /
analyzed: gal te 'os par gyur na de la gtad par bya /
translated: if he is suitable, he should be entrusted with them.

original: gal te 'os ba ma yin na ni gzhan la gtad par bya'o //
analyzed: gal te 'os ba ma yin na ni gzhan la gtad par bya'o //
translated: If he is not suitable, he should be entrusted to someone else.

original: gal te mkhan po nyid 'os pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te mkhan po nyid 'os pa ma yin te /
translated: If the preceptor himself is not suitable,

original: tshul dang mi ldan na ma zhus phar yod yang bla ste /
analyzed: tshul dang mi ldan na ma zhus phar yod yang bla ste /
translated: and is not in accordance with the rules, it is better not to ask.

original: 'di ni lhan cig gnas pas bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni lhan cig gnas pas bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the duties of the co-resident disciple.

original: slob dpon gyi bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: slob dpon gyi bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What are the duties of the teacher?

original: slob dpon gyi nye gnas rnams shes par bya ba nas snga ma bzhin te @241a * //
analyzed: slob dpon gyi nye gnas rnams shes par bya ba nas snga ma bzhin te @241a * //
translated: The teacher should know the duties of the teacher's disciple, as before.

original: phyogs gang na nye gnas de nyon mongs shing 'dug par gyur na /
analyzed: phyogs gang na nye gnas de nyon mongs shing 'dug par gyur na /
translated: If the disciple is in a place where he is afflicted and staying,

original: phyogs de nas dgug par bya /
analyzed: phyogs de nas dgug par bya /
translated: he should be summoned from that place.

original: dgug tu gzhug par bya ste /
analyzed: dgug tu gzhug par bya ste /
translated: He should be made to be summoned.

original: 'di ni slob dpon gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni slob dpon gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the duties of the teacher.

original: nye gnas kyi bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: nye gnas kyi bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What are the duties of the disciple?

original: nye gnas kyis slob dpon la ston pa'o snyam du 'du shes mngon du gzhag la ;🔽rim gro bya ba nas /
analyzed: nye gnas kyis slob dpon la ston pa'o snyam du 'du shes mngon du gzhag la ; rim gro bya ba nas /
translated: The attendant should be mindful of the teacher as the Teacher.

original: snga ma bzhin du ma gus kyang 'gro bar bya ba'i bar du ste de ni nye gnas kyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du ma gus kyang 'gro bar bya ba'i bar du ste de ni nye gnas kyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: He should serve him, and so on, up to: he should not go elsewhere even if he is disrespected, as before. This is called the attendant’s duties.

original: dge tshul gyi bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: dge tshul gyi bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What are the duties of the novice monk?

original: dge tshul gyis mkhan po dang slob dpon la ston pa'i snyam du 'du shes mngon du gzhag la rim gro bya ba nas snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: dge tshul gyis mkhan po dang slob dpon la ston pa'i snyam du 'du shes mngon du gzhag la rim gro bya ba nas snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The novice monk should be mindful of the preceptor and the teacher as the Teacher. He should serve them, and so on, up to: he should not go elsewhere even if he is disrespected, as before.

original: gal te slob dpon dang mkhan po sdig pa can gyi lta ba skyes par gyur na rang gis lta ba gtang bar bya /
analyzed: gal te slob dpon dang mkhan po sdig pa can gyi lta ba skyes par gyur na rang gis lta ba gtang bar bya /
translated: If the preceptor and teacher give rise to sinful views, he should give up his own views,

original: yang na gtong du gzhug par bya /
analyzed: yang na gtong du gzhug par bya /
translated: or he should cause them to give up their views.

original: gal te de ltar brtson pa shas chen pos bsgrub na ni de lta na legs /
analyzed: gal te de ltar brtson pa shas chen pos bsgrub na ni de lta na legs /
translated: If he accomplishes this through great effort, that is good.

original: mi bsgrub na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi bsgrub na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
translated: If he does not accomplish it, he commits an offense.

original: de la yang dge tshul gyis ji ltar slob dpon dang mkhan po la byung zhing byung bar gyur pa rnams la ji ltar bya'o zhes spro ba bskyed par bya ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: de la yang dge tshul gyis ji ltar slob dpon dang mkhan po la byung zhing byung bar gyur pa rnams la ji ltar bya'o zhes spro ba bskyed par bya ba de bzhin du /
translated: The novice monk should be encouraged to do what is necessary for the preceptor and the master, as they have done for him.

original: slob dpon dang mkhan pos kyang dge tshul ma byung zhing byung bar gyur pa rnams ji ltar bya zhes spro ba bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: slob dpon dang mkhan pos kyang dge tshul ma byung zhing byung bar gyur pa rnams ji ltar bya zhes spro ba bskyed par bya'o //
translated: The preceptor and the master should encourage the novice monk to do what is necessary for them, as he has done for them.

original: de la zhu ba rnams ni ma gtogs so //🔽dge tshul gyis slob dpon dang mkhan po stan gding ba la sogs pa'i bya ba snga ma bzhin te /
analyzed: de la zhu ba rnams ni ma gtogs so // dge tshul gyis slob dpon dang mkhan po stan gding ba la sogs pa'i bya ba snga ma bzhin te /
translated: But this does not include the request.🔽The novice monk should do for the preceptor and the master what he has done for himself, such as preparing the seat.

original: bdag nyid tha mar bkru bar bya ba'i bar du 'di ltar dge tshul gyis rtsva sngon po rnams bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid tha mar bkru bar bya ba'i bar du 'di ltar dge tshul gyis rtsva sngon po rnams bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The novice monk should do this, up to washing his feet himself.🔽The novice monk should prepare the blue-green grass.

original: me tog rnams btogs par bya /
analyzed: me tog rnams btogs par bya /
translated: He should pick the flowers.

original: 'bras bu rnams btogs par bya /🔽so shing rnams sbyin par bya /
analyzed: 'bras bu rnams btogs par bya / so shing rnams sbyin par bya /
translated: He should pick the fruit.🔽He should give the tooth cleaner.

original: lhung bzed kyi gzhi lo ma rnams sbyin par rung bar bya ste /
analyzed: lhung bzed kyi gzhi lo ma rnams sbyin par rung bar bya ste /
translated: He should make the leaf-cup suitable.

original: dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra bar gnod pa byed par gyur na /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra bar gnod pa byed par gyur na /
translated: If someone were to harm the Saṅgha’s pleasure grove,

original: der dge slong gis ji ltar mi de mi shor bar zin par bya /
analyzed: der dge slong gis ji ltar mi de mi shor bar zin par bya /
translated: how should the monk apprehend that person so that he does not escape?

original: gal te rnam grangs gang gis kyang ma zin par gyur na /
analyzed: gal te rnam grangs gang gis kyang ma zin par gyur na /
translated: If he is not apprehended by any means,

original: gzhan dag la bab col du mi smra bar thog mar rgyal po'i gnang chen rnams la bsgo bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan dag la bab col du mi smra bar thog mar rgyal po'i gnang chen rnams la bsgo bar bya /
translated: he should not speak rashly to others, but first inform the king’s officials.

original: de'i 'og tu btsun mo dang / gzhon nu dang / blon po dang / khrom gyi ru sna dang / zhang blon dang / zha 'bring gnyug ma rnams la bsgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu btsun mo dang / gzhon nu dang / blon po dang / khrom gyi ru sna dang / zhang blon dang / zha 'bring gnyug ma rnams la bsgo bar bya'o //
translated: After that, he should inform the queen, princes, ministers, leaders of the marketplace, paternal relatives, and maternal relatives.

original: de la nan tan du bya ba ni ci nas tshig gis bstan pa'i mtshams kyis thar bar 'gyur gyis /
analyzed: de la nan tan du bya ba ni ci nas tshig gis bstan pa'i mtshams kyis thar bar 'gyur gyis /
translated: In this case, being diligent means that by whatever means he is able to be released from the situation,

original: bsad pa'i las rnams mi 'byung bar bya ste /
analyzed: bsad pa'i las rnams mi 'byung bar bya ste /
translated: he should prevent the act of killing from occurring.

original: de ni nan tan du @241b bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni nan tan du @241b bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: That is called being diligent.

original: phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong gi bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong gi bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the duty of a mendicant who follows behind?”

original: phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong gis sngon du 'gro ba'i dge sbyong las ring nas kyang ma yin /
analyzed: phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong gis sngon du 'gro ba'i dge sbyong las ring nas kyang ma yin /
translated: The attendant monk should not follow too far behind the monk who is going in front,

original: shin tu bsnyen te yang ma yin /
analyzed: shin tu bsnyen te yang ma yin /
translated: nor should he follow too closely.

original: phrag pa sprad cing 'gro bar mi bya /
analyzed: phrag pa sprad cing 'gro bar mi bya /
translated: He should not walk with his shoulder touching the other’s.

original: khyim gyi nang du 'jug na yang gtam glo bur du de la mi bya /
analyzed: khyim gyi nang du 'jug na yang gtam glo bur du de la mi bya /
translated: Even when entering a house, he should not suddenly speak to him.

original: phyi nas smra bar bya /
analyzed: phyi nas smra bar bya /
translated: He should speak after the other has spoken.

original: des bsgo ba rnams bya'o //
analyzed: des bsgo ba rnams bya'o //
translated: He should do what he is told.

original: bkur sti bya /
analyzed: bkur sti bya /
translated: He should show respect.

original: bdag dman par bya /
analyzed: bdag dman par bya /
translated: He should make himself appear inferior.

original: 'jigs pa'i dbang du 'gyur bar bya /
analyzed: 'jigs pa'i dbang du 'gyur bar bya /
translated: He should be under the other’s control.

original: sngon du 'gro ba'i dge sbyong gis chos ma yin par smra na slar dgag par bya /
analyzed: sngon du 'gro ba'i dge sbyong gis chos ma yin par smra na slar dgag par bya /
translated: If the monk who is going in front speaks unrighteously, the attendant monk should stop him.

original: chos bzhin du smra na rjes su yi rang bar bya'o //
analyzed: chos bzhin du smra na rjes su yi rang bar bya'o //
translated: If he speaks righteously, he should rejoice in it.

original: de la chos dang ldan pa'i rnyed pa byung na blang bar bya ste /
analyzed: de la chos dang ldan pa'i rnyed pa byung na blang bar bya ste /
translated: If he obtains something righteously, he should accept it.

original: 'di ni phyi bzhin du 'brang ba'i dge sbyong gi bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni phyi bzhin du 'brang ba'i dge sbyong gi bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the attendant monk’s duties.

original: grong du nye bar 'jug pa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: grong du nye bar 'jug pa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the duty of entering a village?

original: khyim du zhugs pa'i dge slong gis dregs par mi bya /
analyzed: khyim du zhugs pa'i dge slong gis dregs par mi bya /
translated: A monk who enters a house should not be arrogant.

original: nga rgyal mi bskyed /
analyzed: nga rgyal mi bskyed /
translated: One should not be arrogant.

original: mi brtan par mi bya /🔽byung rgyal du smra bar mi bya /
analyzed: mi brtan par mi bya / byung rgyal du smra bar mi bya /
translated: One should not be unstable.🔽One should not speak incoherently.

original: mi gtsigs par mi bya /🔽yang dag par shes par bya /
analyzed: mi gtsigs par mi bya / yang dag par shes par bya /
translated: One should not be disrespectful.🔽One should understand correctly.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag par bya /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag par bya /
translated: One should be mindful.

original: sems mi g-yeng par bya /
analyzed: sems mi g-yeng par bya /
translated: One should not be distracted.

original: dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / spyod lam mdzes par bya /
analyzed: dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / spyod lam mdzes par bya /
translated: One should be pleasant and have a beautiful demeanor.

original: shin tu bsdams pa dang / shin tu bcabs pa dang / sgra chung ba dang / mi g-yeng ba dang / gnya' shing gang tsam dang / mi g-yeng bar bya /
analyzed: shin tu bsdams pa dang / shin tu bcabs pa dang / sgra chung ba dang / mi g-yeng ba dang / gnya' shing gang tsam dang / mi g-yeng bar bya /
translated: One should be very restrained, very discreet, very quiet, not distracted, looking ahead only a plow’s length, and not distracted.

original: bkur sti dang bcas pa dang / bdag nyid dman pa dang / bcas pa dang / 'jigs pa'i dbang du gyur pa dang / bcas pa dang / yid dman pa dang / phyag dar ba lta bu'i sems su bya /
analyzed: bkur sti dang bcas pa dang / bdag nyid dman pa dang / bcas pa dang / 'jigs pa'i dbang du gyur pa dang / bcas pa dang / yid dman pa dang / phyag dar ba lta bu'i sems su bya /
translated: One should have respect, humility, fear, and a lowly attitude, and one should have a mind like a broom.

original: rnyed pa dang bkur sti la 'dod par mi bya /
analyzed: rnyed pa dang bkur sti la 'dod par mi bya /
translated: One should not desire gain and honor.

original: phan par byed pa de ni grong du nye bar 'jug par byed pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: phan par byed pa de ni grong du nye bar 'jug par byed pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the practice of going to the village for the sake of benefit.

original: grong du nye bar 'gro ba'i bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: grong du nye bar 'gro ba'i bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the practice of going to the village?

original: dge slong grong du 'gro 'dod na /🔽shes bzhin du 'gro bar bya /
analyzed: dge slong grong du 'gro 'dod na / shes bzhin du 'gro bar bya /
translated: If a monk wishes to go to a village,🔽he should go with awareness.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag par bya /🔽sems mi g-yeng bar bya /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag par bya / sems mi g-yeng bar bya /
translated: He should be mindful.🔽He should not be distracted.

original: dbang po bsdams par dang / yid mi g-yeng bar bya /
analyzed: dbang po bsdams par dang / yid mi g-yeng bar bya /
translated: He should restrain his senses and not be distracted by thoughts.

original: snga phyi'i 'du shes dang / bla 'og shes pa nye bar gzhag par bya'o//
analyzed: snga phyi'i 'du shes dang / bla 'og shes pa nye bar gzhag par bya'o//
translated: He should be mindful of the distinctions between earlier and later, and of the distinctions between higher and lower.

original: dge slong dran pa nyams bzhin du grong du 'gro na nyes dmigs rnam pa lngar rig par bya ste /
analyzed: dge slong dran pa nyams bzhin du grong du 'gro na nyes dmigs rnam pa lngar rig par bya ste /
translated: If a monk goes to a village with impaired mindfulness, he should be aware of five disadvantages:

original: dus ma yin par dge slong 'khod pa rnams la ma bsgo bar grong du 'jug pa dang / ma brtags par stan la 'dug pa dang / rig pa'i skyes pa med par bud med la tshig lnga 'am /🔽drug @242a * //
analyzed: dus ma yin par dge slong 'khod pa rnams la ma bsgo bar grong du 'jug pa dang / ma brtags par stan la 'dug pa dang / rig pa'i skyes pa med par bud med la tshig lnga 'am /🔽drug @242a * //
translated: he enters the village at the wrong time without informing the monks who are there; he sits on a seat without examining it; he speaks five or six words to a woman without a man present;🔽he does not know the right time to leave;

original: pas lhag par chos ston pa dang / bud med kyi yul dang lhan cig dben pa skyabs yod pa na 'dug par byed pa dang / nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim du phyis gnon bya ste stan la 'dug par byed pa'o //
analyzed: pas lhag par chos ston pa dang / bud med kyi yul dang lhan cig dben pa skyabs yod pa na 'dug par byed pa dang / nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim du phyis gnon bya ste stan la 'dug par byed pa'o //
translated: and to teach the Dharma to women in private, and to sit on a seat in a house where one is invited to sit down and is served food, and where one is invited to eat, and where one is invited to eat with the women.

original: dge slong dran pa nyams bzhin du grong du 'gro na /
analyzed: dge slong dran pa nyams bzhin du grong du 'gro na /
translated: If a monk, with a lapse of mindfulness, goes to a village,

original: gzhan yang nyes dmigs rnam pa lngar rig par bya ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang nyes dmigs rnam pa lngar rig par bya ste /
translated: he should know that there are five other disadvantages:

original: phyir zhing bud med la lta ba dang / lta ba las kyang gtam zer ba dang / gtam zer ba las chags par 'gyur ba dang / chags pa las tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa las ma dad bzhin du mi tshangs par spyod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: phyir zhing bud med la lta ba dang / lta ba las kyang gtam zer ba dang / gtam zer ba las chags par 'gyur ba dang / chags pa las tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa las ma dad bzhin du mi tshangs par spyod par 'gyur te /
translated: he will look at women again and again, and from looking at them, he will talk with them, and from talking with them, he will become attached, and from attachment, he will think improperly, and from thinking improperly, he will engage in impure conduct, even if he does not want to.

original: nyes pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: nyes pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'am /
translated: He will either commit a downfall,

original: yang na bslab pa phul te babs par 'gyur pa'o //
analyzed: yang na bslab pa phul te babs par 'gyur pa'o //
translated: or he will give up his training and return to the lower life.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhin du /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhin du /
translated: As for the four establishments of mindfulness,

original: grong gi nang du 'jug na nyes dmigs te lta bu 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: grong gi nang du 'jug na nyes dmigs te lta bu 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: If one enters a village, one will not encounter any problems.

original: de ni grong du nye bar 'gro ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o ;
analyzed: de ni grong du nye bar 'gro ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o ;
translated: This is called the activity of approaching a village.

original: / grong du nye bar song ba'i bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: / grong du nye bar song ba'i bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the activity of having approached a village?

original: grong du nye bar song ba'i dge slong gis gtam sna tshogs smra bar mi bya /
analyzed: grong du nye bar song ba'i dge slong gis gtam sna tshogs smra bar mi bya /
translated: A monk who has approached a village should not engage in various kinds of conversation.

original: gtam 'gal bar mi bya /
analyzed: gtam 'gal bar mi bya /
translated: He should not engage in contradictory conversation.

original: chos gtam smra bar bya /
analyzed: chos gtam smra bar bya /
translated: He should engage in Dharma conversation.

original: gtam rgyud mi chad par bya /
analyzed: gtam rgyud mi chad par bya /
translated: He should not interrupt the conversation.

original: khyim pa rnams la chos yang dag par bstan par bya /🔽bstabs pa dang ; yang dag par gzengs bstod par bya /🔽rab tu dga' bar bya /
analyzed: khyim pa rnams la chos yang dag par bstan par bya / bstabs pa dang ; yang dag par gzengs bstod par bya / rab tu dga' bar bya /
translated: He should teach the Dharma to householders.🔽He should encourage them.🔽He should delight them.

original: phyir zhing yang dag par dad par bya /
analyzed: phyir zhing yang dag par dad par bya /
translated: He should inspire them again and again.

original: skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi 'dzin du gzhug pa dang / gso sbyong yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa la gnas pa dang / tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa dang / sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang /
analyzed: skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi 'dzin du gzhug pa dang / gso sbyong yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa la gnas pa dang / tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa dang / sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang /
translated: giving, self-control, restraint,🔽approaching holy beings,🔽listening to the holy Dharma,🔽correct mental activity,🔽practicing the Dharma in accordance with the Dharma,

original: skyes bu dam pa la bsnyen pa dang / dam pa'i chos mnyan pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang / chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos la nan tan du byed pa dang / lam ma yin pa las lam du de ltar yang dag par bsgrag par bya /
analyzed: skyes bu dam pa la bsnyen pa dang / dam pa'i chos mnyan pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang / chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos la nan tan du byed pa dang / lam ma yin pa las lam du de ltar yang dag par bsgrag par bya /
translated: and proclaiming the path to those on the wrong path.

original: ye shes dang lta ba rnam par sbyang bar bya ste /
analyzed: ye shes dang lta ba rnam par sbyang bar bya ste /
translated: One should purify wisdom and view.

original: de ni grong du nye bar song ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni grong du nye bar song ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the activity of going to the village.

original: grong du nye bar song ba'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: grong du nye bar song ba'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the activity of the elder who has gone to the village?

original: grong du nye bar song ba'i dge slong gnas brtan gyis de na dge slong gsar bu rnams la bsgo @242b bar bya /
analyzed: grong du nye bar song ba'i dge slong gnas brtan gyis de na dge slong gsar bu rnams la bsgo @242b bar bya /
translated: The elder monk who has gone to the village should instruct the younger monks there.

original: rjes su bstan par bya /
analyzed: rjes su bstan par bya /
translated: He should teach them.

original: ci nas rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang / lus btsogs pa dang / rtsed mo mi byed par bya /
analyzed: ci nas rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang / lus btsogs pa dang / rtsed mo mi byed par bya /
translated: He should not let them be conceited, arrogant, or play around.

original: dga' bar 'gyur bar gzhug par bya /
analyzed: dga' bar 'gyur bar gzhug par bya /
translated: He should make them happy.

original: ji ltar kun du spyod par bcas pa ma gzhug par bya /
analyzed: ji ltar kun du spyod par bcas pa ma gzhug par bya /
translated: He should not let them engage in improper conduct.

original: de dag gis kyang des ji ltar bsgo ba dang / rjes su bstan pa'i tshig rnams mnyan par bya ste /
analyzed: de dag gis kyang des ji ltar bsgo ba dang / rjes su bstan pa'i tshig rnams mnyan par bya ste /
translated: They should listen to the words of instruction and advice that he gives.

original: de ni grong du nye bar song ba'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni grong du nye bar song ba'i gnas brtan gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the activity of the elder monk who has gone to the village.

original: gnyug mar gnas pa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: gnyug mar gnas pa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the activity of the resident monk?

original: gzhi na gnas pa'i dge slong gis mdangs gsal ba dang / khro gnyer med par bya /
analyzed: gzhi na gnas pa'i dge slong gis mdangs gsal ba dang / khro gnyer med par bya /
translated: The resident monk should be cheerful and not frown.

original: dran pa mngon du 'gro ba dang / thog mar smra bar bya ste /
analyzed: dran pa mngon du 'gro ba dang / thog mar smra bar bya ste /
translated: He should be mindful and speak first.

original: tshur shog 'ongs pa legs so //
analyzed: tshur shog 'ongs pa legs so //
translated: ‘Welcome! Come in!’

original: zhes tshig snyan pa dang / tshig yid du 'ong ba dang / dga' bar 'gyur ba smra bar bya /
analyzed: zhes tshig snyan pa dang / tshig yid du 'ong ba dang / dga' bar 'gyur ba smra bar bya /
translated: Speak pleasantly, with words that are pleasing and delightful.

original: glo bur du lhags pa'i dge slong dag mthong nas mdza' bshes kyi tshul gyis mdun du bsdu bar bya /
analyzed: glo bur du lhags pa'i dge slong dag mthong nas mdza' bshes kyi tshul gyis mdun du bsdu bar bya /
