original: snyan pa'i tshig gis rab tu dga' bar bya /🔽bde bar brgyus sam /
analyzed: snyan pa'i tshig gis rab tu dga' bar bya / bde bar brgyus sam /
translated: Delight him with pleasant words.🔽Ask him, “Did you travel well?

original: bde bar lhags zhes dri bar bya /
analyzed: bde bar lhags zhes dri bar bya /
translated: Did you arrive in comfort?”

original: gal te rgan pa yin na ni de la phyag 'tshal nas /
analyzed: gal te rgan pa yin na ni de la phyag 'tshal nas /
translated: If he is older, bow to him.

original: de'i lhung bzed dang / chos gos blangs te /
analyzed: de'i lhung bzed dang / chos gos blangs te /
translated: Take his alms bowl and Dharma robes.

original: gtsug lag khang gi nang du bcug la /🔽stan la gzhag par bya /
analyzed: gtsug lag khang gi nang du bcug la / stan la gzhag par bya /
translated: Bring him into the monastery.🔽Place his alms bowl and Dharma robes on a stand.

original: rkang pa bkru zhing blang par bya /
analyzed: rkang pa bkru zhing blang par bya /
translated: Wash his feet and offer him water.

original: skom na chu grang mo blud par bya /
analyzed: skom na chu grang mo blud par bya /
translated: If he is thirsty, offer him a cool drink.

original: ji ltar nus shing mgu bar 'gyur ba'i chos bzhin bsgyur bar bya /
analyzed: ji ltar nus shing mgu bar 'gyur ba'i chos bzhin bsgyur bar bya /
translated: In accordance with the Dharma, do whatever you can to please him.

original: ji ltar rim pa bzhin du gnas mal rnams kyang sbyin par bya /
analyzed: ji ltar rim pa bzhin du gnas mal rnams kyang sbyin par bya /
translated: Give him a bed in the proper order.

original: ci'i slad du 'dug pa de ma dang / pha dang / bu dang / phu nu po'i 'du shes mngon du gzhag cing gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: ci'i slad du 'dug pa de ma dang / pha dang / bu dang / phu nu po'i 'du shes mngon du gzhag cing gzung bar bya'o //
translated: Why is it that one should establish the perception of mother, father, son, and brother, and hold it?

original: na nas ngal ba mi dor ro snyam ste /
analyzed: na nas ngal ba mi dor ro snyam ste /
translated: Thinking, “I will not abandon the effort to help them.”

original: de ni gzhi na gnas pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni gzhi na gnas pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the activity of those who are staying in a place.

original: ngal bso ba'i bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: ngal bso ba'i bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the activity of resting?

original: glo bur du 'ongs pa'i dge slong gis /
analyzed: glo bur du 'ongs pa'i dge slong gis /
translated: When a monk who has come on a visit

original: gtsug lag khang du 'ongs na des gzhi na gnas pa'i dge sbyong dag las gnas mal rnams brkam pas rings su 'dug par mi bya /
analyzed: gtsug lag khang du 'ongs na des gzhi na gnas pa'i dge sbyong dag las gnas mal rnams brkam pas rings su 'dug par mi bya /
translated: has come to the monastery, he should not, out of greed for a place to sleep, stay there too long.

original: snang ba'i gnas su 'dug par bya /
analyzed: snang ba'i gnas su 'dug par bya /
translated: He should stay in a place that is well lit.

original: spyod lam dal bar bya /🔽legs par bgo bar bya /
analyzed: spyod lam dal bar bya / legs par bgo bar bya /
translated: He should be slow in his movements.🔽He should dress well.

original: legs par bsdams par bya /
analyzed: legs par bsdams par bya /
translated: He should be well restrained.

original: 'di yang dal so ba'i bya ba yin te /
analyzed: 'di yang dal so ba'i bya ba yin te /
translated: This is also the activity of resting.

original: gzhi na gnas pa'i dge sbyong dag gis /🔽dge slong glo bur du @243a * //
analyzed: gzhi na gnas pa'i dge sbyong dag gis / dge slong glo bur du @243a * //
translated: Those who are staying in a place

original: lhags pa mthong na /
analyzed: lhags pa mthong na /
translated: should, when they see a monk who has come on a visit,

original: gal te nga shes na ni ci bder ngal bso bar bya /
analyzed: gal te nga shes na ni ci bder ngal bso bar bya /
translated: if they know him, let him rest as long as he likes.

original: ji ltar kun du spyod pa'i chos bcas pa bzhin du spyad par bya /
analyzed: ji ltar kun du spyod pa'i chos bcas pa bzhin du spyad par bya /
translated: He should act in accordance with the rules of conduct.

original: gal te ngo mi shes na bab col du ngal bso bar mi bya /
analyzed: gal te ngo mi shes na bab col du ngal bso bar mi bya /
translated: If he does not know him, he should not rashly relax.

original: dge slong dag la'ang tshe dang ldan pa 'di su'i lhan cig gi gnas pa yin ;
analyzed: dge slong dag la'ang tshe dang ldan pa 'di su'i lhan cig gi gnas pa yin ;
translated: He should ask the monks, “Venerable sirs, whose companion is this?

original: 'di'i spyod pa ji lta bu /
analyzed: 'di'i spyod pa ji lta bu /
translated: What is his conduct like?

original: spyod yul ji lta bu /
analyzed: spyod yul ji lta bu /
translated: What is his range of activity?

original: 'di tshul khrims dang / sdom pa dang / kun du spyod pa ji lta bu zhes dri bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di tshul khrims dang / sdom pa dang / kun du spyod pa ji lta bu zhes dri bar bya'o //
translated: What is his morality, his vows, and his conduct like?”

original: gal te 'di'i spyod pa dang / spyod yul dang / tshul khrims dang / sdom pa dang / kun du spyod pa rnams rtogs na gdod ngal bso bar bya'o //
analyzed: gal te 'di'i spyod pa dang / spyod yul dang / tshul khrims dang / sdom pa dang / kun du spyod pa rnams rtogs na gdod ngal bso bar bya'o //
translated: If he understands his conduct, range of activity, morality, vows, and conduct, then he should relax.

original: de gcig pu la gtsug lag khang gtad par mi bya /
analyzed: de gcig pu la gtsug lag khang gtad par mi bya /
translated: He should not be entrusted with the monastery by himself.

original: dge 'dun gyi mdzod dang / bang ba dang / dge 'dun gyi mal cha dang / stan la dbang byed du gzhug par mi bya /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi mdzod dang / bang ba dang / dge 'dun gyi mal cha dang / stan la dbang byed du gzhug par mi bya /
translated: He should not be put in charge of the Saṅgha’s storehouses, granaries, or the Saṅgha’s bedding and seats.

original: shin tu rtogs par byas la /
analyzed: shin tu rtogs par byas la /
translated: He should be thoroughly tested.

original: gdod yid gcugs par bya ba ni ngal bso ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gdod yid gcugs par bya ba ni ngal bso ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: The first is called the “activity of resting.”

original: nam mkha'i bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: nam mkha'i bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the “activity of space”?

original: nam mkha' thams cad mtshams gcig pa ma yin te /
analyzed: nam mkha' thams cad mtshams gcig pa ma yin te /
translated: Space is not a single, unified whole.

original: der gnas pa dang / 'di na gnas pa lhan cig tu las bya ba dang / phyir bzlog pa yang mi 'chags so //🔽'di na gnas pa dang de na 'dug pa lhan cig tu las bya bar yang mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: der gnas pa dang / 'di na gnas pa lhan cig tu las bya ba dang / phyir bzlog pa yang mi 'chags so // 'di na gnas pa dang de na 'dug pa lhan cig tu las bya bar yang mi 'gyur la /
translated: One cannot perform an action or turn back in space together with someone who is in space or on the ground.

original: phyir bzlog pa'ang mi 'chags so //
analyzed: phyir bzlog pa'ang mi 'chags so //
translated: One cannot perform an action or turn back together with someone who is on the ground or in space.

original: dge slong skya rengs ma shar bar chos gos med bzhin du 'byung bar mi bya /
analyzed: dge slong skya rengs ma shar bar chos gos med bzhin du 'byung bar mi bya /
translated: A monk should not go out without his robes before dawn.

original: dbyar gnas par khas blangs nas gzhag bdun nas /
analyzed: dbyar gnas par khas blangs nas gzhag bdun nas /
translated: Having accepted the rainy season retreat, he should not remain in space for more than seven days.

original: zhag bzhi bcur byin gyis ma brlabs par nam mkha' las byung zhing gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: zhag bzhi bcur byin gyis ma brlabs par nam mkha' las byung zhing gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: He should not remain in space for more than forty days without consecrating it.

original: gal te byung zhing gnas na chos gos dang bral bar 'gyur /
analyzed: gal te byung zhing gnas na chos gos dang bral bar 'gyur /
translated: If he does remain there, he will be separated from his robes.

original: dbyar yang ral bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: dbyar yang ral bar 'gyur te /
translated: And the rainy season retreat will be broken.

original: 'di ni nam mkha'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni nam mkha'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the “activity of space.”

original: sra brkyang gi bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: sra brkyang gi bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the activity of the robe-making ceremony?

original: sra brkyang la phan yon lnga ste /
analyzed: sra brkyang la phan yon lnga ste /
translated: There are five benefits of the robe-making ceremony:

original: zhag gcig gi 'bral ba med pa dang / zhag bcu'i 'da' ba med pa dang / zla ba gcig gi 'da' ba med pa dang / ji snyed dgos pa'i gos rnams byin gyis ma brlabs par 'chang du rung ba dang / stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs kyis ljongs rgyur rung ba'o //
analyzed: zhag gcig gi 'bral ba med pa dang / zhag bcu'i 'da' ba med pa dang / zla ba gcig gi 'da' ba med pa dang / ji snyed dgos pa'i gos rnams byin gyis ma brlabs par 'chang du rung ba dang / stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs kyis ljongs rgyur rung ba'o //
translated: One is not separated from the saṃgha for one day, one does not transgress the ten day limit, one does not transgress the one month limit, one is permitted to keep robes for as long as one needs without consecrating them, and one is permitted to travel with one’s upper and lower robes.

original: gzhan yang sra brkyang la phan yon rnam pa lnga ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang sra brkyang la phan yon rnam pa lnga ste /
translated: There are five other benefits of the robe-making ceremony:

original: 'dus shing za ba med pa dang / yang @243b yang za ba med pa dang / phyi ma la ma bsgo bar 'gro ba med pa dang / chos gos ci dgos pa tshol du rung ba dang / ston zla tha chungs nas /
analyzed: 'dus shing za ba med pa dang / yang @243b yang za ba med pa dang / phyi ma la ma bsgo bar 'gro ba med pa dang / chos gos ci dgos pa tshol du rung ba dang / ston zla tha chungs nas /
translated: One does not eat in groups, one does not eat again and again, one does not go out without permission, one is permitted to seek robes as needed, and one is permitted to travel with one’s upper and lower robes.

original: dpyid zla ra ba'i bar du dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams kyis rnyed pa ma bgos shing /
analyzed: dpyid zla ra ba'i bar du dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams kyis rnyed pa ma bgos shing /
translated: The saṃgha of monks who have agreed to remain in retreat from the last month of autumn until the first month of spring do not distribute their gains.

original: gzhag pa de yang sra brkyang bting ba rnams kyis ma dad na gzhan la mi sbyin no //
analyzed: gzhag pa de yang sra brkyang bting ba rnams kyis ma dad na gzhan la mi sbyin no //
translated: If the monks who have spread out the sitting mats are not satisfied, they should not be given to others.

original: de ni sra brkyang gi bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni sra brkyang gi bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the procedure for spreading out the sitting mats.

original: chu tshags kyi bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: chu tshags kyi bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the procedure for the water-strainer?

original: dge slong chu tshags med par lam du 'gro bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong chu tshags med par lam du 'gro bar mi bya'o //
translated: A monk should not travel without a water-strainer.

original: gal te chu rgyun du 'bab pa de yang /
analyzed: gal te chu rgyun du 'bab pa de yang /
translated: If there is a flowing stream

original: btung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: btung bar 'gyur te /
translated: and the water is drinkable

original: chu gzhan dang mi 'dres pa zhig gam /
analyzed: chu gzhan dang mi 'dres pa zhig gam /
translated: and not mixed with other water,

original: khron pa rung ba zhig gam /
analyzed: khron pa rung ba zhig gam /
translated: or if there is a suitable well,

original: rgyang grags phyed phyed du gtsug lag khang rgyun ma chad par yod na ni ma gtogs so //
analyzed: rgyang grags phyed phyed du gtsug lag khang rgyun ma chad par yod na ni ma gtogs so //
translated: or if there is a monastery within a half-league,

original: de ni chu tshags kyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni chu tshags kyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: this is called the procedure for the water-strainer.

original: 'chad pa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'chad pa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the procedure for the walking-meditation place?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'chags gnyis rjes su gnang ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'chags gnyis rjes su gnang ste /
translated: The Blessed One has allowed two kinds of walking-meditation places:

original: bsam gtan la zhugs pa dang / kha ton la zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan la zhugs pa dang / kha ton la zhugs pa'o //
translated: those for those who are in meditative concentration and those for those who are reciting scriptures.

original: bsam gtan la zhugs pa'i 'chag sa ni khru bco brgyad do //
analyzed: bsam gtan la zhugs pa'i 'chag sa ni khru bco brgyad do //
translated: The walking-meditation place for those who are in meditative concentration is eighteen cubits long.

original: kha ton la zhugs pa'i 'chags sa ni khru bcu gnyis te /
analyzed: kha ton la zhugs pa'i 'chags sa ni khru bcu gnyis te /
translated: The place for confession is twelve cubits.🔽This is called the activity of walking.

original: de ni 'chag sa'i bya ba zhes bya'o /'chag sa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de ni 'chag sa'i bya ba zhes bya'o /'chag sa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the activity of walking?

original: dge slong 'chag sar 'dod na des drag tu yang ma yin /
analyzed: dge slong 'chag sar 'dod na des drag tu yang ma yin /
translated: If a monk wishes to walk, he should not walk too fast

original: dal nas kyang ma yin par bcag par bya /
analyzed: dal nas kyang ma yin par bcag par bya /
translated: or too slow.

original: shes bzhin du bcag par bya /
analyzed: shes bzhin du bcag par bya /
translated: He should walk mindfully.🔽He should not let his mind go outside.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / dbang po nang du gzhug pa dang / yid phyir mi 'byung bar bya /🔽rdeg mi 'chos par bya /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / dbang po nang du gzhug pa dang / yid phyir mi 'byung bar bya / rdeg mi 'chos par bya /
translated: He should not walk with his eyes downcast.

original: phan tshun mi 'khor bar bya /
analyzed: phan tshun mi 'khor bar bya /
translated: He should not walk looking around.

original: drang por bcag par bya /
analyzed: drang por bcag par bya /
translated: He should walk straight.

original: gal te drang por bcag mi nus na /🔽srad bu bre bar bya zhing sbubs su bcug nas /
analyzed: gal te drang por bcag mi nus na / srad bu bre bar bya zhing sbubs su bcug nas /
translated: If he cannot walk straight,🔽he should make a rope and put it in a tube.

original: de la bzung zhing bcag par bya ste /
analyzed: de la bzung zhing bcag par bya ste /
translated: He should hold it and walk.

original: 'di ni bcag pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni bcag pa'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the activity of walking.

original: 'phyan gyi bya ba gang zhe na /🔽ston pa'i mdun du ma yin /🔽mchod rten gyi drung du ma yin ;
analyzed: 'phyan gyi bya ba gang zhe na / ston pa'i mdun du ma yin / mchod rten gyi drung du ma yin ;
translated: What is the activity of lying down?🔽Not in front of the Teacher,🔽not in front of a stupa,

original: slob dpon dang mkhan po'i drung du ma yin /
analyzed: slob dpon dang mkhan po'i drung du ma yin /
translated: not in front of the master or preceptor,

original: bla ma'i drung du ma yin /
analyzed: bla ma'i drung du ma yin /
translated: not in the presence of the teacher,

original: bla ma'i gnas lta bu'i drung du ma yin /🔽grong gi nang du skye bo mang po 'du ba'i nang du ma yin /
analyzed: bla ma'i gnas lta bu'i drung du ma yin / grong gi nang du skye bo mang po 'du ba'i nang du ma yin /
translated: not in the presence of those who are like the teacher,🔽not in the middle of a town,🔽not in the middle of a crowd of people,

original: phyi phyir zhing gtang bar mi bya /
analyzed: phyi phyir zhing gtang bar mi bya /
translated: and not repeatedly.

original: gal te phyir zhing gtong ba zhig tu gyur na /🔽gnas gung du song @244a * //
analyzed: gal te phyir zhing gtong ba zhig tu gyur na / gnas gung du song @244a * //
translated: If it is necessary to defecate repeatedly,🔽one should go to a secluded place

original: ste ; gtang bar bya /
analyzed: ste ; gtang bar bya /
translated: and defecate there.

original: de'i rkyen gyis gzhan la mi bde bar mi bya ste /
analyzed: de'i rkyen gyis gzhan la mi bde bar mi bya ste /
translated: One should not make others uncomfortable because of this.

original: 'di ni 'phyen gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni 'phyen gyi bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the procedure for defecating.

original: phyi sa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: phyi sa'i bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the procedure for urinating?

original: dge slong bzhar bar 'dod na /🔽rno ba'i yo byad kyis bzhar bar mi bya /
analyzed: dge slong bzhar bar 'dod na / rno ba'i yo byad kyis bzhar bar mi bya /
translated: If a monk wishes to shave his head,🔽he should not use sharp instruments.

original: rtsva'i chang bus mi bya /🔽lo ma'am / ras ma'am /
analyzed: rtsva'i chang bus mi bya / lo ma'am / ras ma'am /
translated: He should not use a bundle of grass.🔽He should use a leaf, a piece of cloth,

original: 'jam pa gzhan gyis bzhar bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'jam pa gzhan gyis bzhar bar bya ste /
translated: or something else soft.

original: de ni bzhar ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni bzhar ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the procedure for shaving.

original: bshang ba'i bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: bshang ba'i bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the procedure for defecating?

original: dge slong gis gar bab bab tu bshang ba mi bya /🔽rtsig pa'i drung du ma yin /
analyzed: dge slong gis gar bab bab tu bshang ba mi bya / rtsig pa'i drung du ma yin /
translated: A monk should not defecate just anywhere.🔽He should not defecate near a wall,

original: shing ljon pa'i drung du ma yin /
analyzed: shing ljon pa'i drung du ma yin /
translated: near a tree,

original: shes bzhin du bya /
analyzed: shes bzhin du bya /
translated: One should do it mindfully.

original: phyogs gcig tu bshang ba bya /
analyzed: phyogs gcig tu bshang ba bya /
translated: One should defecate in one place.

original: gal te phyi phyir zhing bshang ba zhig tu gyur na /
analyzed: gal te phyi phyir zhing bshang ba zhig tu gyur na /
translated: If one has to defecate again and again,

original: bshang ba'i skyil mo krung du bzhag par bya /
analyzed: bshang ba'i skyil mo krung du bzhag par bya /
translated: one should sit in the squatting position.

original: yang na rgyun gyi khung brko bar bya ste /
analyzed: yang na rgyun gyi khung brko bar bya ste /
translated: Or one should dig a hole.

original: 'di ni bshang ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni bshang ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the procedure for defecation.

original: bshang ba'i bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: bshang ba'i bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the procedure for defecation?

original: dge slong bshang bar 'gro bar 'dod pas snga nas 'dug pas tshor bar bya ba'i phyir se gol brdab par bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong bshang bar 'gro bar 'dod pas snga nas 'dug pas tshor bar bya ba'i phyir se gol brdab par bya'o //
translated: When a monk wants to defecate, he should first snap his fingers three times in order to warn the spirits that inhabit the area.

original: sngon du zhugs pas kyang lud par dbyung bar bya'o //
analyzed: sngon du zhugs pas kyang lud par dbyung bar bya'o //
translated: If someone has already entered the area, he should also snap his fingers.

original: shes bzhin du nang du 'gro bar bya'o //
analyzed: shes bzhin du nang du 'gro bar bya'o //
translated: One should enter mindfully.

original: chos gos legs par brdzes nas 'dug par bya'o //
analyzed: chos gos legs par brdzes nas 'dug par bya'o //
translated: One should sit down after adjusting one’s upper robe well.

original: bshang ba'i khung bur rkang rten gnyis la legs par brtags nas /
analyzed: bshang ba'i khung bur rkang rten gnyis la legs par brtags nas /
translated: After examining the two supports for the feet,

original: dbus su 'dug par bya /🔽bshang ba mi 'ongs na mthus btsir bar mi bya /
analyzed: dbus su 'dug par bya / bshang ba mi 'ongs na mthus btsir bar mi bya /
translated: one should sit in the middle.🔽If the feces do not come out, one should not push with force.

original: 'ong ba la dgag par mi bya ste /
analyzed: 'ong ba la dgag par mi bya ste /
translated: If they do come out, one should not stop them.

original: 'di ni bshang ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni bshang ba'i bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the duty concerning excrement.

original: bshang ba'i khung bu'i bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: bshang ba'i khung bu'i bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the duty concerning the place for excrement?

original: dge slong bshang bar 'dod na dal bus bags kyis shes bzhin du bshang bar bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong bshang bar 'dod na dal bus bags kyis shes bzhin du bshang bar bya'o //
translated: When a monk wants to defecate, he should do so slowly, gradually, mindfully, and with care.

original: bshang khung gi kha rnams su gos shing chags par mi bya ste /
analyzed: bshang khung gi kha rnams su gos shing chags par mi bya ste /
translated: He should not let his robes get soiled or stuck.
